Name: ARGÜELLES, Madrid, Friendly Rentals
Summary: Ideally located in the downtown area of Madrid, a residential area a short distance walk from many restaurants or shops of interest, as well as the most visited sites.
Space: The 80 m2, 5th floor apartment (with elevator) has been newly renovated and refurbished and is white and bright. It has been decorated in a modern and stylish fashion, designed to combine easy and comfortable private living in the three bedrooms, together with a social living room for relaxing, sitting and eating with friends. The apartment can comfortably accommodate 5 to 6 people. The flat is equipped with 10 MB wireless Internet access, a wireless phone, adjustable lights in all rooms and a safe.  The living room and the dining room are integrated. The large conservatory doors at the end of the living room open onto a balcony overlooking the treetops and the street. The lounge also has a large flat screen TV, over 30 digital television and radio channels (some in dual language) and designer lighting with dimmer.  One bedroom is extremely spacious with an en-suite hotel inspired tiled bathroom and walk-in shower. The accompanying wardrobe, side tables and chest of drawers  are handma
Description: Ideally located in the downtown area of Madrid, a residential area a short distance walk from many restaurants or shops of interest, as well as the most visited sites. The 80 m2, 5th floor apartment (with elevator) has been newly renovated and refurbished and is white and bright. It has been decorated in a modern and stylish fashion, designed to combine easy and comfortable private living in the three bedrooms, together with a social living room for relaxing, sitting and eating with friends. The apartment can comfortably accommodate 5 to 6 people. The flat is equipped with 10 MB wireless Internet access, a wireless phone, adjustable lights in all rooms and a safe.  The living room and the dining room are integrated. The large conservatory doors at the end of the living room open onto a balcony overlooking the treetops and the street. The lounge also has a large flat screen TV, over 30 digital television and radio channels (some in dual language) and designer lighting with dimmer.  One
Neighborhood Overview: The apartment is perfectly located in Central Madrid (Chamberi) in a residential area where trees line the streets, yet within easy walking distance of countless restaurants, bars and shops in the area as well as the shopping facilities around Metro Arguelles, Plaza Quevedo and calle Fuencarral (leading to Gran Via). Busy city spots such as plaza Dos-de-Mayo, Tribunal, Chueca, Plaza España and even Paseo de la Castellana on one side and Gran Via on the other are all within easy reach and mix with quieter parts such as the lovely Parque del Oeste and calle Pintor Rosales with its terraces and restaurants overlooking the park. The campus of Madrid’s Complutense University is also within walking distance.
Transit: The apartment is excellent for public transport, with four different metro lines located only between 2 and 7 minutes walking distance from the apartment (stations: Isla Filipinas, Moncloa, Arguelles and a little further Quevedo). The Moncloa regional bus station as well as easy access by car to the M30, M40 or the A6 Motorways (the latter leads up to the Mountains in the north of Madrid) guarantee full accessibility with minimal traffic problems. Madrid’s circular cycle path “Anillo Verde” which surrounds the entire city of Madrid is accessible only about 1 km from the apartment. All aspects to manage day to day life are easily accessible from the apartment. There is a supermarket, a bank, a beauty salon and garage parking directly opposite, a pharmacy on the corner, coffee bars, dry cleaners, bakeries, fruit shops and so on in the side streets nearby.
Access: Wifi, TV, Microwave, fully equipped kitchen. Complete equipment for a friendly stay.
Interaction: We are doing the check in at the office, located at: Calle San Marcos, 9 28004, MADRID.  There, we receive the customers, deliver the keys and explain the rules of the apartment. We also solve all kind of questions and doubts the customer could have at that point.
House Rules: Checkin is done at our office. The address: Calle San Marcos 9 28004 MADRID Our office hours are from 10.00 to 21.00. Late checkin (after 21.00 hours) is done in the apartment and has a surcharge of 30 euros. Guests arriving after office hours have to call ahead to inform about your arrival. No parties allowed at any part of the accommodation. Noises and volume must be controlled from 22:00 to 10:00 because all the accommodations are placed in normal neighborhoods so the rest of the people could be bothered. There are not more beds than the announced ones. The cribs are only available under petition. Smoking is not allowed. Pets are not allowed. We hope guests are polite and know how to behave. When checking out, please leave the keys on the table and take out the rubbish, if there is any generated on your stay, to the containers located out of the building.

This information will be destroyed after you have left the property and we have conducted a check-out inspection*
Host About:
Spain Select was born from the recognition of a desire among travelers to live locally in a real home whilst away from their own, and yet still enjoy all of the benefits and small luxuries of a hotel stay. Not only that, though, we understood that they also wanted to be close to all of the best that their destination has to offer – to be right in the heart of it all. So we decided to source a broad range of high quality homes in the most sought after locations across the country, starting with the capital Madrid and moving over to Malaga, Valencia, and Seville. We then added a few unique flourishes that embody our brand of service and our values. Our interior design team works to extract and enhance the natural charm from each space and make it a warm home. Our very own in-house Local Ambassadors are posted in each destination to welcome each guest home and bed them in to the neighborhood when they first arrive. Finally, a selection of hotel-like services – including a 24-hour concierge for everything from show tickets to new sheets – and a motorized maintenance team completes our comprehensive customer care throughout every single stay. Every Spain Select experience is unique, yet they are all of a consistent high quality no matter when you stay with us. 

Live local, sleep royal: welcome to Spain Select.

Neighborhood Overview: What can we say about Malasaña that you dont know already? The most vibrant, cool and modern neighborhood of Madrid.  Right in the heart of the neighborhood, close to bars, restaurants, alternative shops, bio fruit stores, hipster cafés, pizza stores open 24-7... you name it. Close enough to not miss a thing, but located in a quiet street so you will sleep like a baby. Super safe area, gay friendly neighborhood and full of amenities, what else can you ask for?

House Rules: Para garantizar el cuidado y el uso respetuoso del apartamento por parte de nuestros clientes, te pediremos una fianza de garantía a la entrada, que será devuelta el último día, antes de tu salida, si el apartamento se encuentra exactamente en las mismas condiciones en que te fue entregado.  La cantidad de la fianza es de 300 euros, dependiendo del apartamento elegido y del número de días de estancia. Host About:
Hello!, We are David & Sergio, two travel fanatics who think world is much more smaller than it appears. Nothing looks far away if you find someone to share your trip, and even the smallest place on Earth has something to learn about. This is why we think there are thousands of places to feel like at home.

¡Hola! Somos David y Sergio, dos fanáticos del turismo, que creemos que el mundo no es tan grande como parece. No hay ningún destino lejano si disfrutas del camino y de la compañía apropiada. Porque estamos seguros que hasta el rincón más pequeño del planeta tiene algo de lo que aprender, sabemos que hay mil rincones en el mundo donde es fácil sentirse como en casa.

Neighborhood Overview: Mi barrio es el más pintoresco y uno de los mejores conservados, con todos los museos, el parque de Retiro, sus calles nombradas con frases de los mejores escritores ( de ahí el Barrio de la Letras) y la hermosísima calle Huertas, perfecta para tapear, comer e ir de copas.
Transit: Se puede ir andando a todos los centros turísticos en 5 minutos. También está al lado de la estación de tren de Atocha para moverse a las más lindas ciudades, Toledo, Segovia, Ávila, Aranjuez... y a todas las ciudades de España y limítrofes como Portugal, etc.
Access: Pueden usar casi todo de la casa. Les hacemos la estancia lo más cómoda posible. Si vienen con amigos o familia, podemos alojar a 5 personas, tenemos 2 dormitorios con cama doble y un dormitorio con cama individual, para que puedan estar todos en nuestra casa. Si la habitación se fuese a ocupar por 2 personas, tenéis que consultarme antes y darme detalles de con quién y con qué propósito venís y pagar un suplemento por persona adicional.
Interaction: Estamos para ayudaros y guiaros en todo lo que esté a nuestro alcance. Lo que más nos importa es la comodidad y la intimidad de nuestros huéspedes. Respetamos cualquier costumbre o ideología. Confiamos en el cuidado de nuestra casa y no pedimos ni fianza ni depósito. No habrá ninguna retención en vuestra tarjeta de credito, Sólo un compromiso con BNB del pago máximo de 250€, en el caso de que se comunicara alguna rotura o desperfecto.
House Rules: Limpieza, respeto, orden, y que disfruten sanamente la casa y la maravillosa y muy segura zona "El Barrio de las Letras" en el centro del corazón de todo. Pueden venir a la hora que deseen después de divertirse y de disfrutar la noche madrileña y respetamos las horas de sueño a cualquier hora del día.
Host About: Limpia, ordenada, respetuosa, me encanta viajar y tratar a las personas que vienen a mi casa para que se sientan muy cómodos y tengan una estancia muy agradable.

Hi, I'm Oscar! I love to travel all around the world, so I have been doing so since I have memory. 

I've lived in countries such as Japan, where I worked as journalist; in Philippines, having my own coffe shop; and in London, where I was cabin crew in British Airways.

Now, back to Madrid - one of the most amazing cities in the world- I'm pleased to host people from all kinds of cultures and nationalities. What a nice experience! :)

Host About:
I am trained as an architect, 27 years old, located in Madrid for more than a year now and I love it! Such an exciting city! I am constantly on the look out for new and exciting opportunities to further develop myself and my interests.

Originally from Romania, I have studied and lived in Scotland, Brussels, Barcelona and Madrid in the past 8 years of my life. I speak English, Spanish & a bit of French (basic).

I love travelling and meeting new, interesting people everywhere I go; a great, if not the best, way to getting to know one-self and growing into a beautiful all-rounded human being. I enjoy cooking, reading, long chats over a good wine and listening to great music (live if possible). I love yoga and sushi, cycling and skiing.

Name: Basilica Apartment Friendly Rentals
Summary: Situado en el barrio de la Latina, junto a la Basílica de San Francisco el Grande, un templo de Madrid emblemático del siglo XVI. Un barrio tradicional y muy auténtico donde conviven las nuevas tendencias gastronómicas con los locales de toda la vida
Space: This 90 m2 apartment is on the third floor of a building with a small lift in a quiet street only two minutes from Plaza de la Cebada. The apartment has three rooms, one double bed and 4 singles; a baby's cot and highchair are also available. Two of the rooms are linked by a sliding door, but they both have another door to get in and out. There is a full bathroom with bath and a guest toilet. There is a large, bright living room with two balconies overlooking the street. The modern, fully equipped kitchen opens onto the living room and has lots of appliances, including a dishwasher, induction and electric hobs and a griddle. It is decorated in tasteful style throughout, with colourful furniture, walls and floors that create a welcoming, stylish feel. This turn-of-the-century apartment has been renovated using top-quality materials including noble-wood and cement-tile floors. Description: This 90 m2 apartment is on the third floor of a building with a small lift in a quiet street only two minutes from Plaza de la Cebada. The apartment has three rooms, one double bed and 4 singles; a baby's cot and highchair are also available. Two of the rooms are linked by a sliding door, but they both have another door to get in and out. There is a full bathroom with bath and a guest toilet. There is a large, bright living room with two balconies overlooking the street. The modern, fully equipped kitchen opens onto the living room and has lots of appliances, including a dishwasher, induction and electric hobs and a griddle. It is decorated in tasteful style throughout, with colourful furniture, walls and floors that create a welcoming, stylish feel. This turn-of-the-century apartment has been renovated using top-quality materials including noble-wood and cement-tile floors. Neighborhood Overview: Located in La Latina neighbourhood, next to the emblematic 16th-century Basílica de San Francisco el Grande. This typical, authentic Madrid neighbourhood combines new eating places with traditional bars and restaurants and is one of the city's central areas that has kept its original aspect and atmosphere.
Transit: Es una zona tranquila, y sin tener que gastar mucho tiempo en desplazamiento a pie se tiene a mano la zona más concurrida de Madrid, ya sea por visitas de tipo cultural (Plaza Mayor, calles anexas a la misma, casco viejo e histórico de Madrid, etc...) como por visitas a comercios típicos de la zona. La facilidad de nuestros apartamentos, y de este en particular, es que a menos de 10-15 minutos andando te encuentras en medio del centro de Madrid, por lo que el transporte público para acceder al mismo no es necesario.

House Rules: Checkin is done at our office. The address: Calle San Marcos 9 28004 MADRID Our office hours are from 10.00 to 21.00. Late checkin (after 21.00 hours) is done in the apartment and has a surcharge of 30 euros. Guests arriving after office hours have to call ahead to inform about your arrival. No parties allowed at any part of the accommodation. Noises and volume must be controlled from 22:00 to 10:00 because all the accommodations are placed in normal neighborhoods so the rest of the people could be bothered. There are not more beds than the announced ones. The cribs are only available under petition. Smoking is not allowed. Pets are not allowed. We hope guests are polite and know how to behave. When checking out, please leave the keys on the table and take out the rubbish, if there is any generated on your stay, to the containers located out of the building.

Neighborhood Overview: Alonso Martinez neighborhood is known for being the meeting point between very different areas such as Chamberí and Chueca, in the midst of which the colorful square of Santa Barbara is located. This fusion of neighborhoods includes flea markets, bars, restaurants and charming shops dotted through the streets of Alonso Martinez. At night the street atmosphere gains protagonism in the neighborhood. Just 600 meters away we find the famous San Idelfonso Market, in 5 minutes we can join the lively atmosphere of Chueca Square and only 15 minutes walking, we reach Gran Via street. Perfect location to move around without public transportation, and tour historic Madrid with pleasant walks.
Transit: From the airport we offer our customers private transfer service on request (extra charge). Approximate arrival time: 20 minutes. If you prefer to access by public transport, the shortest route is as follows: Madrid Airport - Alonso Martínez: Line 8 to Nuevos Ministerios, we transfer to line 10 and descend on Alonso Martinez, from there we walk to the apartment. Approximate journey time: 25-30 minutes. Atocha Train Station - Alonso Martínez: Line 1 to Tribunal, we transfer to line 10 to Alonso Martinez and walk to the apartment. Approximate journey time: 15 minutes.
Access: ALOJAMENTO Apartamento em prédio com elevador no centro de Madrid. Espaçoso e recentemente renovado, mas ainda mantém alguns dos elementos clássicos da antiga casa senhorial. Totalmente mobilado e equipado, tem uma varanda exterior que torna o apartamento muito brilhante e alegre. O apartamento tem: Quarto principal com uma cama queen size, espaçoso closet, ele é preenchido com luz natural através de uma grande janela para um pátio, tem uma casa de banho moderna e original totalmente equipada com banheira, bidé, espelho aumentada e secador de cabelo. Sala de estar aconchegante e acolhedor, com uma varanda com vista para a rua, permitindo que o ar fresco no quarto e muita luz. Ele contém dois sofás-camas de casal, TV de tela plana e uma pequena biblioteca e estação de trabalho. A sala de jantar contém uma grande mesa para 6 pessoas, sob uma lâmpada majestoso herdada da antiga casa senhorial. Cozinha separada e totalmente equipada com todos os utensílios necessários para preparar a refei
Interaction: In PyR Select we like to personally welcome our customers at the time of your arrival, to welcome you and provide the necessary information about the apartment, handing over the keys and providing a map of Madrid explaining all major attractions and tourist information. It is vital for us that your stay is as pleasant as possible and we are always available during office hours from 10.00h to 20.00h and 24-hours for any emergency.
House Rules: We appreciate you to be careful with the rest of the neighbors past 22.00h. Please note that smoking is not allowed inside the apartment or organizing parties in it. As PyR Select founder I'm happy to welcome travelers to our magnificent apartments.

Our destiny is not a place but the opportunity to see things from a different point of view, that’s why PYR Select wants to make your travel experience as easy and simple as possible so you can always feel at home.

This new way of travelling makes your journey more flexible and gives you the opportunity to enjoy the same services that you find in a hotel.

Enjoy a great experience with us!

Esta nueva manera de alojarse te permite tener más flexibilidad y disfrutar de los mismos servicios que ofrece un hotel, para así conseguir una experiencia única.

¡Disfruta de la mejor experiencia con nosotros!

Name: Cibeles , corazón de Madrid.oferta
Summary: Situado en Cibeles el corazón y sitio más característico  de Madrid desde donde puedes ir a pie a cualquier lugar, museo , teatro y barrio emblemático  de la ciudad. Dispone de parada de todos los autobuses  y metro .Casa con mucho encanto. Una buhardilla muy confortable distribuida en dos plantas.
Space: Es una buhardilla duplex, en la primera planta se encuentra una amplia cocina con todos los servicios y en la planta superior el salón con un sofá cama y dos buhardillones (parte más baja 1,50) con dos futones que crean un ambiente chill out muy agradable y diferente. También consta de un cuarto de baño completo en la misma planta. Su luz da mucha alegría y sensación de bienestar. La ubicación es inmejorable esta a 5 min de museo del Prado, 1min del museo thyssen, 5 min del museo reina Sofía ,1 min del congreso de los diputados, 1 min teatro de la zarzuela, 1 min plaza de Cibeles ,5 min puerta de Alcalá , 5 min puerta del Sol , tiene a 200 m parada de todos los autobuses en Cibeles inclusive el del aeropuerto 1 min, y boca de metro a 2 min, (hay posibilidad de alquilar garaje para coche o moto privado por 18€/día ),a cinco minutos del divertido barrio de las letras y a 5 minutos de la conocida milla de oro. Podréis disfrutar a 5 min del colorido y animado barrio de chueca  y Malasaña .
Description: Situado en Cibeles el corazón y sitio más característico  de Madrid desde donde puedes ir a pie a cualquier lugar, museo , teatro y barrio emblemático  de la ciudad. Es una buhardilla duplex, en la primera planta se encuentra una amplia cocina con todos los servicios y en la planta superior el salón con un sofá cama y dos buhardillones (parte más baja 1,50) con dos futones que crean un ambiente chill out muy agradable y diferente. También consta de un cuarto de baño completo en la misma planta. Su luz da mucha alegría y sensación de bienestar. La ubicación es inmejorable esta a 5 min de museo del Prado, 1min del museo thyssen, 5 min del museo reina Sofía ,1 min del congreso de los diputados, 1 min teatro de la zarzuela, 1 min plaza de Cibeles ,5 min puerta de Alcalá , 5 min puerta del Sol , tiene a 200 m parada de todos los autobuses en Cibeles inclusive
Neighborhood Overview: La ubicación es inmejorable se encuentra en el barrio de Las Cortes a 300m de la conocida fuente de Cibeles,  a 5 min de museo del Prado, 1min del museo thyssen, 5 min del museo reina Sofía ,1 min del congreso de los diputados, 1 min teatro de la zarzuela, 1 min plaza de Cibeles ,5 min puerta de Alcalá , 5 min puerta del Sol , podrás disfrutar de un agradable paseo atravesando la plaza Mayor y llegar al impresionante Palacio de Oriente en 10 minutos. Conexión de todos los autobuses en Cibeles inclusive el del aeropuerto 1 min, y boca de metro a 2 min, a cinco minutos del divertido barrio de las letras y a 5 minutos de la conocida milla de oro. Podréis disfrutar a 5 min del colorido y animado barrio de chueca y Malasaña  . Vive Madrid , os espero!!!
Notes: Aunque es una zona muy céntrica y muy cómoda para poder disfrutar y  conocer la ciudad caminando la casa es silenciosa y aislada de ruidos que ayuda al descanso y la desconexión de la gran ciudad.
Transit: Todos los transportes públicos incluso el bus que conecta con el aeropuerto a 100m de la puerta. Pero principalmente a pie a todos los lugares emblemáticos, museos ,teatros , barrios de ocio gastronómico y nocturno, tiendas de moda. Disfruta el lujo de vivir en Cibeles y poder ir caminando por toda la ciudad.
Access: El apartamento dispone de ascensor, wifi, lavadora y secadora , secador de peloy todos los pequeños electrodomésticos necesarios para una cómoda estancia. También disponemos de plaza de aparcamiento cercana (precio muy económico 20€/día no inclusive en precio de reserva) para los huéspedes que vengan en coche .
Interaction: Estoy disponible el máximo tiempo posible para cualquier necesidad o duda sobre su estancia en Madrid.
House Rules: Cuidado del inmueble y respeto de las normas de la comunidad de vecinos. Las puertas de entrada deben permanecer cerradas con llave de noche y al abandonar la vivienda. Televisión y música debe estar s un volumen adecuado a partir de las 23h para no molestar a los demás vecinos. No se permite fumar en todo el edificio ni dentro de la vivienda. La basura se deposita diariamente en el cuarto destinado para ello junto el ascensor. Mantener especial cuidado con cerrar bien las puertas del ascensor una vez utilizado. Las luces y aire acondicionado debe apagarse al salir del inmueble. La casa solo puede estar habitada por las personas que aparezcan en la reserva , en el caso de ampliar los huéspedes debe ser inmediatamente comunicado a la anfitriona. El incumplimiento de las normas o mal uso de las instalaciones provocará el desalojo de la vivienda sin posibilidad de reembolso alguno. Muchas gracias por cuidar mi casa!! Tu casa!!!
Host About: Soy Lara Nieto, madrileña de nacimiento. Trabajo en mi propia empresa y eso me hace feliz y estar creando ilusión permanentemente. Me apasiona el deporte y disfrutar cada momento. Viajo siempre que puedo y cuando no puedo compartir mi apartamento me permite conocer personas de otros lugares. Deseo que vuestra estancia en Madrid sea lo más agradable posible. Os espero!!! De Madrid al Cielo!!!!

Name: Room in centre, ideal for families and kids
Summary: Twin bed private room in spacious period apartment with fantastic views. Option of additional mattress and/or crib. Located in historic central Madrid, the accommodation is ideal for families, those with young children, or anyone simply wanting to enjoy this spectacular location.
Space: The ancient building is located in the emblematic neighbourhood of Madrid de los Austrias. With magnificient views, it is a spacious and bright appartment, recently reformed, with three balconies to the street. The room is quiet, bright and cozy. It has a table, book shelf, two wardrobes and the possibility of installing a baby bed or a supplementary mattress. Beds can be placed together, or sepparated, as you wish (see pictures). Guests use their own toilet located next to the room.
Description: Twin bed private room in spacious period apartment with fantastic views. Option of additional mattress and/or crib. Located in historic central Madrid, the accommodation is ideal for families, those with young children, or anyone simply wanting to enjoy this spectacular location. The ancient building is located in the emblematic neighbourhood of Madrid de los Austrias. With magnificient views, it is a spacious and bright appartment, recently reformed, with three balconies to the street. The room is quiet, bright and cozy. It has a table, book shelf, two wardrobes and the possibility of installing a baby bed or a supplementary mattress. Beds can be placed together, or sepparated, as you wish (see pictures). Guests use their own toilet located next to the room. The house has all facilities for little kids: play room, kitchen tools, high chair, crib, baby buggy, car chair, etc.  You can use all common areas, using whenever you need the kitchen, laundry room, playing room and living rooms.
Neighborhood Overview: In the center of Madrid de los Austrias, the area is full of life on streets, cafes and restaurants -Royal Palace, Plaza Mayor, Ópera, Puerta del Sol.-  With plenty of places to enjoy with kids outdoor, parks, terraces, pedestrian streets, and indoor (child friendly library, museums, theater for kids, etc). This neighbourhood is strategically located between la Latina, las Letras and Malasaña, and also very near the river and the big green area of Casa de Campo.
Notes: The add is particularly addressed to people travelling with little kids, as they will feel at home with all facilities at hand. We are a family home, with little children. Parties are not allowed. Smoking is permited only in balconies. Pets are welcome, but you should ust ask first.
Transit: The appartment is located five minutes foot distance from Opera underground and ten to Puerta del Sol. There is an electric bycicles point nearby and several bus stops.
Access: The house has all facilities for little kids: play room, kitchen tools, high chair, crib, baby buggy, car chair, etc.  You can use all common areas, using whenever you need the kitchen, laundry room, playing room and living rooms. You can also use the bicycle, with a baby chair.
Interaction: I am available, if you wish, to offer information and recommedations, particularly regarding places to enjoy with family, child-friendly restaurants, etc. If you bring your children, I can look after their sleep, like I do with my own, while you go out for dinner. I would call you in case they woke up. Our kids are also glad to share their dinner with child guests.
House Rules: Parties are not allowed. Please, be discrete and silent, above all during nights. You can smoke, but only outside in balconies, while enjoying the views! If you want to bring your pet, you probably can, but do confirm first!

The fully equipped, eminently practical kitchen is by the entrance next to the living room. After the living room is a corridor to the three bedrooms, which can each sleep two people. The first two look out over a bright inner courtyard and have a cutting-edge-design truckle bed that can either be left as a single bed or opened up to form a bunk bed — a safe, comfortable solution. Neighborhood Overview: Located in Chamberí, one of Madrid’s most traditional and popular neighbourhoods, this apartment is in a recently renovated old building that combines top quality and utmost sophistication. The minute you walk through the door of the building you will thrill at the decoration: meticulous attention has been paid to every last detail and it strikes a perfect balance between conserving the old and incorporating new technologies. The entrance hall leads to a flight of stairs and a new lift decorated with elegant lined wallpaper. The building is fitted with a handy magnetic-key system, offering the same security as a hotel.
Transit: It is calm, quite zone and you don’t have to spend so many time to get to some touristic, cultural or centric zone because it is so close to Plaza Mayor, streets like Cava Baja, Cava Alta, Arenal, Calle Mayor, etc… where you can enjoy of bars, shops. The easy access to our apartments, concretely this one, makes them an easy option to stay in Madrid for several days. 5 minutes walking is all you are going to spend to get to the very center of Madrid, so public transport is not going to be an option! There is public transport so close to the apartment. Bus, underground and taxi.

House Rules: Checkin is done at the apartment. Late checkin (after 21.00 hours) has a surcharge of 30 euros. No parties allowed at any part of the accommodation. Noises and volume must be controlled from 22:00 to 10:00 because all the accommodations are placed in normal neighborhoods so the rest of the people could be bothered. There are not more beds than the announced ones. The cribs are only available under petition. Smoking is not allowed. Pets are not allowed. We hope guests are polite and know how to behave. When checking out, please leave the keys on the table and take out the rubbish, if there is any generated on your stay, to the containers located out of the building.

Neighborhood Overview: Bares, muchos bares, tiendas vintage, librerías, restaurantes de los más diversos orígenes, mercadillos e historia, definen al barrio de Malasaña, el cual tiene mucho que ofrecer y que fue nada más y nada menos, que el ícono de la mítica movida española en los años 70-80, donde bares como el Penta y Vía Láctea guardan gran parte de la historia contemporánea de la hermosa Malasaña. A este barrio lo limitan las calles de Princesa, Gran Vía, Fuencarral, Carranza y Alberto Aguilera. 1.- Su nombre: a lo largo de su historia, esta zona de Madrid ha tenido distintas denominaciones, la primera de ellas fue el Barrio de Maravillas, que era el nombre que se le daba a un convento de monjas carmelitas, el cual se encontraba entre la calle de la Palma y San Pedro. A su vez, el convento tomaba el nombre de una imagen de la Virgen María venerada en su iglesia. Fue en el año 1980 que se le comienza a conocer como Barrio Malasaña, y que a su vez es el nombre de una de sus calles.
Notes: Prohibido fumar No se admiten mascotas No se admiten fiestas o eventos No adecuado para bebés (de 0 a 2 años) Horario de llegada: de las 16:00 a las 00:00. 1. Ser cuidadoso con el mobiliario y mantener la limpieza. 2. Limpieza de los propios utensilios de cocina (no lavavajillas). 3. Ser responsable en el consumo de los productos y comida comunes. 4. No está permitido fumar en casa. 5. Cerrar la puerta de casa de un tirón al salir. Se cuidadoso con las llaves, si las pierdes, deberás pagarlas. 6. Check in a partir de las 15.00 pm y hasta las 12.00 y check out antes de las 12.00 pm. Después de las 10.00 se cobrará 20 euros por el tiempo de espera. 7. Silencio en horario nocturno: desde las 11PM hasta las 8AM aprox. No está permitido ducharse más tarde de las 11/12pm, y debe evitarse hacer ruidos en general. 8. No está permitido traer a casa personas ajenas a la reserva.
Transit: Taxi, a pie, Metro Noviciado, Metro Tribunal, Parada de Bus San Bernardo

Neighborhood Overview: Este barrio además de estar muy cercano al centro, tiene sus propias atracciones. El barrio en sí es de interés cultural y arquitectónico radicando en la extraordinaria abundancia de edificios modernistas, neogóticos y neomudéjares. Los Teatros del Canal son un centro de artes escénicas en el que puedes encontrar conciertos, obras de teatro, flamenco, ópera, zarzuela, danza,musicales, entre otras muchas actividades. La antigua estación de Chamberí es un proyecto del Metro de Madrid para dar a conocer mejor el suburbano de la ciudad. También puede disfrutar del Museo Sorolla.  A unos pasos se encuentra El Parque del Canal y también las instalaciones de Vallehermoso, donde cuenta con piscina exterior y piscina climatizada, pistas de pádel, golf y pista de atletismo.  En gastronomía actualmente Chamberí cuenta con un sinfín de restaurantes de las más diversas variedades gastronómicas a los que podemos añadir gastromercados temporales, mercados de abastos y escuelas de cocina.
Notes: Dispone de varias estaciones de metro cercanas como son Iglesia y Alonso Cano; y esto además facilita a nuestros huéspedes poder acceder a todas las zonas de la ciudad, y llegar en breves minutos en el centro.

El check-out de salida es a las 10:00 a.m. Es posible check-in flexible y check-out si el apartamento está disponible e informar con antelación. Check-in después de las 21:00 horas y la salida después de 10 a.m. Se considera como algo especial y tiene una pequeña cuota. Por favor pregunte. Si necesita una cuna por favor hágamelo saber. Space: Este apartamento ha sido recientemente renovado y goza de una de las vistas más impresionantes de Madrid que hayamos visto. Situado en una zona residencial y tranquila pero tan centrico que usted estará en la Gran Vía o en la Plaza de España en menos de 5 minutos a pie. Host About:
Mi nombre es Ayoze. Nombre que debo a uno de los últimos reyes aborígenes de Canarias, lugar de donde procedo.

Mi pasión por la hospitalidad comenzó cuando empecé a trabajar gestionando apartamentos mientras terminaba la carrera de Bellas Artes, especializándome en transferencias culturales.

Encontré en mi trabajo una manera de disfrutar de las personas que venían con curiosidad a disfrutar de la ciudad donde yo vivía.

Han pasado muchos años y ahora dirijo una pequeña agencia de alquiler vacacional en Chueca. Uno de los barrios más céntricos de Madrid. 

Me considero una persona con muchas metas, y entre ellas, que mis huéspedes obtengan mucho más que una estancia.

Name: MALASAÑA: Singular & spacious flat close Gran Via
Summary: Spacious and comfortable apartment located in the lively and trendy district of Malasaña, the historical quarter of the historical Spanish Movida, tapas bars and trendy boutiques 15 minutes walking from Plaza Mayor, Royal Palace, Cathedral. Available up for six people, it has a spacious living room, two bedrooms, two bathrooms and a toilet, and big kitchen. Ideal for families, couples and friends who want to enjoy a few days relaxing in the heart of Madrid and in a privileged and trendy area.
Space: Spacious apartment of 100 sq meters on the third floor with no elevator. The flat is distributed as follows: - Large kitchen open to the living room, spacious and comfortable with a dining table. With 2 balconies with views to a nice street. - The lightful master bedroom has an XL bed (160 cm) and in suite bathroom (sink and shower). - The second bedroom has a 140 cms bed. - Fully equipped kitchen: hob, washer, dishwasher, oven and all the necessary utensils for cooking. - The second bathroom has a shower and sink. - There is one toilet in the hallway of the rooms. You will enjoy a great stay !!

Neighborhood Overview: The neighborhood of Malasaña has become one of the most attractive areas of Madrid by joining its traditional home-like appearance with the bustle of the walkers and the diversity of its cultural and commercial life. A few meters from the apartment you will find supermarkets, food shops, numerous fashion shops, bookshops, art galleries and the most varied restaurant offerings, open-air terraces, tapas bars, pubs and open-air cafeterias at an ample schedule. Madrid's iconic landmarks such as Callao Square, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Palacio de Oriente or 'Madrid de los Austrias' will also be easily accessible with a short walk.
Notes: If it is possible we are flexible with checkin and checkout time, if not we will try to find a solution. If you need we can order a taxi for you.
Transit: You´ ll be in the middle of the city, so no need for taxis or public transport. You´ ll be able to walk almost everywere. It is just a 5 minute walk to Chueca, Gran Via, Retiro Gardens, museums, the Royal Palace... If you´re flying, you can conveniently arrive by subway line 10 (Tribunal) from the airport. And you have Noviciado station in line 2. If you´are travelling by car, there are several parking facilities nearby
Access: The apartment is completely clean and provided with sheets and towels, fully equipped kitchen (washing machine, refrigerator, dishwasher). Bed linen and towels are from a laundry service: 4* hotel quality. Bathroom: hair dryer, shower gel. Wireless Internet Access / Wifi Heating. Air conditioning

We provide a human touch and share local things to enjoy.

Host About:
I was born and raised in Canada, though both my parents are Spanish.  
In 1990 I moved to Barcelona and since 1992 I've been living in Madrid.
I have 2 daughters, a black labrador Indie, worked in theatre for many years and for the past 9 years I direct my children's events company. 
As well for over 15 years, both my mother Beni and I have owned and run our own hostels in Chueca.
We both get great sastisfaction making our guests feel "at home away from home". 
We speak English, French and Spanish.

Access: Dear guest, Be sure I will always do my best in order to be the very best host ever, trying to make you feel at home, answering as many questions and doubts as you might have (regarding Madrid, Spain or any other thing) and trying to help you in any difficult issues you might have during your stay in Madrid... House Rules: - Las normas de comportamiento son en beneficio de la vivienda y de la convivencia con los vecinos, y su incumplimiento otorgará al anfitrión la facultad la rescisión del contrato y el abandono inmediato de la vivienda por parte de los huéspedes. El anfitrión podrá solicitar una indemnización por los daños y perjuicios ocasionados. - Las horas de descanso son de 22:00 P.M. a 10:00 A.M. La música alta, las fiestas y los eventos están prohibidos. Apreciaremos en gran medida su colaboración. Estas normas son necesarias, ya que el apartamento se encuentra situada en un edificio residencial, donde viven personas que deben madrugar para trabajar, y el descanso de los vecinos debe ser respetado. - En el momento de hacer el check-in, anfitrión y huésped firmarán un sencillo contrato de arrendamiento de apartamento vacacional.
Host About:
Dear guest,

Better than telling you in detail about me, I would beg you please to have a look at several of my wonderful 5 stars, 398 Airbnb evaluations as Super Host I am so happy and proud of, since I first started hosting in October 2014 :)

Be sure I always give my very best, in order to be a fantastic host with every single guest. And I also do my very best, in order to make all of you feel comfortable and at home! ;)

I wish my tips will help you to enjoy a great time in Madrid and to get in love with my city :)

And my wish will not just be becoming your very best host ever, but also becoming your FRIEND :)

On the other side, to know me a little bit better, you can also have a look at my Couch Surf profile (Fernando García Tesón, in Madrid), with my wonderful 83 References and my 131 Friends :) 

What can I say about myself?? I love travelling and always meeting new friends, nice people... discovering new places and interesting cultures throughout the world!!! ;)

I've already been in more than 50 countries, but I would like to know the whole world!!!!! It enriches you so much as a person to know so many places, countries, people, cultures... 

I could be travelling the whole year... But not that kind of holidays in 5 stars resorts!!! Because it's too artificial!! and there you´ll never know the real culture and customs of the places you visit and the people you meet. And what I really love is meeting good friends all over the world :)

See you soon, my dear guest and friend!! :)
-------------------------------------------------
Dear guest,

If you want to enjoy the City Center, while being hosted in the best and most exclusive district of Madrid, my apartment is the perfect place for you :)

You will for sure be very happy to have chosen me to be your host!

Welcome home, my friend :)

P.D.: For those of you wanting to join a Master in IE Business School, I want you to know I have already hosted MANY IE students since October 2014 and all the experiences have been simply great!!  My apartment is about 7 minutes walking to IE Business School :)

Relatively close to Reina Sofía, Prado, and Thyssen-Bornemisza museums (you can walk). Maximum occupation is 6 persons. The three rooms, the living-room, and the kitchen, all have external windows so the apartment is very luminous.  It is located on a third floor. No elevator, although the stairway is wide and confortable.

Notes: Check-in time is at 15:00 and check-out is at 12:00. We will do our best to be flexible and accommodate to your check-in/out times, unless we have another guest arriving the same day you leave. If you are interested in rents for a different number of days than offered please inquire in the contact section. We respond very quickly to any inquire!

Access: American kitchen fully fitted with ultimate-generation appliances: traditional oven, microwave oven, dishwasher, and laundry washing machine. Towels, bed linen, dishes, cutlery, basic cookware and all needed basics for your stay are included. The apartment has one bathroom. It has just been renovated and is in impeccable conditions. Has heating and air-conditioning. The published rent fee includes all services: electricity, Wi-Fi, and TV.
Interaction: We provide a boiler and "espresso" coffee-machine, so you can enjoy tea and coffee as soon as you enter the apartment. As an extended courtesy to our guests, we offer a complimentary bottle of Cava (the famous traditional Spanish sparkling wine which you will find chilled in the fridge), a bottle of mineral water and orange juice for all rentals of five days or longer.
House Rules: El barrio es estrictamente residencial, por lo que no se permiten fiestas ni actividades ruidosas a altas horas de la noche. Este aspecto es muy importante y debe evitarse causar molestias a los vecinos.  Puede fumar cerca de las ventanas. No se admiten mascotas. Al entrar le será entregado un inventario escrito del apartamento y un manual de funcionamiento para su comodidad. El huésped debe cubrir cualquier daño o ítem faltante según este inventario. ¡Esperamos poder servirle pronto!

Host About:
Hola a todo@s,

Estoy deseando acogeros en esta magnífica ciudad que es Madrid ; )

Me encanta viajar, la cultura y Madrid, así que si quereis orientación os la ofreceré encantada. 

Disfruto conociendo otros países, he viajado mucho! ; )  Me encanta leer, mi libro favorito es Pedro Paramo. Mi mejor película es 2046. Cualquier museo de arte moderno o clásico es bienvenido; pero el Tate Modern de Londres es de los que más me gustó.  

Me parece que la vida es corta, pero puede ser muy ancha ; )

Notes: El Escondrijo es una pequeña joya amueblada con mucho amor, sólo queremos que Usted/Ustedes disfrute/en de la estancia y que el respeto y la atención vayan por delante. Es importante leer, comprender y practicar estos puntos: 1. En caso de que salga en la terraza, nunca se olvide de enrollar el toldo con el mando a distancia y desenchufar el calentador de infrarrojos. 2. La lluvia en Madrid es a veces repentina y violenta así que ... llévese un paraguas y verifique que las ventanas del Escondrijo estén correctamente cerradas. Al salir y durante la noche, cierre completamente la ventana de la terraza con el fin de evitar cualquier entrada de agua cuando llueve. 3. Cuarto de baño: siempre cierre las cortinas cuando se ducha para evitar que el agua salga del plato de la ducha. 4. Sistema digital de inducción de la cocina: en caso de que la utilice, no coloque nada sobre la base para evitar que se dañe. 5. Electricidad y Seguridad: El Escondrijo tiene mucha luz natural! Ayúdame a ahorrar e
Transit: A pie o transporte público
Access: Por la característica de alojamiento y las buenas relaciones con los vecinos no está permitido organizar fiestas en el apartamento. Muchos local del Barrio donde se encuentra el Escondrijo y todos los barrios adyacentes (Las Letras, La Latina, Malasaña, Chueca, etc.) ofrecen diversas opciones en este sentido. La terraza es un buen espacio para relajarse, incluso en la noche, sin embargo después de cierto tiempo hay que respetar el descanso de los vecinos. En el apartamento no se puede recibir amigos o conocidos por la noche, si esto no se comunica explícitamente a mí mismo.
Interaction: Este es el comentario de nuestro primer invitado: "No podía pedir mejor anfitrión! Se comunicó con nosotros y nos dio la bienvenida con gusto. Pasó un poco de tiempo con nosotros para asegurarse de que estabamos orientados, nos dejó con un precioso mapa dibujado a mano, y en general nos hizo sentir como en casa. Una gran experiencia con un anfitrión que ama la ciudad en la que vive y quiere compartirla"
House Rules: The Escondrijo (The Peaceful Hideout) is a little jewel furnished with much Love, we just want you to enjoy the stay and that respect and care go ahead. It is important to read, understand and practice these points: 1. Respect the silence of the neighbors and guests. Do not make unnecessary noise or keep the music volume up because the walls are not soundproof. The penthouse is called "Peaceful hideout" and this is the philosophy of those who stay. For the characteristic of the penthouse and good relations with neighbors is not allowed to organize parties in the apartment. Many local of the Barrio where is located the Escondrijo and all adjacent neighborhoods (Las Letras, La Latina, Malasana, Chueca etc.) offer various options in this regard. Ask me for suggestions! The terrace is a good place to relax, even at night, but after a while you have to respect the rest of the neighbors. In the apartment you can not receive friends or acquaintances at night, if this is not explicitly communi
Host About:
Hi everybody.
My name is Paolo (a.k.a. Epaul)
I am currently living in a little cosy attic in the center of Madrid. In my peaceful hideout there are people from all continents.
I'm Italian and I currently work as assistant chef in a bar bistro in the Malasaña district. I am also a professional voice actor. In the past I worked as a musician and have performed in recent years with my group in Europe. I have many interests, amongst them, the alchemical homeopathy (spagyric therapies), the olistic wellness in general and ... the languages. Now I am studying Chinese because Oriental culture has always attracted me a lot.
When I came for chance in Madrid 8 years ago I felt deeply and hopelessly in love with this city. After a short period where I wandered as a tourist to discover the hidden corners of Madrid, I decided to move here for good. Maybe I was a spanish in a past life but I can honestly say is that I suddenly found that I belonged here. To me, Madrid is a very welcoming city, with a thousand faces and cultures that intertwine and complement.
I love traveling and when I can not do it for work, I like to open my little attic to travelers, show them the city and give them advice so they can enjoy their stay.
Buona vita!
Paolo

Mi nombre es Paolo (Apodo: epaul)
Vivo en un pequeño y acogedor ático en el centro de Madrid. En mi tranquilo escondite, pasan personas de todos los continentes.
Soy italiano y actualmente trabajo como ayudante de cocina en un restaurante bar en Malasaña. También soy un locutor de voz. En el pasado, he trabajado como músico y hice varios conciertos con mi banda en Europa. Tengo muchos intereses, entre ellos la homeopatía alquímica (terapias spagyricas), el bienestar holístico en general y .... los idiomas. Ahora estoy estudiando chino, porque la cultura oriental siempre me ha atraido mucho.
Hace 8 años, cuando llegué en Madrid por azar, me sentí profundamente y desesperadamente enamorado de esta ciudad. Después de un corto período cuando me deleitaba andar como turista a descubrir los rincones escondidos de Madrid, decidí venir a vivir aquí para siempre. Tal vez yo era un español en una vida anterior, pero honestamente puedo decir que de repente me di cuenta de que pertenecía a este lugar. Para mí, Madrid es una ciudad muy amigable con mil caras y culturas que se entrelazan y complementan.
Me encanta viajar y cuando no puedo hacerlo por trabajo, quiero abrir mi pequeño ático para los viajeros, mostrarles la ciudad y darles consejos para que puedan disfrutar de su estancia.
Buona vita!
Paolo

大家好!我的名字是保罗(又名Epaul)

我是意大利人, 目前我的工作助理厨师在Malasaña地区餐厅酒吧. 我也作为播音员和配音演员。
我也是一个音乐歌手,并且我与我的乐队在欧洲演出。
最近我学习中文,因为东方文化一直吸引了我很多。我喜欢旅行,当我不能旅行的时候,我想开放我的小阁楼为旅客,
展示这个城市,并给他们提供意见,使他们能够享受他们的住宿。
有一个良好的生活!
保罗

Je m´appelle Paolo (alias Epaul)
Je vis dans un petit et confortable grenier dans le centre de Madrid. Dans ma cachette paisible il y a des gens de tous les continents.
Je suis italien et je travaille actuellement comme assistant chef dans un bistrot bar dans le quartier de Malasaña. Je suis aussi comédien de doublage professionnelle. Dans le passé, je travaillais comme musicien and je ai fait plusieurs concerts avec mon groupe en Europe. J'ai beaucoup d'intérêts, parmi eux, l'homéopathie alchimique (thérapies spagyriques), le bien-être holistique en général et ... les langues. Maintenant, je suis étudiant chinois parce que la culture orientale m'a toujours attiré beaucoup.
Il y a 8 ans, quand je suis arrivé au hasard à Madrid,  je me suis senti profondément et désespérément en amour avec cette ville. Après une courte période où je me promenais en tant que touriste pour découvrir les coins cachés de Madrid, je décide de déménager ici pour de bon. Peut-être que j'étais un espagnol dans une vie antérieure, mais je peux honnêtement dire est que je trouve tout à coup que je faisais partie ici. Pour moi, Madrid est une ville très accueillante, avec mille visages et des cultures qui entrelacent et se complètent.
J'adore voyager et quand je ne peux pas le faire pour le travail, je veux ouvrir mon petit grenier pour les voyageurs, leur montrer la ville et leur donner des conseils afin qu'ils puissent profiter de leur séjour.
Buona vita!
Paolo

Ciao a tutti.
Il mio nome è Paolo (Nick: Epaul)
Vivo in un piccolo e accogliente attico nel centro di Madrid. Nel mio rifugio tranquillo, passano persone di tutti i continenti.
Sono italiano e actualemte lavoro come aiutante cucina in un bar ristorante di Malasaña. Sono anche un annunciatore voce. In passato, ho lavorato come musicista e ha fatto diversi concerti con la mia band in Europa. Ho molti interessi, tra cui l'omeopatia spagyrica, il benessere olistico  in generale e ... le lingue. Ora sto studiando cinese, perché la cultura orientale mi ha sempre attratto molto.
8 anni fa, quando sono arrivato a Madrid per caso, mi innamorai profondamente e disperatamente di questa città. Dopo un breve periodo in cui ho fatto solo il ... turista alla scoperta degli angoli nascosti di Madrid, ho deciso di venire a vivere qui per sempre. Forse ero uno spagnolo in una vita precedente, ma posso onestamente dire che ad un certo punto mi resi conto che appartenevo a questo posto. Per me, Madrid è una cittá molto accogliente dai mille volti e le culture che si intrecciano e si completano.
Amo viaggiare e quando non lo posso fare per  lavoro, apro il mio piccolo attico per i viaggiatori e cerco di dar loro buoni consigli in modo che possano godere al massimo del loro soggiorno.
Buona vita!
Paolo

Está ubicada en el centro de Madrid, en el histórico Barrio de las Letras, lleno de restaurantes, bares agradables y los museos más importantes de la ciudad. En el barrio tienes 4 estaciones de metro (entre 2 y 8 minutos andando): Antón Martín: línea 1; Sol: líneas 1, 2 y 3; Atocha: línea 1 y Sevilla: línea 2. Neighborhood Overview: Un barrio típicamente madrileño, con mucha "solera", donde vivieron insignes escritores españoles, por lo que se conoce como El Barrio de Las Letras. Zona de vida nocturna, con innumerables bares, cafés, restaurantes, con una gran diversidad de ofertas. A poca distancia del Senado, el Museo del Prado, el Museo Reina Sofía, CaixaForum, el Real Jardín Botánico, la estación de trenes de Atocha y el Parque de El Buen Retiro.

Host About:
***Hello , My name is Federico my native language is Spanish but i can communicate perfectly in English. im from Argentina but now im living in Europe, im a well educated man , who loves travel and make new friends around the world, i hope being the best host lol, give me a try i promise you won't regret. my house is small, clean and safe. My wife is a nice person who also is here too for help whenever im at work so your not going to be alone in our house we are here for help, share, and joy. I hope that your experience is pleasant!


***  ¡HOLA! Me llamo Federico soy argentino . Soy una persona muy aventurera me encanta viajar ya eh estado en Chile , Uruguay , Portugal , Italia , Barcelona y actualmente resido en Madrid desde hace ya un par de años. Madrid me enamoró y por ahora me quiero quedar un tiempo mas por acá... Mi propósito en airbnb es poder brindar alojamiento a mochileros como yo , ya que se lo que es estar en un país o ciudad nuevo sin conocer a nadie. Soy un tipo muy cercano y amigable aunque respetuoso por encima de todo, Si buscas alojamiento en una zona céntrica y cosmopolita de Madrid vente a mi piso situado en el famoso históricamente BDLL ( Barrio de las letras ) en Huertas,  Prometo guiar y ayudar en todo lo que pueda a mis huéspedes siempre que este por casa ( y si no estoy yo esta mi mujer ¡siempre! ) , El piso es tal como se ve en las fotos, sencillo, limpio y siempre ordenado porque soy un fanatico de la limpieza jejej , Saludos y hasta pronto !

Name: Avant-garde next to the Golden Mile - Serrano III
Summary: Located in a brand new building in what is one of the most sought-after areas of Madrid, this two-bedroom apartment abundantly offers both comfort and style in what is one of the city's most exclusive and sought-after neighborhoods: Barrio Salamanca.
Space: Bright, modern and extremely spacious, this exterior-facing apartment is filled with light. The focal point of the apartment is its large and stylish living area, complete with contemporary furnishings, original artwork on the walls and large corner sofa. The large exterior windows offer views out over the nearby National Library, and the quality hardwood flooring, earth tones and splashes of bright colour give a real sense of style and modernism to this comfortable space. The kitchen is bright and modern and comes fully equipped with everything guests may need during their stay. The master bedroom is warm and welcoming, with a luxurious queen-sized bed and quality furnishings, while the second bedroom is ideal for children or guests. The apartment is housed in a building with a 24 hour concierge and a lovely interior patio. With its fabulous location and elegant and spacious interior, this beautiful apartment is perfect for anyone looking for a central base during their time in Madrid
Description: Located in a brand new building in what is one of the most sought-after areas of Madrid, this two-bedroom apartment abundantly offers both comfort and style in what is one of the city's most exclusive and sought-after neighborhoods: Barrio Salamanca. Bright, modern and extremely spacious, this exterior-facing apartment is filled with light. The focal point of the apartment is its large and stylish living area, complete with contemporary furnishings, original artwork on the walls and large corner sofa. The large exterior windows offer views out over the nearby National Library, and the quality hardwood flooring, earth tones and splashes of bright colour give a real sense of style and modernism to this comfortable space. The kitchen is bright and modern and comes fully equipped with everything guests may need during their stay. The master bedroom is warm and welcoming, with a luxurious queen-sized bed and quality furnishings, while the second bedroom is ideal for children or guests. The
Neighborhood Overview: Situated on what is known as Madrid’s “golden mile” in the exclusive barrio de Salamanca, the apartment is right between the Paseo de Recoletos and Calle Serrano. Calle Serrano is a wide, tree-lined street considered to be Madrid’s equivalent to 5th Avenue. Brimming with designer stores, upmarket boutiques and excellent cafes and restaurants, Serrano and its surrounding streets are home to some of the most exclusive shops and services in the city. The famous Parque del Bueno Retiro is also just a stone’s throw from the apartment and offers a green and tranquil respite from the hustle and bustle of the vibrant Spanish capital. The impressive Plaza de Colon and National Library are located directly opposite the apartment, and the art deco thoroughfare the Gran Via is just a short walk away.
Notes: Dependiendo de tu horario de llegada, estableceremos una hora para entregarte las llaves y explicarte lo más importante para que disfrutes del apartamento al 100%. Normalmente será a partir de las 16h, pero intentaremos adaptarnos a ti lo máximo posible. ¡Estamos a tu disposición durante toda tu estancia para lo que necesites!
Transit: The area has excellent transport links via bus, metro, train or taxi, allowing guests to explore the rest of the city and beyond with ease.
Access: Amenities: Lift, 24h Concierge, Cable Television with English Channels (“Digital+”), DVD Player, Wifi High-Speed Internet, Under Floor Heating, Central Air Conditioning, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Washing Machine, Dryer, Oven, Microwave.
Interaction: We will arrange the check in time depending on your arrival time. It is normally from 4pm but we will do our best to have the apartment ready for you ASAP. Anything you need during your stay, feel free to contact us! We are happy to help!
House Rules: Arrivals after 21:00 may be subject to an extra charge. Remember to let us know your arrival time in advance! *We ask our guests to sign a rental agreement upon arrival and leave details of a credit card as a further security measure. This information will be destroyed after you have left the property and we have conducted a check-out inspection*
Host About:
Spain Select was born from the recognition of a desire among travelers to live locally in a real home whilst away from their own, and yet still enjoy all of the benefits and small luxuries of a hotel stay. Not only that, though, we understood that they also wanted to be close to all of the best that their destination has to offer – to be right in the heart of it all. So we decided to source a broad range of high quality homes in the most sought after locations across the country, starting with the capital Madrid and moving over to Malaga, Valencia, and Seville. We then added a few unique flourishes that embody our brand of service and our values. Our interior design team works to extract and enhance the natural charm from each space and make it a warm home. Our very own in-house Local Ambassadors are posted in each destination to welcome each guest home and bed them in to the neighborhood when they first arrive. Finally, a selection of hotel-like services – including a 24-hour concierge for everything from show tickets to new sheets – and a motorized maintenance team completes our comprehensive customer care throughout every single stay. Every Spain Select experience is unique, yet they are all of a consistent high quality no matter when you stay with us. 

Live local, sleep royal: welcome to Spain Select.
Street: Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid 28004, Spain

Me gustaría que nuestros huéspedes disfruten al máximo durante su estancia en Madrid, así que mientras estéis aquí no dudéis en pedirme lo que os haga falta: recomendaciones de restaurantes, sugerencias de actividades, lo que sea.  No veo la hora de darles la bienve
Neighborhood Overview: El barrio es espectacular, bohemio, abierto, lleno de vida, sobretodo los fines de semana. Muy céntrico y pintoresco.  La calle donde vivo no es ruidosa, lo que permite que puedas disfrutar de tu estancia en la ciudad al máximo y luego llegar a tu refugio para descansar, cargar las pilas y desconectar.
Notes: Vivo con mi perrita Amuka, es muy buena y cariñosa.  Las mascotas siempre son bienvenidas y cada uno se hace cargo de su amigo.  Mi casa es un pequeño museo donde tengo expuesta mi colección de Pines.  Un espacio para descansar y sobre todo sentirse cómodo.
Transit: Desde aquí se puede ir caminando a muchos de los lugares turísticos de Madrid, aun así estamos muy cerca del transporte público. Las estaciones de metro más próximas son Noviciado, Tribunal y Callao (de 3 a 5 minutos andando).  Las paradas de bus más cercanas están a 3 minutos andando.  Una de las paradas de bicicletas municipales a un minuto andando.
Access: Del piso se puede disfrutar además del dormitorio, también de la cocina, el cuarto de baño y  la amplia sala de estar (solo para desayunar).  Hay conexión wifi. No veo la hora de darles la bienvenida a Madrid. Mi casa es su casa! :-D
House Rules: Desde que se aloja un huésped tiene tres llaves, la del portal, la de la vivienda y la de su habitación.  No hay toque de queda y la idea es que dentro de lo que se pueda beber o fumar se haga desde un criterio lógico sin perjudicar la esencia de la convivencia. Las mascotas siempre son bienvenidas y cada uno se hace cargo de su amigo.

Neighborhood Overview: Lavapies is a multicultural neighborhood, very near to the two main museums of the city, the modern art museum Reina Sofia and the Museum of Prado, home as well of many art galleries, cultural centers and theaters. Is a lively neighborhood with a lot of history. Everything starts in this mix of peoples and interesting places. Is a place to be discovered even when you think you already knows it.
Notes: The apartment is in an excellent location close to everything, many restaurants, bars, supermermarkets and markets around. A nice quite little secret place in Madrid center.
Transit: Public transportation is great but for getting to know the city you probably will walk all the time. All the major city attractions are a few minutes walking distance.  To move around the city here you have 2 metro lines nearby, many buses and public bicycle stops. To go a little farther you have the Atocha train station just 10 mins walking, the largest railway station of Madrid serves conmuter trains (cercanías) intercity and regional trains and the high speed train AVE. Also connected to the Barajas  airport terminal 4.
Access: I will be there to welcome you.
Interaction: We live in the neighborhood so will be easily available for our guest in case you need to contact with us.
House Rules: - Take care of our little apartment as if it were yours, whit love. - If you have an accident and break something please don't try to fix it just give us a call. - Throw the garbage when you leave. - Don't forget to wash the dishes and kitchen tools that you have use. - Sorry but parties and events are forbidden.  - Don't manipulate the heaters they are already programed for a good healthy and eco temperature of 22 celsius degrees

Be responsible with the common products provided. 4. Be careful with the keys. (if you lose it, you should pay for it) 5. Smoke outside on the balcony. 6. Check in after at 2pm and check out before 1pm 7. Silence during the night time: from 10/11pm til 8am approx.
Host About:
I am trained as an architect, 27 years old, located in Madrid for more than a year now and I love it! Such an exciting city! I am constantly on the look out for new and exciting opportunities to further develop myself and my interests.

Originally from Romania, I have studied and lived in Scotland, Brussels, Barcelona and Madrid in the past 8 years of my life. I speak English, Spanish & a bit of French (basic).

I love travelling and meeting new, interesting people everywhere I go; a great, if not the best, way to getting to know one-self and growing into a beautiful all-rounded human being. I enjoy cooking, reading, long chats over a good wine and listening to great music (live if possible). I love yoga and sushi, cycling and skiing.

Transit: The flat is just a short walk away from multiple entrances to Madrid's Metro services. The closest stations are Ibiza (that's 550 m. and 7 minutes walking according to Goo'gle Maps ... slackers...) and Sainz de Baranda (same 550 m as Ibiza .... but 6 minutes walking this time per G Maps ... the guy who did this measurement must have been fitter than the one to Ibiza station apparently). The two stations serves different lines and connections, so basically you have the entire Madrid Metro network at a 7 minutes distance (or 6 depending on your Goo'gle Maps distance measurer profile ...) A number of bus lines also stop close to the flat that can take you to the city centre (Cibeles, Puerta del Sol) and main connection points A shuttle service to the airport also stops just some 10 minutes away from the flat. The Atocha train station is also connected by bus - or less then 10 minutes away on a taxi
Access: You'll have the whole place for yourself !
House Rules: House Rule # 1 - STRICTLY NO SMOKING PLEASE House Rule # 2 - NEVER BREAK RULE # 1 !! House Rule # 3 - STRICTLY NO MORE THAN 3 PEOPLE ALLOWED Sorry but the flat's too small to accommodate more than 3  House Rule # 4 - NO KIDS UNDER 10 ALLOWED House Rule # 5 - NO PETS ALLOWED House Rule # 6 - NO PARTYING OR NOISY CELEBRATIONS ALLOWED House Rule # 7 - CHECK-IN (OUT) TIMES Check In time will depend on when the previous guest is checking out.  If the flat was empty the night before, check in can happen as early as 11.00 am. However, if the previous guest is checking out on  the same day, check in can not happen before 15.00  at the earliest. Same applies to Check Out time: if a guest is expected on the same day of checking out, check out time will be 11.00 am at the latest. Else, you can have the flat to yourself for the entire day !

Name: Amazing sunny room w Cathedral view
Summary: Luxury room with Cathedral views and besides Plaza Mayor (see map). The location is unbeatable: everything you plan to visit is within 15min walking! Quality wood materials, exclusive and genuine design details, full of light and astonishing views.
Space: The room you will have is the best room im the apartment. We are on the 4th floor of the building at No. 18 on Colegiata street. Placed actually within the historical spot "Plaza Mayor" in the center of Madrid.  This building dates from mid 19th century, eventhough, the property has a new elevator. The apartment is incredibly located for both a tourist visiting Madrid for the first time (every touristic spot is 15min around walking distance) and as well for later visits, with the full vibe and life on Centro, Huertas, Austrias, Barrio de las Letras or La Latina neighborhoods around: terraces, cozy cafés, nightlife, live music, awesome restaurants and live history.  The apartment was renovated some months ago by a experienced interior designer with many cool details. Is noteworthy in particular the livingroom, with a restored handmade pavement, and an impressive fireplace and balconies.  The room is a fourth floor with two balconies facing the Almudena cathedral and is fully equipped wi
Description: Luxury room with Cathedral views and besides Plaza Mayor (see map). The location is unbeatable: everything you plan to visit is within 15min walking! Quality wood materials, exclusive and genuine design details, full of light and astonishing views. The room you will have is the best room im the apartment. We are on the 4th floor of the building at No. 18 on Colegiata street. Placed actually within the historical spot "Plaza Mayor" in the center of Madrid.  This building dates from mid 19th century, eventhough, the property has a new elevator. The apartment is incredibly located for both a tourist visiting Madrid for the first time (every touristic spot is 15min around walking distance) and as well for later visits, with the full vibe and life on Centro, Huertas, Austrias, Barrio de las Letras or La Latina neighborhoods around: terraces, cozy cafés, nightlife, live music, awesome restaurants and live history.  The apartment was renovated some months ago by a experienced interior designe
Neighborhood Overview: About the situation, it is placed as part of Plaza Mayor itself, 10 minutes walk from the Huertas street with all its bars and 5 min of Sol square, 20 minutes walk to Chueca and near the neighborhood of Lavapiés, a cosmopolitan and vibrant is in full revival of culture and leisure. You will find several metro stations with different metro lines very close (Vodafone Sol, La Latina, Tirso de Molina) and not far from the train station of Atocha (direct line to Sol).
Notes: Beware of pick-pocketing in the metro and in very crowded areas of the center. Apart of this, Madrid is one the safest cities in the world so you can just enjoy!
Transit: "Vodafone Sol" and "La latina" are the closest metro station. Bus service is also very good and is accurately integrated on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Maps. Additionally I recommend to try a BiciMad day pass, you have several points close to the house to take one of there awesome public electric bikes.
Interaction: My brother and me we are available for anything you may need during your stay. Hector, the person in charge of cleaning and of coordinating the check-in, is as well very welcoming, and will help you in your arrival. We suggest you to contact by Airbnb application, the three of us will receive the message and answer faster. Other guests are living in the apartment and will share kitchen, the two bathrooms and the liivngroom.
House Rules: - Please be careful with the windows, specially if it is a rainy day as the floor is wooden made and can easily be damaged - The stove is fed automatically with pellet so you just need to press the "On" button and enjoy the fire. Please, for safety reasons do not open the stove door. - Pets are not welcome on the house - And finally, most of the times no necessary to tell, but please be respectful with the neighbours as we had received some complaints from previous visitors Thank you!
Host About:
Hola!
Soy un viajero y usuario frecuente de Airbnb. Lo he utilizado en todos lados y me encanta. 
Siempre intento ayudar a los huéspedes a tener una experiencia genuina en Madrid, además de ver los sitios más habituales

Neighborhood Overview: The accommodation is very well linked to the city centre by bus 53 to Puerta del Sol (the bus stop is just in front of the apartment) and the underground line 4 (the closest underground station is Avenida de la Paz and is just 10 minutes walking distance). We are also just a few underground stops from the IFEMA – Feria de Madrid (Exhibition and Congress Centre), the Juan Carlos I Park, Las Ventas, the very famous bullfighting arena and the The Santiago Bernabeu football stadium. There is free street parking in the neighborhood. We can also offer a place for 1 car in an indoor car parking with 24 hours security at €10 per day (this is located 2 minutes walking from our building).
House Rules: - Check in is from 15.00 and Check Out is at 12.00. We will offer some flexibility with the timings subject to availability. If this is not possible, we will be happy to store your belongings before the check in time or after check out - If you decide to use the kitchen facilities, we kindly ask you to clean after yourselves and leave the kitchen and all utensils as you found them. Order and cleanliness are very important to us. Please treat our home as you would treat yours - You are not allowed to bring any friends to the apartment or play loud music - Meals are not provided

A 10 minutos caminando de la estación de Atocha y con autobuses  situados en la cera de enfrente que llevan a la estación y al Parque del Retiro.  EL metro es la estación de Pacífico a dos paradas de la Atocha Renfe y a 5 de la estación de Sol. Es una zona con numerosos resturantes de todo tipo de especialidades.

House Rules: Espero respeto y buena comunicación. Por favor, tenga en cuenta que cualquier tipo de fiesta está estrictamente prohibida. Respete el descanso de los vecinos tanto en el interior como en los epacios comunes desde las 22:00h hasta las 9: 00 Por favor, apague las luces antes de salir del apartamento, no malgaste la utilización de la luz el agua y el gas. Esto ayudará a ahorrar energía a mantener las tarifas actuales y a cuidar del medio ambiente. Recuerde por favor, cerrar la puerta de acceso al apartamento con llave cada vez que salga a la calle. Muchas gracias y disfrutar de la estancia
Host About:
Soy agente literaria. Mi profesión me entusiasma y consiste en hacer de intermediario entre el autor que escribe un libro y el editor que lo publica. buscar el editor mas apropiado para una obra y negociar con el las condiciones del contrato. 
Es un trabajo apasionante. 
Mis gustos aparte de la literatura, la filosofía y el arte son la jardinería, el cine, pasear y hablar con los amigos.
Disfruto de lo que la vida me ofrece y le saco el mejor partido posible.

Name: Tu hogar en Lavapíes
Summary: Estudio en el centro de Madrid a un paso de todas las atracciones de la ciudad.
Space: Estudio en pleno centro de Madrid. El estudio de 28 m2 es muy luminoso y está reformado. Es un espacio abierto pero muy bien distribuido en dos ambientes y cuarto de baño. Tiene un balcón exterior con compuertas de madera. El estudio, tiene unas vigas de madera y tarima flotante que le dan mucha calidez y lo hacen muy especial. Es muy coqueto, cómodo, y tiene conexión Wi-Fi gratuita, aire acondicionado y TV de pantalla plana. La cocina está totalmente equipada con microondas, vitrocerámica eléctrica, nevera, lavadora y utensilios necesarios. El baño, aunque es muy pequeño, tiene todo lo necesario e incluye secador de pelo con jabones y gel de ducha. El estudio es ideal para 2 personas. El estudio es exterior y se encuentra en una corrala de Lavapíes. Las corralas, o casa de corredor, son edificios populares muy típicos de Madrid.

Neighborhood Overview: El barrio de Lavapiés es uno de los más céntricos, antiguos y auténticos de Madrid. En Lavapíes encontraras lo más castizo y lo más exótico del mundo. Aquí tenemos de todo: centros de arte y culturales como La Tabacalera o la Casa Encendida; teatros, restaurantes de todos los países y tabernas de toda la vida; bares de tapas o de copas; mercados, el Rastro, tablaos flamencos como Casa Patas o cines en V.O.S como los Ideal. En Lavapíes encontrarás sobretodo mucha vida de todos los colores y formas.
Transit: Las estaciones de metro mas cercanas son Lavapiés (Linea 3) y Antón Martín (Linea 1) pero puedes ir paseando al mismo centro de Madrid, la Puerta del Sol está a sólo 5 minutos.  A 10 minutos caminando encontrarás también los principales museos de la ciudad (Prado, Reina Sofía y Thyssen-Bornemisza), la Gran Vía o el Rastro y el barrio de La Latina. La estación de Atocha está a 12 minutos andando y ahí podrás tomar trenes de cercanías o alta velocidad para tu próximo destino.
Interaction: Me encuentro a una calle de allí, con una llamada o mensaje de (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), puedo gestionar tus dudas o solucionar lo que desees. Puedo hacerte de guía el primer día de llegada para mostrarte todo lo que tienes alrededor que pueda interesarte y lugares como tiendas de comida con calidad que puedas necesitar. También puedo ayudarte a reservar eventos de teatro u otras cosas.
House Rules: Respetar el descanso de los vecinos y tratar la casa como si fuera tuya. No se admiten mascotas de ningún tipo.

House Rules: La estancia mínima es de tres noches. Para garantizar el cuidado y el uso respetuoso del apartamento por parte de nuestros clientes, airbnb te pedirá una fianza de garantía, que será devuelta al día siguiente de tu salida por airbnb, si el apartamento se encuentra sin daños.  La cantidad de la fianza, que aparece en la página de reserva, es de 300 euros.. Esta cantidad se usará como garantía de pago de los desperfectos que puedan producirse y que sean responsabilidad del huésped. La entrada en el apartamento se realizará siempre después de las 15.00 h. Si llegas después de las 20.00 h tendrías que pagar un recargo de 40 euros. La hora límite de entrada son las 00:00.  El último día de tu estancia la hora máxima de salida son las 11.00 h. Si necesitas entrar más temprano de las 15.00 h. o te gustaría salir más tarde de las 11.00 h, infórmanos antes de tu llegada y haremos todo lo posible para atender tus deseos siempre y cuando la propiedad no esté alquilada durante esos días a otro hué
Host About:
Living in a city is much more than just going there. One also has to get the feel of the city, visit its locations and feel like another local. At Rentapartmagazine our aim is to turn you, during your stay with us, into an honoured visitor of the city where we were born and that we know.

We like enjoying comfort and conveniences, like you do, and we hope that your stay will feel just like being at home. A home from home.

Our names are Antonia, Miguel Ángel, Alberto… And we want you to see the city through our eyes. With the same fascination that we feel.

Welcome to our city. Welcome to Madrid..
