Host About:
Hola! Soy Francesa y soy nutricionista en Madrid. Me encanta descubrir los platos tipicos en los paises a los que viajo y el tapeo en España.
No puedo vivir sin el deporte y siempre tengo que estar activa en mi dia a dia. Otra de las cosas sin las que podria vivir es mi familia y mis amigos, por eso viajo a menudo.

Mi forma de definir la vida es que todo se vive mejor al sol, los momentos felices como los problemas, y la vida consiste en conocer a gente maravillosa y descubrir el mundo, que hay tanto que descubrir!

Neighborhood Overview: Cuatro Caminos is an administrative district of Madrid belonging to the district of Tetuán and located in the northwest area of the city. It receives the name of the roundabout of Cuatro Caminos, important knot of Madrid communications. The limits of the neighborhood are, to the south, Raimundo Fernández Villaverde Street, to the north with General Yagüe Street, which separates it from the neighborhood of Castillejos; to the west with the street Bravo Murillo and to the east with Paseo de la Castellana. To the southeast of the neighborhood is one of the economic centers of Madrid, AZCA.
Transit: The Nuevos Ministerios station at the south-east end (with the C-1, C-2, C-3, C-4, C-7, C-8 and C-10 train lines) At the door is the metro station Estrecho, line 1, with which you can reach the center in 15 minutes. In Glorieta de Cuatro Caminos, 10 minutes on foot or 2 subway stations, there are numerous bus lines that run through the city.
Access: Located on the third floor of a building with elevator. Guests can have a kitchen equipped with washing machine, toaster, coffee maker, kettle and all necessary utensils; a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

Name: PLAZA MAYOR VI, Friendly Rentals
Summary: A large, well-equipped apartment that can sleep 10. It has five separate bedrooms and two full bathrooms, one with a shower and one with a bathtub.
Space: A large, well-equipped apartment that can sleep 10. It has five separate bedrooms and two full bathrooms, one with a shower and one with a bathtub. This bright 150 m2 apartment has a relaxing atmosphere. It has white walls, renovated old parquet floors and a small terrace with a great orientation for sunbathing. The bright 1950s-inspired decor strikes the perfect note to create a welcoming feel. The large hall leads to the living-dining room, where there is a large window that leads to the terrace and a door to a twin bedroom. A long corridor leads to three bedrooms: two doubles (one, with a 1.6 m bed, larger than the other) and a twin. The modern, fully equipped kitchen is decorated in red. You need to cross the kitchen to reach the final double bedroom and small bathroom. The apartment is on the fourth floor of a building with lift reached through a small shopping gallery. It has Internet and partial air conditioning in summer.

No parties allowed at any part of the accommodation. Noises and volume must be controlled from 22:00 to 10:00 because all the accommodations are placed in normal neighborhoods so the rest of the people could be bothered. There are not more beds than the announced ones. The cribs are only available under petition. Smoking is not allowed. Pets are not allowed. We hope guests are polite and know how to behave. When checking out, please leave the keys on the table and take out the rubbish, if there is any generated on your stay, to the containers located out of the building.

Neighborhood Overview: It is certainly the most charming neighborhood of Madrid. A neighborhood full of culture, where lived the most important writers of this country and where , today , culture is still of great importance . The house is located next to the Royal Theatre and the Plaza Santa Ana , one of the best places to enjoy eating on a terrace. Besides the street Huertas, it is two minutes walk and you will find lots options. You have several supermarkets in the area , and shops open until late at night.
Transit: The area is well-connected to the rest of the city . Normally for exploring the center is best to walk , you do not really need or subway or bus unless you do not like walking. Summary: Located in the attractive district of Justicia, this apartment comfortably accommodates up to four people. It is located near Chueca, one of the most unique and picturesque areas of Madrid. Overall, it is an area that is full of life, no matter what time of the day it is. The famous Gran Vía Street, known by many as the Spanish Broadway, offers a wide array of attractions, located right in the heart of the city. Access: Surface: 52 m2. First floor. The living room is furnished with a three-seater sofa bed (1,50m x 2,00m), a coffee table, an armchair, a standing lamp and a flat screen TV mounted on the wall. The kitchen is part of an open-plan living room and comes with a breakfast bar with three stools. In addition, it is fully equipped. The bedroom is fitted with a king size bed (1,50m x 2,00m), two bedside tables, two lamps and built-in closets. The bathroom comes with a walk-in shower. Interaction: We will arrange the check in time depending on your arrival time. It is normally from 4pm but we will do our best to have the apartment ready for you ASAP. Anything you need during your stay, feel free to contact us! We are happy to help!
Host About:
Spain Select was born from the recognition of a desire among travelers to live locally in a real home whilst away from their own, and yet still enjoy all of the benefits and small luxuries of a hotel stay. Not only that, though, we understood that they also wanted to be close to all of the best that their destination has to offer – to be right in the heart of it all. So we decided to source a broad range of high quality homes in the most sought after locations across the country, starting with the capital Madrid and moving over to Malaga, Valencia, and Seville. We then added a few unique flourishes that embody our brand of service and our values. Our interior design team works to extract and enhance the natural charm from each space and make it a warm home. Our very own in-house Local Ambassadors are posted in each destination to welcome each guest home and bed them in to the neighborhood when they first arrive. Finally, a selection of hotel-like services – including a 24-hour concierge for everything from show tickets to new sheets – and a motorized maintenance team completes our comprehensive customer care throughout every single stay. Every Spain Select experience is unique, yet they are all of a consistent high quality no matter when you stay with us. 

Live local, sleep royal: welcome to Spain Select.

Neighborhood Overview: La Latina is synonymous with going out, good food and drinks in Madrid. The two main streets where most of the locals are located are the Cava Alta and the Cava Baja, the location of the mythical Casa Lucio, famous for its plate "huevos estrellados". I would recommend you visit and try the food as well the Mercado San Miguel in Calle Mayor or even the Mercado de San Anton in the popular barrio de Chueca. You will also find cocktail bars and a live music club to go out in the evening.

Carlos is a young entrepeneur who decided to dedicate his time to something that he loves. This being receiving guests in his lovely and modern apartments in the city that he loves and worship: Madrid. 

Carlos was born in La Mancha, Spain and has been living since being a teenager in the city of Madrid. 

Ha has worked in other areas before starting his own business. Carlos has had experience as a construction manager heading big work groups what gives him a good understanding of human relations.

In addition his passion for people has led him recently to start a new project in front of a new radio, (URL HIDDEN)

Host About:
Soy brasileño de nacimiento, pero he pasado los últimos años entre Portugal y España, donde vivo actualmente por trabajo.
Trabajo en la TV, y por eso viajo muchísimo y pocas veces estoy largas temporadas en casa. 
Soy una persona muy sociable y divertida; me gusta conocer gente nueva y no parar de aprender cosas nuevas. Tanto es así, que me llevo de maravilla con mi vecina, que me da clases de español. Seguramente será ella la que os atienda, porque es probable que yo esté de viaje por algún sitio del mundo cuando vengáis! 
Espero que disfrutéis de la casa tanto como yo cuando tengo oportunidad ;)

El apartamento consta de un salón comedor y cocina americana, una habitación, un cuarto de baño y una terraza con vistas al Retiro de Madrid. Durante la estancia, si tienen alguna duda, pueden consultarla a Susana, que vive en el piso bajo, del mismo edificio.  Esta persona será la encargada de dar las llaves, coger la fianza y devolverla cuando se abandona el apartamento. Neighborhood Overview: El apartamento se encuentra enfrente de los Jardines del Retiro, por lo que es muy recomendable visitar el Retiro, disfrutando de sus jardines y paseos. Además se encuentran cerca lugares de culto como la Basílica de Atocha y Los Jerónimos. Otros lugares interesante para visitar es el Panteón de Hombres Ilustres, donde se encuentran enterrados, personajes de relevancia en la historia española, como Azaña..., también muy cerca del alojamiento se encuentra La Real Fabrica de Tapices, donde se pueden admirar como se trabaja artesanalmente en telares del siglo XVIII. Además, a unos escasos aproximados 5 minutos andando, está la estación de Atocha, el Museo Reina Sofía, Museo Etnológico, Museo del Prado, Jardín Botánico, Museo Thyseen. Dando lugar a pasar una estancia inmejorable.
Notes: Aunque el Check In y entrega de llaves, se hace de 14:00 h a 18:00 h, agradeceríamos que nos avisarán de la hora de llegada aproximada al alojamiento, y de ésta forma, para poderles atender mejor.
Transit: El principal punto de transporte, donde además encontraras, tanto metro, como renfe, autobus o parada de taxi, está en la estación de Atocha Renfe, que se encuentra a unos 800 metros aproximadamente. Pero aún así tienes parada de autobús a unos escasos 300 metros aproximadamente y ahora también dispones de alquiler de bicicletas eléctricas y de coches eléctricos en las proximidades cercanas.
Access: El apartamento consta de un salón comedor y cocina americana, una habitación, un cuarto de baño y una terraza con vistas al Retiro de Madrid.
Interaction: Durante la estancia, si tienen alguna duda, pueden consultarla a Susana, que vive en el piso bajo, del mismo edificio.  Esta persona será la encargada de dar las llaves, coger la fianza y devolverla cuando se abandona el apartamento. El Check In y entrega de llaves, se hace en el alojamiento de 14:00 h a 18:00 h, por lo que si van a llegar fuera de este horario, tendrían que avisar de la hora hora aproximada de llegada. El Check Out es hasta las 11:00 h, por lo que se deberá dejar el apartamento antes de la 11 h.
House Rules: Deberás de cuidar la casa como si fuera tu casa.  Por lo que tienes que cumplir unas  normas básicas: - PROHIBIDO fumar y alojar mascotas (sin consentimiento 30€/Mascota) -Respetar el descanso de los vecinos y procurar no hacer ruido ni molestar sobre todo en las horas comprendidas entre las 22h-9h. (Prohibido hacer fiestas) - Ocupar el apartamento sólo por las personas que se indican en la reserva - Se ruega apagar las luces y el aire acondicionado/calefacción cuando no se encuentre en la vivienda. Así como pedimos un uso responsable del agua. Ya no sólo por sentido común, si no por respeto al medio ambiente - Condiciones de los Checks: Check Out HASTA las 11h, Check In desde las 14h hasta las 18h. -LAS LLAVES: Se entregará un juego de llaves. Al hacer el Check Out, devolver las llaves a la persona que les ha atendido a la llegada. Las llaves, no se dejan puestas, de ser así se cobrará el importe del cerrajero. Si se pierden se abonarán 50€ Gracias y ¡¡BIENVENIDOS!! We want you to loo

Neighborhood Overview: La calle Narváez, que tiene su inicio en la confluencia de Goya y Alcalá, atraviesa el barrio de Ibiza y corre paralela al lado este del parque de El Retiro. Por su proximidad al gran pulmón de Madrid, ésta es una zona habitual de paseo, muy frecuentada a la hora de tomar el aperitivo, por lo que cuenta con un importante tejido comercial. Artesanía para el paladar Cada vez son más las tiendas de productos delicatessen –cervezas artesanales en Birra y Paz, en la calle Menorca– o restaurantes de cocina de vanguardia, así como pastelerías cuyas últimas generaciones de profesionales han virado hacia la creación gourmet. A caballo entre esa tradición y novedad están establecimientos como Nunos –calle Narváez 63–, referencia en la elaboración de buñuelos y torrijas, con colecciones temáticas que sorprenden cada año. Y entre las tradicionales, la horchatería Alboraya –calle Felipe II–, para probar el auténtico refresco a base de chufas, tan típico de la costa del Levante español, o la helader
Transit: Metro de MadridEditar La estación de metro que hay en este pequeño barrio es la de Ibiza (L9). Sin embargo, muy próximas al límite del barrio se encuentran las estaciones de O'Donnell (L6), Sainz de Baranda (L6 y L9), Príncipe de Vergara (L2 y L9), Velázquez (L4) y Goya (L2 y L4).

Name: Calle Mayor, central, spacious & elegant, AC (3D)
Summary: Spacious and bright three-bedroom two-bathroom apartment in Madrid's most central neighbourhood, a few steps from the famous Plaza Mayor, and a two-minute walk from the metro station in Puerta del Sol. The apartment comes with Wi-Fi, AC, all modern appliances and a fully equipped open kitchen. The reception on the ground floor is open daily from 9 am to 6 pm. Our team will be happy to help you with everything you need. The two sofa-beds in the living room accommodate two more guests.
Space: Three-bedroom two-bathroom apartment, ideal for groups of six people. All the bedrooms have double beds. There are also two sofa-beds in the living room, so it can sleep an additional two people.  The apartment has a lovely balcony that looks out onto a lively street. It is designed to be relaxing after a busy day visiting museums or exploring the city. Enjoy the comforts of this pretty apartment with fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, and our special amenity package. There is also Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, a weekly cleaning service and home appliances such as a Nespresso coffee machine and a dishwasher, which will make your stay pleasant and easy.
Description: Spacious and bright three-bedroom two-bathroom apartment in Madrid's most central neighbourhood, a few steps from the famous Plaza Mayor, and a two-minute walk from the metro station in Puerta del Sol. The apartment comes with Wi-Fi, AC, all modern appliances and a fully equipped open kitchen. The reception on the ground floor is open daily from 9 am to 6 pm. Our team will be happy to help you with everything you need. The two sofa-beds in the living room accommodate two more guests. Three-bedroom two-bathroom apartment, ideal for groups of six people. All the bedrooms have double beds. There are also two sofa-beds in the living room, so it can sleep an additional two people.  The apartment has a lovely balcony that looks out onto a lively street. It is designed to be relaxing after a busy day visiting museums or exploring the city. Enjoy the comforts of this pretty apartment with fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, and our special amenity package. There is also Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV,
Neighborhood Overview: This great apartment is located on Calle Mayor, just a few steps from Plaza Mayor and very near the famous Puerta del Sol and Mercado de San Miguel. It is great for discovering the city on foot. There are lots of tapas bars and typical Spanish wine taverns near the apartment. The recently refurbished Mercado de San Miguel is a great place for foodies, who will find hundreds of delicious things in this market. Nearby is Calle de Preciados - a lively street which is great for shopping. Madrid's most central square, the Puerta del Sol, is only two minutes' walk away from the apartment. It is very lively: a meeting point for Madrid residents and tourists alike.
Notes: Licencia Turistica VT-1362/VT-1539
Transit: Sol metro station is just a couple of minutes away from the apartment. There you can take metro lines 1, 2 and 3. There are also several local trains that you can take from there.
Access: The reception desk is open daily from 9 am to 6 pm. For arrivals later than 6 pm an automated check-in system is available. Check-in is from 3 pm. Check-out is by 11 am.
Interaction: The reception desk is open daily from 9 am to 6 pm and our friendly staff are on hand to make recommendations and help you with anything you might need. Outside these times a member of staff is always on call for any emergencies and you will have their direct line.
Host About:
I live in Madrid, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleague Luis and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Madrid. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

Vivo en Madrid, una ciudad que me ha cautivado desde el principio por su cultura, historia y belleza. Trabajo como manager para Aspasios y no podía pensar en un mejor trabajo: a Aspasios nos encanta que nuestros huéspedes se sientan como en casa. Una gran parte de nuestro trabajo es escuchar atentamente a nuestros visitantes: aprendemos mucho de ellos todos los días. Nos gusta conocer a todos y cada uno de los que vienen a quedarse con nosotros, y queremos ser la causa para que vuelvan. Nos enorgullecemos de ser amables y profesionales al mismo tiempo. En Aspasios, nos apasiona la hospitalidad.
Mis colegas y yo estamos siempre a tu disposición para ayudarte a sacar el máximo provecho de tu viaje a Madrid. Conocemos que esta ciudad de adentro hacia afuera, y podemos recomendar restaurantes, bares y actividades que no puedes encontrar en los libros de guía!
Street: Sol, Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid 28013, Spain

Name: FUN SLEEP VI
Space: IF YOU WANT TO GET TO KNOW MADRID AND FEEL AT HOME, THIS IS YOUR PLACE! Spacious, fully renovated, and modern flat with a touch of elegance, warmth, with an international atmosphere in Madrid´s best neighborhood. With a personable and casual atmosphere, this is ideal for friendly, sociable, and respectful people.  Located in the heart of Madrid, between Puerta del Sol and the famous Gran Via. Within walking distance of the renowned Plaza Mayor, Mercado de San Miguel, La Latina, the Rastro (a market), Chueca, Fuencarral, the Royal Palace, Retiro Park, and Puerta de Alcala. In the center of the city´s entertainment district with nearby cinemas, restaurants, nightlife and shopping. Also very close to acclaimed museums Prado, Reina Sofia and Thyssen Bornemisza. Host About:
Hi, I´m Alexis! I´m originally from Uruguay, and have been living in Europe for the past twenty years. 

I spent a significant part of my life living in and becoming familiar with the culture of many European and American cities. After twenty wonderful years, I decided to settle down and host travellers from all over the world, providing a comfortable space for them to feel at home in Madrid.

I´m a very relaxed and easy going guy, and I enjoy meeting people and familiarizing them with this incredible city. I love learning and speaking many languages (I speak 5).

Name: A Guesthouse in Madrid's green belt
Summary: On the grounds of our villa with use of pool (in season), a double bedroom, bathroom, living room, open plan kitchen and your private sunny green patios. Close to all amenities and Madrid city centre via underground, rail, buses. Free parking.
Space: What is unique about our space is the location and surrounding. We are well located for efficient transport into and around Madrid and all its major points for visitors of all kinds and interests. Equally we are next to all major excursion routes; El Escorial, Segovia, Avila, Aranjuez, Toledo, Sierra de Gredos, etc.  Situated within the relaxing green residential belt of northern Madrid, on the grounds of a stunning villa, with direct access to our pool. We know Madrid and its surroundings well and love to offer advise and help, just let us know your wishes and needs.

Neighborhood Overview: We are lucky with a well served neighbourhood with all amenities at hand. Within an easy walk are local shops and services, Holmes place gym, shopping malls, restaurants and bars, schools and playgrounds, a typical spanish village setting, Fuencarral and some cultural objects. A bit further 3 large hospitals, hotels, industrial and office parks, cinema's, etc.
Notes: We have friendly pets in and around the property: dog(s), cats and lost of happy birds. To be individually discussed, we could recommend tours and excursions, private transport locally, to and from airports /rail stations and other services can be arranged. You're welcome to let us know, tap our free consultations and recommendations about Madrid, surroundings, Spain, whatever. When any of us are on the move into Madrid, shops, etc. you're welcome to hitch a lift ... and back home as well of course. We do not welcome enquiries of people without verifications nor a meaningful profile entry nor do we haggle the price, both weekly and monthly prices are already greatly reduced over the daily rate! Exceptionally we can allow 1 or 2 extra guests for short periods at 25€ per night per person of any age, only if discussed beforehand.
Transit: All public transport to Madrid center are close by, a short walk: the Metro (underground) "Tres Olivos" and urban rail station "Fuencarral", several bus stops, taxis and for those with wheels, Madrid main circular roads and arteries, the M30, the M40 and the Castellana. Both the international airport Barajas and international Rail stations are at just a 15 min. drive! Ample, free parking space in front of the house. Equally convenient for excursions around Madrid.
Access: Our guests will have access to their own independent Guesthouse which is fully equipped and with ample free parking space. It comes with a cozy private gren patio and direct access to our pool when in season. A complimentary "Starter kit" is provided including coffee, tea, milk, biscuits, fruit, pepper and salt and some spices, a bottle of water and more. You will find a fridge with freezer, kettle, microwave with grille, washer with dryer, iron and board, cleaning material, bath and pool towels and of course Internet via WiFi, TV, Radio and CD.
Interaction: It is our main residence, we are usually present and at hand as may other residents. Interaction is entirely up to the guests wishes and likes, which can range from total privacy to part of the family, we "play it by ear".
House Rules: No smoking, indoors. Respectful behaviour towards other residents and neighbors. No loudness please you're in a residential area.  We could allow small well behaved pets and you may receive visitors, as long as you let us know and discuss well beforehand.
Host About:
Hosting, entertaining in general, is my preferred activity, I'm a total people person,  travel extensively and very much look forward to welcoming international guests!  Mind, I love cats & dogs too and we have a few well behaved examples around the property. Other favourite pass times are reading, keeping fit and going to the cinema. 

My husband and I feel we need to share our home with others since our children have left the nest. We can recommend many interesting Madrid spots for all tastes, it's a great city! A private tutor of English, I also spend a lot of time on our home & Garden, while my husband is an active classic car expert.

Neighborhood Overview: The apartment is located in calle Toledo, in the heart of La Latina, well known for its variety of restaurants and bars. To the north east, you can reach the Royal Palace, approximately a kilometre away, and to the north, you'll get to Sol area and 'Zero kilometres', centre of Spain. In the same direction you'll get to Gran Via, famous for its buildings symbolic of Madrid and also shops, cinemas and theatres. From the apartment, to the east, you'll reach Lavapies area, a multicultural neighbourhood where you'll find many restaurants and alternative shops, as well as museums and galleries (Reina Sofia Museum, Valle Inclan Theatre...).
Host About:
I'm Leti from La Latina. I am a lover of good movies and good music. I always like to try new things and discover new places.

I'm from Madrid and all my life I lived in La Latina district, my favourite place on earth. I love walking through the streets, share tapas with friends or just have cup of wine on one of the charming terraces surrounding the place.

I would like to share with all this feeling, which is why I would love to visit me!

Name: COMFORTABLE AND CENTRALLY CHAMBERI
Summary: Precioso apartamento situado en la calle Ponzano esquina con José Abascal, uno de los mejores y más exclusivos barrios de todo Madrid. Alojate y vive una experiencia inolvidable dejándote llevar por el encanto de sus calles, su gente y su ambiente.
Space: El apartamento es acogedor y tranquilo, está en el primer piso del edificio, este es una corrala típica de Madrid, dispone de ascensor. El salón dispone de un sofá que se convierte en cama de forma sencilla, televisión plana de 32". Se puede comer o cenar en el apartamento, tiene todo el menaje  necesario (platos, vasos, cubiertos...) la cocina esta totalmente equipada (frigorífico, microondas, lavadora, placa inducción, cafetera Dolce Gusto, batidora, lavavajillas...) tenemos tablar de planchar y plancha, si en tu estancia faltase algo que consideras necesario dínoslo, nuestra intención es que te sientas como en casa. La cama del dormitorio es de 1,35x1,90, sabanas, nórdico, toallas, todo lo necesario. El baño tiene plato de ducha y mampara. Es nuestro hogar y espero que vosotros os sintáis como en vuestra propia casa, por eso os pedimos que la cuides y la trates como si fuera vuestra.

Lo que hace diferente a nuestro barrio y lo hace especial es que aquí la gente que se mueve es la de Madrid. Chamberí es un barrio seguro y elegante. Tienes una gran oferta cultural a dos pasos el Museo Sorolla, Teatro del Canal, Exposiciones, también y si te gusta el deporte tienes el Parque Santander donde puedes pasear, hacer runnig, ya que dispone de pista de atletismo, jugar al padel, solarium de madera junto a las fuentes, parque para los niños, y a cuatro paradas de metro sol, puedes ir dando un paseo por la calle Fuencarral y llegar a Chueca en 15 min o terminar en Gran Vía y apr
Transit: Metro Alonso Cano Linea 7: En la puerta de casa Metro Río Rosas Linea 1: 4 minutos andando Metro Canal Linea 2: 5 minutos andando Metro Gregorio Marañon Linea 7 y Ramal Principe Pio: 5 minutos Nuevos Ministerios Linea 6 - Aeropuerto - Estación de Chamartín: 15 minutos andando Ademas tienes 2 estaciones de Bicimad al lado de casa por si tu pasión es la bici y prefieres un transporte limpio.
Access: El inquilino dispondrá del apartamento íntegro para su disfrute. Wifi. Aire acondicionado con con máquina en el salón y en la habitación. Todo el menaje y los electrodomésticos necesarios para el día a día. La casa es muy tranquila y aún estando ubicada en una zona con mucho ambiente al ser corrala no se escucha el ruido del exterior y se descansa de forma tranquila. La temperatura del apartamento es agradable en invierno y en verano no es nada calurosa, aún así dispone de calefacción y aire acondicionado para el verano. Dispone de ascensor.
Interaction: Mi marido y yo estaremos a vuestra disposición para cualquier consulta o cualquier cosa que podáis necesitar para que vuestra estancia en Madrid sea perfecta.

Las fiestas están totalmente prohibidas, debemos respeta la tranquilidad de los vecinos. Trata las cosas como si fueran tuyas para que todos podamos disfrutar de ellas.

Espero que disfrutes de la experiencia. 
¡Bienvenidos!

Name: Elegance in the neighborhood of Las Letras-LeónIII
Summary: Located in the very heart of one of Madrid’s most historic neighbourhoods, this two bedroom / 2 bathroom apartment offers guests the opportunity to experience the Spanish capital at its most atmospheric.
Space: Located in the very heart of one of Madrid’s most historic neighbourhoods, this two bedroom apartment offers guests the opportunity to experience the Spanish capital at its most atmospheric.  Known as the Barrio de Las Letras in reference to its literary and culturally rich past, the area immediately surrounding the apartment has been home to a number of famous Spanish artists and writers over the years. The neighbourhood is known for its lovely architecture, quirky boutiques, and traditional taverns and restaurants. In the quiet, cobbled streets of the Barrio de Las Letras, guests are just a stone’s throw from many of Madrid’s top sights and attractions.  The famous ‘Big Three’ art museums are all within walking distance, as is the beautiful inner-city Retiro Park. Also nearby is the central Puerta del Sol, which then leads further north to the lovely art deco Gran Via avenue.  A number of different metro and bus stations are within easy reach, meaning guests can explore the rest of t

Access: Surface area: 100m2. Second floor. The living room located at the end of the beautifully tiled hall has 2 French balconies looking out onto the street; it is furnished with a 3-seater sofa, 1 armchair with a tall industrial lamp on its side, 1 glass coffee table and a TV table with 2 decorative wooden boxes, flat screen TV and DVD player. There is a working area displayed in the living room with a writing desk and two side shelves. The open plan kitchen/dining area is separated from the living room by an exposed brick wall on the right side of the room.  It has a dining table with chairs for 4 people. It is equipped with a fridge / freezer, 4-ring ceramic hob (stove), oven, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine /dryer. Along the corridor, there are 2 bedrooms (with fitted wardrobes): the master bedroom consists of a double bed (king-sized bed 1.80m x 2.00m) with an en-suite bathroom with a walk-in shower; and a twin-bedroom (2 twin beds 0.90m x 2.00m). The second bathroom is in the
Interaction: We will arrange the check in time depending on your arrival time. It is normally from 4pm but we will do our best to have the apartment ready for you ASAP. Anything you need during your stay, feel free to contact us! We are happy to help!
House Rules: Arrivals after 21:00 may be subject to an extra charge. Remember to let us know your arrival time in advance! *We ask our guests to sign a rental agreement upon arrival and leave details of a credit card as a further security measure. This information will be destroyed after you have left the property and we have conducted a check-out inspection* € 25/day for up to 4 people (The price shown is for max. 2 people).
Host About:
Spain Select was born from the recognition of a desire among travelers to live locally in a real home whilst away from their own, and yet still enjoy all of the benefits and small luxuries of a hotel stay. Not only that, though, we understood that they also wanted to be close to all of the best that their destination has to offer – to be right in the heart of it all. So we decided to source a broad range of high quality homes in the most sought after locations across the country, starting with the capital Madrid and moving over to Malaga, Valencia, and Seville. We then added a few unique flourishes that embody our brand of service and our values. Our interior design team works to extract and enhance the natural charm from each space and make it a warm home. Our very own in-house Local Ambassadors are posted in each destination to welcome each guest home and bed them in to the neighborhood when they first arrive. Finally, a selection of hotel-like services – including a 24-hour concierge for everything from show tickets to new sheets – and a motorized maintenance team completes our comprehensive customer care throughout every single stay. Every Spain Select experience is unique, yet they are all of a consistent high quality no matter when you stay with us. 

Live local, sleep royal: welcome to Spain Select.

Name: Nice Big Room Between Atocha & Sol
Summary: Quiet room with double bed in one of the most popular streets of Lavapiés. From here, you can go walking to practically all turistic and emblematic places. Train and metro station are at real five minutes walking, and you have public bike station almost at the door of the house. There are a lot of restaurants and markets that open early and close late.
Space: La habitación es grande, luminosa y perfecta para dormir a pierna suelta porque da a un patio interior muuuy tranquilo. El resto del piso es pequeñito pero acogedor. Aquí siempre suena buena música y hay cosas ricas en la nevera!
Description: Quiet room with double bed in one of the most popular streets of Lavapiés. From here, you can go walking to practically all turistic and emblematic places. Train and metro station are at real five minutes walking, and you have public bike station almost at the door of the house. There are a lot of restaurants and markets that open early and close late.
Neighborhood Overview: Vivir aquí es un placer, es muy fácil encontrar de todo para todos! Más de 40 nacionalidades hacemos vida entre galerías de arte, museos, lugares de ocio y cultura alternativos, espacios para niños, bares a montones y todos con su encanto, música, salas de cine, parques, canchas, El Rastro al ladito... Te recomendaremos sitios populares (...y los no tan populares pero mejores ;) )
Notes: Vivimos con Atari, una gata preciosa y muy buena y cariñosa. El precio es por persona y noche. 10 € la persona extra.
Transit: A 100 metros tienes metro (L3) y una estación de Bicimad. Atocha está a 10 minutos andando y el intercambiador de Moncloa a 15 en metro directo.
Access: Puedes utilizar cocina y baño.. Libertad de entrar y salir cuando sea, como si fueras unx más.
Interaction: No dudes en pedirnos la ayuda que sea porque estamos encantados de ayudarte en lo que necesites. No te preocupes de traer toalla, champús y esas cosas, puedes usar los que hay aquí. El desayuno va incluido y los piscolabis que quieras hacerte, también.
House Rules: Deja las cosas como las encuentras y usa el baño con responsabilidad y teniendo en cuenta que hay más personas que lo quieren usar (sobre todo por las mañanas!).
Host About:
Soy una persona tranquila a la que le encanta la música en todas sus formas, pasar tiempo con sus amigos y familia, viajar, descubrir cosas, comer, cocinar...

Disfruto tanto de una tarde de lectura en casa como de una noche de club o concierto que se alarga hasta las 10 de la mañana :D
Me encanta pasar tiempo con mi gata y con mi encantador compañero de piso, Jorge.
Echo en falta tener más dinero para viajar aunque poco a poco me voy buscando sistemas para la vida low cost. ADORO TENER TIEMPO LIBRE para hacer mis cosas y llevo bastante mal los trabajos de 8 horas al día en una oficina.

Ahora me encuentro trabajando por mi cuenta en proyectos de gestión cultural (suena muy bien pero aun estoy empezando jajaja) y también empleo mi tiempo en mejorar mi inglés.

Antigua zona de cultivo de frutales. Muy próximo a la Plaza de Toros de las Ventas y al Intercambiador de Avenida de América. Notes: Me interesa el conocimiento de las culturas. El intercambio entre personas interesadas en construir un espacio de tolerancia y amistad. Ofrezco hospitalidad, tranquilidad, descanso para todos.

Neighborhood Overview: Familiy and traditional neighborhood of Delicias, very close to Atocha (Central Train Station). A real neighborhood where people of Madrid lives in full coexistence with immigration as part of our history and our identity. Close to the Railway Museum too.  Full of every kind of chops, supermarkets and bars and restaurants around the corner.
Notes: If you wish, we can recommend and suggest you what to see and do in Madrid during your stay. After welcoming you and giving the keys, you can find us every time you need over the phone or Internet. We like to be available for what you need at our house, but not interfering; but always reachable if you need our help or advice; or if something is missing in the apartment. We will adapt to you depending on your needs and wishes. We are quite flexible and available. We believe it is very important to foreseen a good service and a good personal contact and we love interacting with people, so far, we have had very good connection with our guests. The check in/check out schedule is flexible as far as there are not other reservations on the same date of entry or exit.  If there would be Check in: From 16:00.  Check out: before 11:00  If you need to stay longer we will always find a solution for your bags and luggage.
Transit: Perfectly located almost facing the Delicias metro station (Line 3) and Delicias Train Station and in a 10 minutes walk from the Atocha central train station. You can walk to Atocha, the Museum of Modern Art Reina Sofia, El Retiro, etc. all a 10-15 minute walk. If you take the subway from Delicias (L3 Metro) you have the main Square (Puerta del Sol) in 4 stops (10 minutes ride) and if you want to visit the area of Legazpi (with the great cultural Center called Matadero and the area of Madrid Rio Park) in just 1 Metro stop.  You can go for a drink and enjoy the terraces of "Calle Ferrocarril" in 3 minutes or the impressive Lavapies neighborhood just 10 minutes from home.
Access: Internet Wi-fi. Newly renovated and fully equipped kitchen (electric cooker, toaster, oven, microwave, refrigerator, etc.) . Basic cooking as salt, oil, vinegar, sugar, etc. at your disposal. Newly refurbished bathroom with shower, hairdryer avaiable for you too. You will have free tea and coffee and biscuits, cereals, etc. at your disposal so you can prepare a light breakfast and get energy to start the day. Linens and towels included. Washing machine and iron available for guests. Professional house cleaning included in the price. Individual heating system for the apartment.
Interaction: We will personally receive and welcome you directly in the apartment. We will show you the place around and give you all the information you need to prepare your trip and explore the neighbourhood and the city of Madrid. In the lounge you will find various guides of Madrid in various languages, maps and all kind of updated tourist information.
House Rules: The apartment is part of a quiet community of friendly neighbours; we like to accommodate people in line with this, respectful with the rest of others. Parties or guests who have not booked are not allowed. Please remember to turn off lights and heating when leaving the apartment. If you want to smoke you can do so on the terrace or windows, but we ask you not to smoke inside the house. Other rules appeal to common sense rather than another, not making much noise, care for furniture and appliances and leave the house tidy before leaving. ***Check out is before 12:00 and check in after 14:00, but we are flexible on the matter, provided that there are no other guests before or after.***
Host About:
Somos Alfredo y María. Tras varios años gestionando apartamentos en Madrid por nuestra cuenta hemos decidido juntarnos y trabajar juntos para poder ofreceros los mejores espacios en Madrid, apartamentos llenos de encanto y recibiros con el mejor servicio y trato posible.
María es arquitecta y se encarga muchas veces de decorar y cuidar los espacios que ofrecemos. Alfredo ha estudiado turismo aunque siempre ha trabajado en ONGs y Cooperación al desarrollo. 
Ambos nos encanta viajar, hemos viajado por medio mundo (o quizás un cuarto!) y sobre todo amamos y disfrutamos la ciudad de Madrid por lo que esperamos poder guiarte por los mejores rincones y con las mejores propuestas de ocio, gastronomía y turismo de esta ciudad.

We are Alfredo and Maria. After several years managing apartments in Madrid on our own we decided to get together and work together to offer you the best spaces in Madrid, charming and well located apartments and welcome you with the best service possible.
Maria is an architect and often decorates personally our spaces. Alfredo has studied tourism but has always worked in NGOs and Development.
We both love to travel, we have traveled half the world (or perhaps a third!) And above all we love and enjoy the city of Madrid and we hope to guide you through the best places and the best leisure activities, gastronomy and tourism offers of this city.
Street: Delicias, Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid 28045, Spain

It is close to must-see attractions such us Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor  or and the Royal Palace, and also enjoys the best restaurants and tapas bars in Madrid. Long walks to enjoy lively street music and theatre are essential. The nearest metro station is just 50 metres from the door. However almost everything in the center is walkable, if you prefer. There are excellent bus routes, but if you feel more active, try Madrid´s brand-new electric  bike rental!  There´s  a rental station on the corner. The guest will enjoy the best views in Madrid and walk to every interesting place of the city.

Host About:
I am trained as an architect, 27 years old, located in Madrid for more than a year now and I love it! Such an exciting city! I am constantly on the look out for new and exciting opportunities to further develop myself and my interests.

Originally from Romania, I have studied and lived in Scotland, Brussels, Barcelona and Madrid in the past 8 years of my life. I speak English, Spanish & a bit of French (basic).

I love travelling and meeting new, interesting people everywhere I go; a great, if not the best, way to getting to know one-self and growing into a beautiful all-rounded human being. I enjoy cooking, reading, long chats over a good wine and listening to great music (live if possible). I love yoga and sushi, cycling and skiing.

Neighborhood Overview: Se encuentra ubicado en el barrio de Argüelles, junto a Plaza de España, muy cerca del templo de Debod y Rodeado y del Parque del Oeste y las Rosaledas, dos lugares únicos que permiten la desconexión total de la rutinaria ciudad.  Sin embargo, a tan sólo 5 minutos andando del apartamento, nos situamos en la famosa calle Gran Vía, que llena de vida la ciudad.  Restaurantes, comercios y próximo a los lugares más emblemáticos de Madrid son solo algunas de las atracciones que encontrarás en la zona.
Transit: El metro está a 5 segundos caminando desde la puerta. En metro desde el aeropuerto, se tarda tan solo 35 minutos. Línea 8 hasta nuevos ministerios, realizar un transbordo para tomar la línea 10, hasta Plaza España y tendrá que caminar únicamente 74 metros, un minuto a pie. En taxi solo 20 minutos.
Interaction: En Forever Young apartments nos gusta recibir personalmente a nuestros clientes en el momento de su llegada, para darles la bienvenida y proporcionar la información necesaria sobre el apartamento, hacer la entrega de llaves y facilitar un plano de Madrid en el que mostramos los principales lugares de interés e información turística.  Si lo deseas también podremos hacer la compra antes de que llegues al apartamento y  tendrás todo lo que  necesites para tu estancia, sin tener que perder tiempo comprando, solo envíanos una lista con lo que deseas 2 días antes de tu llegada. Para nosotros es de vital importancia que tu estancia sea lo más placentera posible y por ello estamos siempre disponibles en nuestro horario de oficina de 10.00h a 20.00h y en caso de emergencia 24 horas.
Host About:
En Forever Young Apartments somos especialistas en hacer de tu estancia con nosotros, una experiencia. Cuidamos todos los detalles y nos ocupamos para que tú solo te encargues de disfrutar de tu estancia.
Somos una empresa spin-off del portal Alter keys, con años de experiencia en el alojamiento vacacional.

Name: Apartamento dúplex centro Sol-Barrio de las Letras
Summary: Luminoso dúplex en pleno centro de Madrid, ideal para dos o cuatro personas que quieran visitar Madrid desde el mismo corazón de la capital, especialmente si se proponen disfrutar de la riquísima vida cultural de la ciudad y de la concurrida noche del cercano Barrio de las Letras. A cincuenta metros del metro de Antón Martín y diez minutos andando de la Puerta del Sol, rodeado de cines y teatros y una variada oferta de restaurantes. Con calefacción, aire acondicionado y Wifi propia.
Space: Es un apartamento muy acogedor, con mucha luz, ventanas de PVC en todas las estancias, calefacción individual y aire acondicionado, con radiadores también en todas las estancias. Televisor en salón, en sala de estar y en dormitorio. Equipo de música con altavoces distribuidos por la casa. WiFi propio. El diseño interior del apartamento es funcional y al mismo tiempo mantiene las vigas originales de la cubierta del edificio.

La entrada al apartamento está e
Neighborhood Overview: Situado a cincuenta metros del metro de Antón Martín, y a diez minutos andando de la Puerta del Sol, en un barrio rebosante de actividad cultural y de lugares de encuentro para comer y tomar algo, librerías con servicio de cafetería, terrazas con tapas o restaurantes.  Muy cerca del apartamento están la sede de la Filmoteca Nacional (Cine Doré) o los cines Ideal (V.O.) y el tradicional Mercado de Antón Martín, donde se puede comprar comida (allí o en supermercados adyacentes) o degustar dentro del mismo mercado comida japonesa, italiana o mexicana. De camino a la Puerta del Sol se encuentra la Plaza de Santa Ana, sede del Teatro Español y cubierta de animadas terrazas. Más cerca aún del apartamento está el teatro nacional Valle Inclán, y en un radio próximo se puede visitar el Centro de Arte Reina Sofía, el Museo Thyssen Bornemisza, el Museo Caixaforum y el Museo del Prado.
Transit: Dos estaciones de metro (Antón Martín y Lavapiés) están situadas muy cerca de la casa. Es más recomendable Antón Martín, porque los menos de cien metros que hay que recorrer de la estación a la casa son llanos. Además del metro, y de los autobuses en la cercana Ronda de Atocha, se puede llegar caminando en menos de cinco minutos a centros neurálgicos de la ciudad: el Barrio de las Letras, la puerta del Sol, la calle de Atocha, el barrio de Lavapiés...
Access: El edificio está reformado, pero no tiene ascensor. La entrada al apartamento está en el tercer piso.
House Rules: - Respeto por las normas de buena vecindad habituales, especialmente en ruidos. - La hora de entrada será a partir de las 15 horas. Para llegadas anticipadas, dependerá de disponibilidad; para entradas a partir de las 21 horas, se añadirá un recargo de 15 euros. El check out será como máximo a las 11 horas.
Street: Embajadores, Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid 28012, Spain

Host About:
Hi, I´m Alexis! I´m originally from Uruguay, and have been living in Europe for the past twenty years. 

I spent a significant part of my life living in and becoming familiar with the culture of many European and American cities. After twenty wonderful years, I decided to settle down and host travellers from all over the world, providing a comfortable space for them to feel at home in Madrid.

I´m a very relaxed and easy going guy, and I enjoy meeting people and familiarizing them with this incredible city. I love learning and speaking many languages (I speak 5).

Name: Nice and cozy Golden Mile of Madrid
Summary: This Apartment is located in the luxurious Salamanca District of Madrid, just few minutes from RETIRO and RECOLETOS Metro Stop.
Space: NICE AND COZY APT. BARRIO SALAMANCA  This Apartment is located in the luxurious Salamanca District of Madrid, just few minutes from RETIRO and RECOLETOS Metro Stop. This neighbourhood is named after the architect, José Malaga Salamanca and Mayol, Marquis of Salamanca, which promoted it, and partly erected in the nineteenth century. It has become one of the most important commercial areas of the city and one of the areas with the greatest standard of living in Europe with a luxury shopping area around the streets: Serrano, Claudio Coello and Ortega y Gasset. This area is now known as the Madrid GOLDEN MILE.  The apartment is located just 5 minutes walk from the Golden Mile and the emblematic and significant RETIRO PARK, where you can take long walks on foot, by bike, riding in a small boat on the lake or just go to see the environment puppets and artists who frequent this park. Name: Cool Apartment in Chueca

Description: It's a retro style apartment recently renovated and decorated (April of 2014). It's located on a very quiet street in the heart of Chueca, 1st floor with lift in a building with concierge. Luminous, chic and fully equipped. Design apartment for up to 3 people in a quiet street in the heart of Chueca. If you arrive between 10:00 am and 20:00 pm, we will welcome you at our central office (located in Calle Mayor 4, 5th floor, door 3) where you will be given your keys and check in instructions. I remind you that your apartment may not be available until 15:00 pm. For any arrivals after 8 PM are considered as late check in. We will welcome you at the apartment and the late check in fee is 20 € from 20.00 to 24.00h. Saturday and Sunday check ins will always be made at the apartment directly. We also offer you the possibility to be welcomed directly at the apartment during our office hours at an extra cost of 15 €; If you wish to contract this service please let us know at least 48 hours befo
Neighborhood Overview: The apartment is located on vibrant Chueca, the heart of Madrid’s modernity, where design and vanguard come together in numerous clothing and accessory shops, hairdresser’s and beauty parlors, bookshops, design and decoration shops and art galleries that will greet you as you stroll down its streets. Just a few meters away from the square that gives its name to the district, this is one of Madrid’s most original and flavoursome areas, a paradise for night owls, a must see, a place where you can enjoy tapas bars, nightclubs, vanguard shops and an endless number of interesting turns and bends. It is also the perfect way to start off on a tour of the city: just five minutes away are the emblematic Cibeles Square and Alcala Arch, welcoming you to a pleasant day of strolling along the magnificient Paseo del Prado, through the Neptuno Square and to the cultural triangle formed by the Thyssen, Prado and Reina Sofía museums. At night fall, the area offers a wide variety of restaurants, tapas b

Asimismo, goza de la inmejorable red de transportes del centro de Madrid con rápido acceso a pie a las estaciones de metro de Gran Vía, Chueca y Callao entre otras, así como numerosas paradas de autobús.

Neighborhood Overview: Malasaña is an area of Madrid famous for its trendy alternative scene. Centred around Plaza Dos de Mayo, it is reminiscent of Camden Town in London, the East Village in New York City, or Bairro Alto in Lisbon, although the layout is quite different and the emphasis is less on shops and more on bars. Malasaña is to the west of Chueca and to the east of Argüelles. It was the centre of the movida movement in late 1970´s and 1980´s Madrid. Malasaña is a vibrant neighborhood full of lively bars and restaurants overflowing with young people. Its streets are currently being renovated, making it a much more attractive quarter (the streetworks are almost finished). It's one of the classic areas for partying the night away. The area's center is the Plaza del Dos de Mayo (in commemoration of a popular uprising on May 2, 1808, brutally repressed by the French troops and which started the Spanish Independence War). Although popularly known as barrio Malasaña, it is known by residents as Maravillas
Notes: SECURITY DEPOSIT: on arrival, guests will be asked to pay a security deposit as a guarantee for damages with credit card, 300€ for weekly rentals or between 600€ and 1.000 for monthly rentals depending on the length of the stay.  This deposit will be refunded automatically 48 hours after the end of the stay. For monthly rentals is required a complete cleaning at the end of each month, included on the total rental price that is not negotiable.
Access: How to get to the apartment : from the airport : a 30 minutes journey in the subway that costs 2 Euro per person. Take the 8 line to Nuevos Ministerios, then a short connection to 10 line and get off at tribunal station. Once there, take the exit to Calle Fuencarral and walk two blocks until Glorieta de Bilbao, turn your left in the corner and walk a few meters.
House Rules: TERMS & CONDITIONS : Check- Ins/ Outs:  Check In is at 15:00  Check Out is at 11.00  (I will try to accommodate all necessary arrival and departure times)  We charge an extra 30 Euros for check-ins on Sundays and late check-ins (after 9 pm). After 11 pm the late arrival fee is 50 Euros.

In 2008 starts a small holiday lettings company to complement the architecture and interior design job.  I have created Flat Sweet Home and today we manage several apartments in Madrid city center and love to host people traveling, my main purpose is to give a beautiful experience to  my guests providing high quality apartments and service, a warm interior design and perfect cleaning.

Neighborhood Overview: La ubicación de este apartamento es inmejorable. Situado en un lugar q hace posible recorrer a pie la zona comercial más importante y divertida de Madrid, donde encontraras y disfrutaras de las mejores firmas de modas y de las tiendas más exclusivas. Los mejores restaurantes y bares de copas también se encuentran al alcance de nuestros huéspedes pues los últimos locales de moda se encuentran en esta zona. Supermercados, museos, embajadas, centros culturales, todo se encuentra disponible a pocos metros de esta localización tan atractiva, que confieren a este apartamento y hacen de él una estancia única y privilegada para nuestros huéspedes.
Notes: Sobre todo la inmejorable ubicación y la tranquilidad del apartamento, así como la diversión a la que se puede acceder en pocos metros.
Transit: A pie, en metro, autobús o taxis. El desplazamiento en bicicleta por esta zona tan llana y con carril bici, hacen que este tipo de desplazamientos se estén imponiendo de forma cada vez más acentuada. También el coche propio es fácil de utilizar en esta zona, siempre y cuando se cuente con plaza de aparcamiento.
Access: Todas las zonas de la casa están disponibles para nuestros huéspedes. El edificio tiene ascensor y durante el día, para cualquier duda o necesidad que pudiera surgir, contaremos con una persona de mantenimiento.
Interaction: A los huéspedes se les recibe en casa para instruirles sobre el funcionamiento de la misma. Se les entregan dos juegos de llaves para su total independencia y siempre hay una pequeña sorpresa de bienvenida.  En caso de duda o necesidad, el anfitrión esta disponible en cualquier momento y además vive a escasos metros de esta ubicación. Prácticamente todos los días para cualquier necesidad que les pueda surgir y por supuesto, a su llegada y salida, Siempre que ellos me necesiten estamos a su disposición.
House Rules: - Se ruega a los huéspedes que respeten el horario de descanso del vecindario, así como el silencio en las llegadas nocturnas al apartamento y en la estancia del mismo, por consideración al resto de inquilinos del edificio. -El orden y cuidado de todas las cosas que se ofrecen en el apartamento y que se ponen al alcance de todos los huéspedes con todo el mimo y cariño por parte de los anfitriones para el disfrute y uso de todo ello. - Se respetarán los horarios de siesta y nocturnos. - la basura se depositará en los contenedores habilitados en la calle, dentro de sus horarios, al abandonar la estancia. - Las luces y aparatos eléctricos se dejaran apagados al salir del apartamento, durante el tiempo que dure la estancia y al abandonar la misma. - La pérdida o extravío de llaves tendrá un coste adicional de 10€.
Host About:
Soy una persona independiente, autónoma y disfrutona de las pequeñas cosas que se me ofrecen. Una humilde aficcionada a la lectura y el cine. El mar, el sol y las playas de Cadiz son mi deleite.
Me gustan las comidas de los viernes con mis amigas y los domingos de mantita y peli.
La familia, los viajes y el buen flamenco son tres placeres en mi vida.
Del resto.... pues una más!!!

Neighborhood Overview: Cozy, spacious flat in the Anton Martin neighborhood of Madrid. Approximately a 10 minute walk to Puerta del Sol. It is walking distance to all of the city's major attractions. The train station is a three minute walk (Lavapies and Anton Martin). Come and enjoy the Madrid sun and nightlife.  The neighborhood is very colorful and multicultural. There are easily over 20 nationalities represented in Lavapies, namely Bangladesh, India, Senegal, Pakistan, Ecuador...just to name a few.  There are two metro stops nearby - Lavapies and Anton Martin.  Everything you need is within reach. The modern art museum Reina Sofia is a 5 minute walk.  You'll want to stay in this recently remodeled flat in the center of Madrid because it offers a rich local experience at a great price.

Es ideal para deportistas, se practica running, patinaje, bicicleta...y para disfrutar con los niños haciendo un picnic. También es ideal para parejas que quieren disfrutar de un romantico paseo en barca o un aperitivo en cualquiera de las terrazas del parque.

Las estaciones de metro Conde de Casal y Menéndez Pelayo se encuentran a pocos minutos a pie. A veinte metros tenemos numerosos autobuses que llevan al centro y los principales destinos de Madrid.  Es sencillo conseguir un taxi, aún así facilitamos el teléfono de teletaxi para que se pueda reservar su servicio sin coste adicional. Desde el aeropuerto se llega directo a la estación de Atocha en tren o en autobús expresa 24h. El trayecto suele tardar media hora. Name: APARTAMENTO EN LA PUERTA DEL SOL
Summary: En la misma Puerta del Sol, en pleno de centro de Madrid, podrás disfrutar de una agradable estancia para conocer los lugares más emblemáticos de la ciudad: Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Gran Vía, Teatro Real, Palacio Real, etc. Si tu viaje es por negocios encontrarás un lugar perfecto para trabajar, tranquilo, luminoso y situado al lado de la estación de Sol, donde podrás coger el metro o el tren y llegar a cualquier parte de la ciudad en cuestión de minutos.
Space: El apartamento está recién reformado y totalmente equipado: ropa de cama, toallas, tv, microondas, horno, internet, secador de pelo, etc. Dispone de una cama grande de matrimonio y de un sofá-cama bastante cómodo. El apartamento es muy luminoso, cómodo y tranquilo; es ideal para familias y para gente de negocios que vengan a Madrid por trabajo.

Name: Nice room in Vallehermoso district
Summary: This room is luminous and very spacious. It has a double bed, dressing table and closet.
Space: This nice two persons bedroom is spacious and luminous. The apartment has a full equipped kitchen. Dishwasher, washing machine and oven are at your disposal.  The bathroom has a shower, bathtub and bidet.  The living room is spacious and luminous and has TV and fix/wireless internet.
Description: This room is luminous and very spacious. It has a double bed, dressing table and closet. This nice two persons bedroom is spacious and luminous. The apartment has a full equipped kitchen. Dishwasher, washing machine and oven are at your disposal.  The bathroom has a shower, bathtub and bidet.  The living room is spacious and luminous and has TV and fix/wireless internet. There are off course plenty of bed linen and towels available for my guests. The price includes a continental breakfast. My guests are free to make themselves toasts with coffee and thee and there are oranges to prepare a nice glass of fresh orange juice. I´m almost always traveling for work and when this is the case  you will get the keys most likely from José Miguel, the concierge, who also prepares the apartment for the guests in my absense. The apartment is centrally located in the Vallehermoso district very near Moncloa, with metro and bus at a few minutes walk. We have many good restaurants nearby and also severa
Neighborhood Overview: The apartment is centrally located in the Vallehermoso district very near Moncloa, with metro and bus at a few minutes walk. We have many good restaurants nearby and also several supermarkets and all the shops you require. The apartment is located near the Campus of the Complutense University where you can have nice walks in their parks. At 400 meters we have the sport facilities of Canal de Isabel II where you can jog, play tennis and paddle or hit some golf balls.
Notes: To respect the private live of the concierge and myself we ask our guests to arrive before 22:00 hours. Our guests can get into the apartment after 14:00 hours to give us the possibility to clean and prepare everything after the previous guests have left in the morning.  It is not permitted to smoke inside the house.
Transit: There is a subway station (Islas Filipinas) at just a 5 minute walk. The bus and taxi stand is just 3 minutes away.
Access: There are off course plenty of bed linen and towels available for my guests.

I´m almost always traveling for work and when this is the case  you will get the keys most likely from José Miguel, the concierge, who also prepares the apartment for the guests in my absense.
House Rules: In order to promote a friendly and respectful environment a few House Rules are spelled out below. Most importantly, the guest is asked to use common sense and judgement. 1. Quiet hours shall be after 22.00 Hrs;  2. The rooms and the common areas are strictly smoke and pet free;  3. The guest is expected to take due care to ensure that the Common Areas are kept in good condition;  4. The guest is expected to avoid wasteful use of resources (gas, electricity and water), for example, by turning lights off when not in use and maintaining windows closed during winter;  5. There shall be no overnight guests.
Host About: Me llamo Antonio y normalmente vivo en Madrid. Trabajo en una empresa americana y casi siempre me encuentro en el extranjero por motivos de trabajo. Nacido en España pero con nacionalidad holandesa. Soy una persona tranquila, limpia y ordenada. Me gusta dejar mi alojamiento tal como lo encontré, o mejor. Yo mismo soy anfitrión en Airbnb con varios apartamentos en España y me gusta que mis huéspedes dejen a su salida todo tal como lo encontraron, algo que yo mismo aplico en todas mis visitas. Me encanta conocer nuevas personas y me considero una persona comunicativa y educada.

Summary: Nuestro pequeño estudio de 25 metros tiene el encanto de ser una casita independiente dentro de un patio interior en pleno centro de Madrid. Vuestro bienestar y que siempre queráis volver. Mi alojamiento es ideal para una pareja o una persona que viaja sola.

Neighborhood Overview: El barrio cuenta con todo lo que podáis necesitar. Tenéis practicamente todo en la misma manzana... Summary: Very spacious and light 250m2 top-floor 4 bed flat with wonderful terrace and views of historic Madrid centre. Traditional old-style building with high ceilings and many original features. Very centrally placed easy walking distance to museums/shops.
Space: Traditional top-floor light and spacious (250m2) apartment right in the heart of historic Madrid with wonderful 40m2 terrace with great views. BEDS 4 bedrooms with the following beds: * 2 double beds * 1 double sofa bed * 1 single bed Can accomodate up to seven comfortably. KITCHEN Charming kitchen with accompanying breakfast/dining room. Fully equipped with appliances: oven, microwave, coffee machine, dishwasher, juicer, toaster, etc. WIFI Hi speed fibre-optic 300Mb wifi internet connection. Accessible throughout flat with two routers. INDOOR ENTERTAINMENT * Piano * Books, including many guide-books (Madrid, Spain and others) * Hi-fi CD/iPod/iPhone/bluetooth player with speakers throughout flat * Cards and some board-games Quiet and restful flat. Air-conditioning available in summer in 2 bedrooms and the kitchen. Very well heated in winter.

Neighborhood Overview: We are located just on the northern side of "Chueca" quartier which is historic and has become very trendy with many eclectic boutiques, cafes, bars and restaurants. WALKING DISTANCES Walking distances to :  * Museums (Prado, Thyssen, Fdción Mapfre, Reina Sofía) - 15-20 mn walk  * Tourism and leisure (roof tops cafés, tapas, cine) - 2 to 20 mn walk  * Park and nature (Parque Retiro, Paseo Prado/Recoletos) - 15 mn walk  * Shopping area (Salamanca, Gran Vía, Chueca) - 10 to 20 mn walk  * Historical area (Chueca, Las Letras, Pza Mayor, Sol) - 2 to 30 mn walk
Notes: We have a very friendly cat called Timmy. Please let us know if you are allergic or do not like cats and we can usually arrange for him to stay with a friend or neighbour.
Transit: HOW TO MOVE · Our flat is at walking distance from most of the main tourist sites, shops, markets, restaurants…  · Most food shops and markets do home delivery · There is very little need for public transport · No need for a car in Madrid Centre CITY BIKES · There is a nice City Electric Bike service available in Madrid : very cheap and quick reservation. TAXIS Cheap taxis, plenty of them, easy to hail while passing, fluid traffic… On short distances and for a group, it can be cheaper to take a taxi rather than travel by metro or bus. METRO 100m from Alonso Martinez metro which has three metro lines (10,4 and7). Buy a cheap (€12) "10 ticket" metro which works on the buses as well AUTOBUS EMT · There is a bus stop with at least 3 lines on the road.  · Use metro tickets that you will have bought at the metro desk. · All buses and bus stops provide free wifi.  CAR PARK · Low cost long term car park at 15 minutes driving (around 30€-40€ /week), with “coach service Door to Park" available
Access: All areas of the flat shown in photos are available. Only one room is locked and not available. Bikes and prams can be safely stored on the landing just outside the flat. Access to the flat is via a lift so there are no stairs.
Interaction: WELCOMING  * We aim to personally welcome all our guests, but in case this is not possible, we will arrange a personal welcome by a trusted friend  * We will be available for phone or video calls at any time during the stay of our guests * You are most welcome to use our tourist books and maps  * Basic food will be available in the fridge and cupboards for your arrival * Provided : Freshly laundered bed sheets, towels, hair dryer, body items (shampoo…), usual domestic products BOOKLET for SUGGESTIONS and ADVICE · A booklet at your disposal at home for specific details and for our 'Best of' advice in Madrid
House Rules: * We only accept guests who can provide us with at least 2 good Airbnb reviews. However, if you are willing to provide us with more information about yourselves, we can make exceptions. * We are strict about the number of guests booked - please make sure that you book with the correct number of guests including children and infants.  * No smoking within the flat but welcome to smoke out on the terrace. * Strickly no parties allowed and please be careful to minimise noise after 10pm to respect the neighbours peace and quiet. * Guests are welcome to leave their luggage in the flat after check-out until needed for return trip. * We have a cat in the flat, but if you are allergic or do not like cats, we can arrange to leave him with a neighbour for your stay.
Host About:
French-British couple living right in the heart of Madrid for the last 20 years - so we know Madrid and Spain pretty well and can give you lots of advice, the best places to eat nearby, places to visit, etc. We have our own little guide !
Passionate about cooking with friends and family - like travelling a lot, specially to India. Have our own business in events and marketing. We speak French, English and Spanish.
Favourite movie: "The Hundred-Foot Journey"

Airbnb is a great idea: so much more interesting to visit a place when staying with people who can give you all the local tips - a much more personal and enriching experience.

Name: Buhardilla con encanto en Malasaña.
Summary: Preciosa buhardilla diáfana en pleno centro de Madrid, junto a la plaza de San Ildefonso.
Space: Disfruta del encanto de Malasaña sin renunciar al confort de una casa con todas las comodidades.
Description: Preciosa buhardilla diáfana en pleno centro de Madrid, junto a la plaza de San Ildefonso. Disfruta del encanto de Malasaña sin renunciar al confort de una casa con todas las comodidades. Se trata de una cuarta planta sin ascensor. Cuenta con baño completo con ducha, cocina equipada, lavadora y secadora. ADSL, smart TV y equipo de música.  La sala principal está dividida en dos espacios: el primero, muy amplio y de techo alto, cuenta con un armario, una gran mesa y la cocina. En el espacio más abuhardillado hay un colchón de 1,50 sobre un tatami japonés, una cómoda y un sofá con chaise longue, muy cómodo, frente al televisor.  Dispone además de otra habitación con un colchón de 1,35, menos confortable al estar muy abuhardillada. Atención permanente las 24 horas La casa se encuentra en una de las zonas más divertidas y pintorescas de la ciudad, el barrio de Malasaña, junto a la plaza de San Ildefonso. Sus calles y plazas, q fueron la cuna de la movida madrileña de los años 80, son peaton
Neighborhood Overview: La casa se encuentra en una de las zonas más divertidas y pintorescas de la ciudad, el barrio de Malasaña, junto a la plaza de San Ildefonso. Sus calles y plazas, q fueron la cuna de la movida madrileña de los años 80, son peatonales y albergan los comercios, bares y restaurantes más vanguardistas de la ciudad.  A pesar de estar en pleno corazón de Madrid, el silencio y el descanso están garantizados ya que, al tratarse de una buhardilla, las ventanas están localizadas en el tejado.
Transit: Situada a 4 minutos a pie de la estación de metro de Tribunal (líneas de metro 1 y 10), a 8 minutos a pie de la Gran Via (estación de metro Callao, líneas 3 y 5) y a 13 minutos a pie de la Puerta del Sol (líneas C3 y C4 de Cercanías RENFE). A menos de un minuto de la parada de autobús más cercana (línea M2)

Host About:
Somos una pareja que vive con sus dos gatas en un precioso piso en el Barrio Salamanca de Madrid. Nos encanta conocer gente y viajar. Los dos somos emprendedores con proyectos dedicados a la salud y el bienestar, buscamos mejorar los hábitos e las personas y así crear un mundo más sano y sostenible.

Nuestra casa es ideal para venir de vacaciones o para estancias cortas por trabajo, es una casa sin ruidos, muy tranquila y con unos vecinos muy respetuosos.
Es una casa con mucha luz, ubicada en el centro de Madrid, con los mejores restaurantes, rincones y tiendas de todo Madrid.

El descanso es fundamental, por ello los colchones son nuevos y de calidad.

Los dos somos de Madrid, podemos recomendarte mil rincones que nos salen en las guías de viaje, ya que nos dedicamos por ocio a investigar la ciudad que amamos. Cuando viajamos nos encanta que nos recomienden lugares "NO TURÍSTICOS" para absorber la esencia cultural y la magia de la ciudad

Al levantarte te prepararemos un desayuno  ecológico:
 - smoothie de frutas y verduras ecológicas con agua filtrada purificada
- sin gluten ni lactosa (si lo deseas)
-  café, té o infusión con tosadas, todo ecológico
- complemento de vitaminas, minerales y fitonutrientes

ASÍ ES COMO SE EMPIEZA UN BUEN DÍA!!

Y si eres deportista, tienes una sesión incluída de entrenamiento funcional al aire libre en el Parque del Retiro.

;)

We are a couple living With Their two cats in a beautiful flat in the Salamanca neighborhood of Madrid. We love meeting people and traveling. We are entrepreneurs With Both projects dedicated to health and wellness, we seek to improve increase the habits and people and create a healthier and more sustainable world.

Our house is ideal place to come on holiday or for short breaks for business, it is a house without noise, very quiet and very friendly neighbors.
It is a house with lots of light, located in the center of Madrid, with the best restaurants, shops corners and in Madrid.

Rest is essential, so the mattresses are new and quality.

The two are from Madrid, we recommend leaving Thousands of places us in the guidebooks, and we are dedicated leisure to investigate the city we love. When we travel we love to recommend us "non-tourist" places culture to absorb the essence and magic of the city

When you wake up you to prepare an organic breakfast:
- Smoothie organic fruit and vegetables with purified filtered water
- Gluten-free and lactose (if desired)
- Coffee, tea or infusion tosadas all ecological
- Complement of vitamins, minerals and phytonutrients

THIS IS HOW A GOOD DAY BEGINS !!

And if you are an athlete, You have a functional outdoor training session included Retiro Park.

;)

Host About:
ENGLISH

I am a Canarian Actress from Lanzarote, who has lived in Madrid for 7 years. Due to my job, I perfectly know the life and cultural scene of the city, and I can recommend you the best places to enjoy a unique experience in Madrid: from live shows to the best bars, clubs, restaurants, or just beautiful locations to have a walk and get immersed in the ambience of such a magical city.

Besides theatre and cinema, I love music, yoga, meeting people from all around the world, and cuisine.

I hope you Enjoy your stay in my apartment, and get back home filled with all the wonderful experiences Madrid can offer!

-----------


ESPAÑOL

Soy una actriz canaria de Lanzarote que vino a Madrid a vivir hace ya 7 años. Por mi trabajo, conozco perfectamente la vida y la cultura de la ciudad, y puedo recomendarte los mejores sitios para poder disfrutar de una experiencia única en Madrid: desde espectáculos, hasta bares, restaurantes o simplemente lugares por donde pasear y sumergirse en el ambiente de una ciudad con tanta magia.

Además del teatro y el cine, me encanta la música, el yoga, conocer gente de otros lugares y la cocina.

¡Espero que disfrutes de tu estancia en mi apartamento, y que vuelvas a casa cargado de todas las experiencias maravillosas que Madrid puede ofrecerte!

Neighborhood Overview: We love the street where the apartment is located. Graced on one side by the imposing, historical Cultural Center Conde Duque and on the other side by cute stores, cafes and restaurants, it is an ideal neighborhood. At night it is well lit by old fashioned lantern type lights.
Transit: Several metro lines are within short walking distance. The red Madrid tourist buses (as well as normal buses) are just 3 blocks away.
Access: The apartment is surrounded by restaurants, cafes, a museum and a cultural center: it is across the street from the Centro Cultural Conde Duque which houses music concerts and cultural events and has cafes in a huge inner patio. Just a few yards away, you can rent electrical bikes to tour the city with. The apartment is: 3 blocks from Plaza España, Malasaña.and Palacio de Liria, 5 blocks from Gran Via and Palacio Real.
Interaction: We enjoy having solid, warm interaction with you, our guests. Before you even arrive in Madrid and if you are not familiar with the city, we like to send to you by email a "welcome kit" which includes tips about Madrid, restaurants to dine in and directions to the apartment. In most cases, one of the two partners will be on hand to personally receive you. And after your arrival, we are always available for questions and we are very responsive to your needs and questions to insure that you have the best experience possible during your stay with us.

Host About:
My name is Luz and my mission is to offer the world traveler a warm and memorable experience. Clean apartments in fantastic locations at the best possible rates go hand in hand with friendly, attentive customer service. Having lived in different cities across the globe, I firmly believe that the attention to quality and detail is the safest way to embrace tourists and make them feel at home... so that they want to come back.

Mi nombre es Luz, y mi proposito es hacer que el viajero mundial tenga una experiencia calida y memorable con nosotros. Apartamentos limpios, con excelentes ubicaciones y a tarifas muy accesibles deben ir acompañado con un servicio agradable y atento al cliente. Habiendo vivido en diferentes paises del mundo, creo firmemente que la atencion a la calidad y al detalle es la forma mas segura de abrazar al turista y hacerlos sentir tan en casa... que quieran volver a visitarnos.
