Name: Outstanding flat in Cibeles square -Casa del Prado
Summary: One of the prize properties of our vast Madrid portfolio. Decorated by renowned designer Blanca Fabré and featured in decoration magazines such as Nuevo Estilo. A truly luxurious base with a premium location right in the very heart of the capital.
Space: The apartment itself exudes floor-to-ceiling quality, from its setting within an historic building to its interior dressing, which was performed by Blanca Fabre – an interior designer whose portfolio includes the homes of some highly-renowned Spaniards. Furthermore, it is brand new, having had its comprehensive refurbishment completed this year (2015). An expansive and elongated living room forms the main focal point of this home, and its elegant furnishings include two chaises longues, a three-seater sofa and two armchairs among other smaller trimmings at one end. At the other end, a giant Apple TV screen and multimedia docking station transform it into a personal, home entertainment lounge when necessary. Huge, French-style double doors leading out onto their own balconies invite an abundance of light into the room, which is then reflected by the interiors to give it an even greater sense of space. The living area is separated from the dining area, which in turn is separated from the
Description: One of the prize properties of our vast Madrid portfolio. Decorated by renowned designer Blanca Fabré and featured in decoration magazines such as Nuevo Estilo. A truly luxurious base with a premium location right in the very heart of the capital. The apartment itself exudes floor-to-ceiling quality, from its setting within an historic building to its interior dressing, which was performed by Blanca Fabre – an interior designer whose portfolio includes the homes of some highly-renowned Spaniards. Furthermore, it is brand new, having had its comprehensive refurbishment completed this year (2015). An expansive and elongated living room forms the main focal point of this home, and its elegant furnishings include two chaises longues, a three-seater sofa and two armchairs among other smaller trimmings at one end. At the other end, a giant Apple TV screen and multimedia docking station transform it into a personal, home entertainment lounge when necessary. Huge, French-style double doors lea
Neighborhood Overview: The apartment sits within a premium location, from which many of the city’s most established and recognizable landmarks and hotspots are easily accessible, including the Palacio Real, Plaza de Cibeles and Madrid’s holy trinity of art museums, the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofía. In fact, these three pillars prop up the dense cluster of culture that surrounds the apartment; from your charming base, you can almost reach out and touch the Circulo de Bellas Artes – the cultural epicentre from which arguably the finest panoramic views of the city can be best enjoyed.
Notes: Daily cleaning of 2 hours (to coordinate during the check in) is included in price.
Transit: Meanwhile, a short drive up the nearby grand avenue known as Paseo del Prado will sweep you swiftly onto Paseo de Castellana in the exclusive Salamanca neighborhood, where world class retail therapy – courtesy of a grand assembly of heavyweight global brands – awaits. Fine dining and other luxuries of leisure can also be found here. Los Madrazo’s immediate vicinity is also well connected by two metro stations in the form of Banco de España and Sevilla, with several bus and taxi connections enhancing its relationship with the rest of Madrid.
Access: Amenities: Lift, Apple TV, Wifi High-Speed Internet, Under Floor Heating, Central Air Conditioning, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Washer / Dryer, Oven, Microwave, Wine Fridge, Multi-Device dock station.
Interaction: We will arrange the check in time depending on your arrival time. It is normally from 4pm but we will do our best to have the apartment ready for you ASAP. Anything you need during your stay, feel free to contact us! We are happy to help!
House Rules: Arrivals after 21:00 may be subject to an extra charge. Remember to let us know your arrival time in advance! *We ask our guests to sign a rental agreement upon arrival and leave details of a credit card as a further security measure. This information will be destroyed after you have left the property and we have conducted a check-out inspection*
Host About:
Spain Select was born from the recognition of a desire among travelers to live locally in a real home whilst away from their own, and yet still enjoy all of the benefits and small luxuries of a hotel stay. Not only that, though, we understood that they also wanted to be close to all of the best that their destination has to offer – to be right in the heart of it all. So we decided to source a broad range of high quality homes in the most sought after locations across the country, starting with the capital Madrid and moving over to Malaga, Valencia, and Seville. We then added a few unique flourishes that embody our brand of service and our values. Our interior design team works to extract and enhance the natural charm from each space and make it a warm home. Our very own in-house Local Ambassadors are posted in each destination to welcome each guest home and bed them in to the neighborhood when they first arrive. Finally, a selection of hotel-like services – including a 24-hour concierge for everything from show tickets to new sheets – and a motorized maintenance team completes our comprehensive customer care throughout every single stay. Every Spain Select experience is unique, yet they are all of a consistent high quality no matter when you stay with us. 

Live local, sleep royal: welcome to Spain Select.

Neighborhood Overview: Estamos junto a la Plaza de España, encrucijada de la ciudad cultural y comercial. En una calle tranquila de una zona abundante en comercios, teatros, restaurantes y locales de entretenimiento nocturno.
Notes: Podrán solicitar el uso particular de la lavadora y la cocina. Tales servicios no están incluidos en el precio dela reserva.
Transit: Las líneas de metro y autobús, desde nuestro barrio, llevan a cualquier punto de la ciudad. Y con cortos paseos de cinco a quince minutos estarás en el   Madrid más céntrico, monumental y de ocio.
Access: Servicio de desayuno incluido en el precio, entre las 8 y las 10,30 horas. Salón, terraza y hall a disposición del huésped.
Interaction: Siempre estamos disponibles para asesorar, ayudar y acompañar a nuestros huéspedes.
House Rules: Educación y respeto por las normas básicas de convivencia, incluidas en ellas el compromiso de no desatar ruidos excesivos que molesten al resto de los huéspedes de casa y al vecindario. Esta norma implica, por tanto, respetar las horas de sueño ajeno, entre las 23,00 y las 08,00 horas.    El desayuno lo servimos entre las 08,00 y las 10,00 de la mañana. Está incluido sólo para las estancias menores de una semana, que no gozan de descuento.     A cada huésped o pareja de huéspedes que llegan a nuestras habitaciones se les entrega un juego de dos llaves (portal y puerta de casa), que deberán restituirnos al terminar su estancia con nosotros. De ello se deduce que, salvo en casos de extrema necesidad,  no deberán llamar a nuestro timbre de portero automático, en las horas estipuladas más arriba para el descanso nocturno.(URL HIDDEN)-El huésped sólo podrá traer a personas extrañas a la casa y a su reserva, bajo consentimiento del anfitrión. Interaction: We are doing the check in at the office, located at: Calle San Marcos, 9, Bajo Izquierda 28004, MADRID. There, we receive the customers, deliver the keys and explain the rules of the apartment. We also solve all kind of questions and doubts the customer could have at that point.
House Rules: Checkin is done at our office. The address: Calle San Marcos 9 28004 MADRID Our office hours are from 10.00 to 21.00. Late checkin (after 21.00 hours) is done in the apartment and has a surcharge of 30 euros. Guests arriving after office hours have to call ahead to inform about your arrival. No parties allowed at any part of the accommodation. Noises and volume must be controlled from 22:00 to 10:00 because all the accommodations are placed in normal neighborhoods so the rest of the people could be bothered. There are not more beds than the announced ones. The cribs are only available under petition. Smoking is not allowed. Pets are not allowed. We hope guests are polite and know how to behave. When checking out, please leave the keys on the table and take out the rubbish, if there is any generated on your stay, to the containers located out of the building.

Neighborhood Overview: Formado por los barrios de Trafalgar, Arapiles, Gaztambide, Vallehermoso, Ríos Rosas y Almagro, el distrito de Chamberí fue zona de residencia de buena parte de la aristocracia de los siglos XIX y XX.
Transit: Chamberí alberga el Museo Sorolla y el Museo Geominero. El primero está situado en la casa donde vivió el pintor valenciano y, al margen de la exposición de sus cuadros, una visita a sus instalaciones permite disfrutar de sus valiosas colecciones de esculturas, muebles y cerámicas, así como de su fantástico jardín. No muy lejos se encuentra Andén Cero - Estación de Chamberí, una antigua estación de metro, cerrada en 1969, y que se ha rehabilitado para convertirla en un centro de interpretación del Metro de Madrid. Nos permite remontarnos al Madrid de 1919, año en el que se inauguró la primera línea del metropolitano que cruzaba el centro de la ciudad desde Cuatro Caminos hasta Gran Vía. Otro punto histórico es la plaza de Olavide, en Trafalgar, una acogedora plaza ajardinada con muchas terrazas, lugar habitual de reunión y tapeo. A caballo entre los barrios de Arapiles y Vallehermoso, en la calle Cea Bermúdez, y sobre un moderno complejo de 35.200 metros cuadrados dedicados al arte esc
Access: las zonas comunes son las normales de cualquier edificio, Portal, ascensor y escaleras.

The apartment is ideal for visiting the sites of major interest in the city such as Plaza Mayor, the wonderful “Mercado de San Miguel” (San Miguel´s Market), La Latina neighborhood, the Royal Theatre and the Palace, only a few minutes on foot. It is located in a pedestrian street with restricted traffic, noise isolated despite being outside and being in the busiest area of the city. Neighborhood Overview: Located in the historical center it represents a great choice for anyone looking to spend time in the exciting and vibrant Spanish capital. This area includes the origins of Madrid through its narrow winding streets. It located in the heart of old Madrid, the area of greatest personality of the city and best commercial, cultural and leisure activities. You only have to go a little beyond Plaza Mayor to discover some of the great surprises Madrid offers, as the Mercado de San Miguel, a beautiful iron structure dating from 1913 and which houses an interesting Spanish cuisine where you can taste and buy high quality products. A few steps away is the “Arco de Cuchilleros”, a good place to drink good wine in his classic taverns or eat in typical Castillian mesons. The best known is La Casa Botin, founded in 1725, it still retains the old house and the original oven. Also a few minutes away you will find the Almudena Cathedral and the Royal Palace, the elegant Plaza de Oriente and the Opera

Host About:
I live in Madrid, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleague Luis and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Madrid. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

Vivo en Madrid, una ciudad que me ha cautivado desde el principio por su cultura, historia y belleza. Trabajo como manager para Aspasios y no podía pensar en un mejor trabajo: a Aspasios nos encanta que nuestros huéspedes se sientan como en casa. Una gran parte de nuestro trabajo es escuchar atentamente a nuestros visitantes: aprendemos mucho de ellos todos los días. Nos gusta conocer a todos y cada uno de los que vienen a quedarse con nosotros, y queremos ser la causa para que vuelvan. Nos enorgullecemos de ser amables y profesionales al mismo tiempo. En Aspasios, nos apasiona la hospitalidad.
Mis colegas y yo estamos siempre a tu disposición para ayudarte a sacar el máximo provecho de tu viaje a Madrid. Conocemos que esta ciudad de adentro hacia afuera, y podemos recomendar restaurantes, bares y actividades que no puedes encontrar en los libros de guía!

From the variety of services you can choose from to live the perfect stay -tranfers, restaurant reservations, tickets for you favourite shows...-, your City Mate will be there for you, even filling up the fridge! Vivo en Madrid y trato de disfrutar todo lo posible por lo que me gusta estar al día de todas aquellas cosas por las que merece la pena vivir aquí.
Me encanta viajar y alojar a gente interesada  en conocer y disfrutar de los distintos lugares,  personas que saben sacarle partido a sus estancias y experiencias.

Creo que hospedarse con Airbnb es una experiencia única para contactar con gente que vive en la ciudad de destino y tener un punto de vista interesante de la ciudad. Es una forma de conocer la ciudad integrándose mucho más en ella.

Muchas gracias por confiar en Airbnb.

Name: Charming apartment
Summary: Nice and renewd apartment in a typical Corrala of Madrid, perfect for a couple but there is a bed-sofa for two people available. You will enjoy the popular and multicultural Lavapiés district.
Space: The apartament is located in a typical madrilean Corrala. A Corrala is a characteristic type of building very common in the old Madrid, designed as a "long corridor" house usually made of wood with balconyes that face an indor space. The Corralas were inhabited by a popular and "castiza" (typical from old Madrid) population during the (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) and XIX centuries. The Corralas can be found in many novels along the times... Nowadays, 400 different Corralas can be still found in Madrid, many of them very popular. In the last years the Corralas are being restored and lived by young people.
Description: Nice and renewd apartment in a typical Corrala of Madrid, perfect for a couple but there is a bed-sofa for two people available. Neighborhood Overview: The apartment is located in the popular Lavapiés district at 5 minutes walking from the Reina Sofía museum.  Some years ago when inmigration increased in Madrid the district turned to a very multicultural part of the city (with the positive and negative points). But this mix up of people from everywhere made what Lavapiés is now: a colourful, popularm, and bohemian district. Young people has returned to live here and this made Lavapiés an open space full of cousy and nice Cafés, restaurants or theaters.
Notes: Madrid is a safe city either during the day or even in the night. Don´t be afraid to walk at any time. Madrileans are very open and kind people always available for help. Just take care of bags in the tourist parts of the city, as you will be in any other big city.  Late check in: kindly note that a late check in (after 22.00) will be charged with an extra fee of 20 €.
Transit: The nearest Metro station is Antón Martín. We are 5 minutes walking form the Atocha Station, the Reina Sofía Museum and 10min from the Prado Museum or Las Letras district. If you arrive at the Madrid airport the Express Shuttle 24h will leave you in Atocha.
Access: The Corrala has a central common "patio" (courtyard), where you will find that the neighbours sit to talk or uses to hang up their laundry. You can also use it for the same purpose as one of them. We have a small private space with a table a two chairs to have a relaxing cup of coffee. There is also and interior open space where you can find the washing-machine.
Interaction: We will contact you some days before your arrival date so we can cordinate properly your check in. Both Federico and  Estela, will be glad and available anytime to help you with any useful information you should need about Lavapiés quarter or any other place in Madrid.
House Rules: La Corrala es una edificación muy abierta y cualquier ruido excesivo molestaría a los vecinos. Por favor, está estríctamente prohibido hacer fiestas o ruido que pueda perjudicar la convivencia tranquila del resto de vecinos.

Neighborhood Overview: Malasaña is one of the trendiest "barrios" in Madrid, you can stop for a tapa in one of the countless bars or enjoy micro-theatre performances. You can wander in the little streets surrounding the historic Plaza del 2 de Mayo square just a stone throw from the Gran Vía Avenue and Plaza del Sol. The neighborhood counts as well on thriving cultural life such as theatres, art galleries and the main city museums (Prado, Reina Sofia, Thyssen), which are very close. Fashion victims will be pleased to stroll through Fuencarral Street and its surroundings with their vast array of trendy and vintage shops as well as the main international franchises. Should you be interested in a particular activity let us know so we can share our local knowledge.

Name: COZY and TRENDY in the heart of LA LATINA!!!
Summary: Prime location in the Barrio de los Austrias, the oldest in the city. Next to the Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor. Elegant, warm and comfortable home in newly renovated historic building. Full equipped. WIFI / AC.
Space: In the oldest district of Madrid, you will find this apartment of 80 m2, fully equipped. The wooden pillars of the living room recall the antiquity of the building combined with all the luxuries and needs of a modern home creating a warm, pleasant and sophisticated space, perfect refuge after the unbridled days that the city of Madrid offers. The farm, from the mid-nineteenth century, has been completely renovated, keeping the essence of the authentic Madrid Castizo with its characteristic solid pine stairs and revoked facades. The living room is turned into the street by two balconies, making you feel that you were in another era while enjoying the dome of the church of San Andrés or the Mudejar tower of San Pedro el Viejo, slightly sloping, the oldest in Madrid. In this area are the sofa (which is a double bed of 120cm), desk, television, dining table and wonderful plants that give joy to the stay. It is also worth mentioning the plan of Teixeira del Madrid in the mid-seventeenth cen

Neighborhood Overview: Located in the neighborhood of La Latina, in the heart of Old Madrid, in the old town. Less than five minutes you can visit the monumental Madrid de los Austrias with the Royal Palace, the Almudena Cathedral and the Opera de Madrid. Walked a little more you can enjoy the Rastro flea market (Sundays and holidays, outdoor market with more than a quarter of a millennium of existence) and most traditional Madrid with Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol mythical. You cross the Gran Vía, full of theaters and musicals, you are immediately Malasaña and Chueca, known as the gay neighborhood, full of trendy shops, terraces, cafes and restaurants. And in a pleasant walk of less than ten minutes, crossing the peculiar district of Las Letras, you will come directly to the Prado, Reina Sofia and Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum. If you want to go a little further, two steps you find yourself with Plaza de Spain that connects you directly with all other districts of Madrid and its surroundings. Sunday is the mos
Notes: The air conditioning machine is in the living room. The rest of the house is cool because it does not receive direct sunlight and is in an old building with very thick walls.
Transit: Given its central location you can move walk or take a bike Town Hall ( BiciMAD ) to 100 meters from the apartment . If you want to move around the rest of the city there are a few minutes connections with the public transport system : Metro La Latina ( Line 5 ) at 100 m . Opera Metro ( lines 2 , 5 and R ) at 200 m . Metro Tirso de Molina ( Line 1 ) at 300 m . Metro Sol ( Lines 1 , 2 and 3 ) 500 m . Tourist bus Madrid Vision, 300m

Soy arquitecto por vocación y hostelero por tradición familiar. Vecino de La Latina desde hace más de 20 años, mi actividad profesional se ha desarrollado y se desarrolla en gran parte en el centro de Madrid y en particular en este peculiar barrio de bohemios y artistas donde he rehabilitado y/o reformado numerosos edificios, viviendas y negocios. Me encantará poner a tu disposición mis conocimientos sobre la arquitectura, la cultura y el ocio del centro de Madrid.

Name: Apartamento Santiago Bernabéu - Castellana
Summary: Apartamento de lujo frente al Estadio Santiago Bernabéu - Real Madrid.  Este apartamento está situado en el lugar perfecto para vivir una experiencia única acompañado de tu pareja, familia o amigos en la ciudad de MADRID.   Si eres un enamorado del fútbol, del Real Madrid o de esta gran ciudad; este apartamento es la mejor opción por sus vistas, su equipamiento de alta gama y su ubicación. Mi alojamiento es bueno para parejas, aventureros, viajeros de negocios, y familias (con hijos).
Space: El apartamento, de alta gama, dispone de las mejores vistas posibles de la ciudad de Madrid. Podrás ver el Santiago Bernabéu, los rascacielos de las 4 Torres Business Area, la Torre Picasso (AZCA) o el Paseo de la Castellana sin moverte de casa.  Se trata de una zona residencial de Madrid donde puedes disfrutar de muchos restaurantes, supermercados (Simply, Carrefour, Aldi) o centros comerciales como Moda Shopping, La Esquina del Bernabéu o El Corte Inglés de Castellana (todos a menos de 5 minutos andando). Es un apartamento muy bien comunicado con el centro de Madrid. A 10-15 minutos del centro en metro. 3 minutos de distancia con el Santiago Bernabéu y 20 minutos al Aeropuerto Madrid-Barajas en metro. El apartamento dispone de dos dormitorios. El dormitorio principal con una cama de 1,50 m. y el segundo dormitorio tiene una cama de 1,20 m. A su vez cuenta con una televisión de 40 " con una decoración moderna pero, a la vez, acogedora y cuidada para que te sientas como en tu hogar.  E

Neighborhood Overview: Barrio residencial en una de las mejores zonas de Madrid.  El apartamento está situado entre el Estadio Santiago Bernabéu - Paseo de la Castellana - AZCA Distrito Financiero (Torre Picasso) de Madrid.  Restaurantes, centros comerciales, parques y una tranquilidad absoluta para disfrutar de los encantos de Madrid. Perfectamente comunicado con el centro de la ciudad y sus principales atractivos.
Transit: Metro: Las paradas de metro son Santiago Bernabéu (línea 10 azul oscuro, conectada con el centro de la ciudad) o Nuevos Ministerios (línea 6 gris, conectada con todo Madrid de manera circular). Nuevos Ministerios es línea directa con el Aeropuerto Madrid - Barajas (20 minutos). Tren Cercanias: Parada de Nuevos Ministerios conectada con estación de Sol. El centro de Madrid a escasos 10 minutos en transporte público.  Bus: Más de 5 autobuses para ir al centro de Madrid o moverse por la ciudad. Todos se cogen en Paseo de la Castellana (3 minutos).  Taxi: Dos paradas de taxi en frente del apartamento. No hay que esperar para disfrutar del servicio. Un taxi al centro son 8 € desde el apartamento.
Access: Todo el apartamento está disponible para su uso y disfrute, sin ningun tipo de limitaciones.
Interaction: Podéis contar conmigo en todo lo que necesitéis respecto de la ciudad de Madrid.  Si necesitas entradas para el Real Madrid o Atlético de Madrid, también te las gestiono encantado.  Si necesitas información de la ciudad o consejos, estaré encantado en ayudarte a vivir unas vacaciones perfectas :)
Host About:
HI and WELCOME to Madrid: "De madrid al cielo" :)

I am Gonzalo and I´m here to offer you a great experience in one of the most social, good weather, cultural and party cities in the world.

I became an entrepreneur a year ago and I manage a toursim-leisure tech business in Madrid, so I am a good advisor about the party, culture, leisure, tourism, museums or food places and Madrid experience. 

I love to help people to enjoy my city. This is one of my passions, so I designed a social app called it "Quorum Groups" to help you to enjoy Madrid and make new friends while you are in my/our city. 

Ask me whatever you need and I will be so glad to help you anytime. I really like to help new friends to discover the secrets of Madrid. There are many so I wish you could discover them :) 

I travel a lot because of my job to more than 25 countries so I do like to welcome people from all over the world to my apartment and it is so important to me to offer you one of your best experience in your life. 

I need, as a good traveler, to discover new people and share my life experience with them. I am spanish so we live from our hearts, that is why my favourite sentece for life is: Clear Eyes. Full hearts. Can´t lose. 

Let´s connect :) and if you need anything else or you have any doubt just text me and I will help you as much as I know. 

Welcome to the city of soccer, sun and social life: 

This is Madrid :)

Name: DELUXE Pza MAYOR monthly rentals
Summary: Beautiful apartment behing Plaza Mayor and located in an authentic "corrala" from the XVI century properly equipped with everything needed to live here.
Space: This elegantly decorated apartment is very quiet and has lots of light. It is located in a historic building which was formerly a convent and has been recently refurbished with high quality care – everything is brand new.  The apartment is in the fourth floor (ground + 4) of a walk-up building, like most buildings in the centre of Madrid... so there is NO elevator, but we can always help you carry your luggage upstairs!
Description: Beautiful apartment behing Plaza Mayor and located in an authentic "corrala" from the XVI century properly equipped with everything needed to live here. This elegantly decorated apartment is very quiet and has lots of light. It is located in a historic building which was formerly a convent and has been recently refurbished with high quality care – everything is brand new.  The apartment is in the fourth floor (ground + 4) of a walk-up building, like most buildings in the centre of Madrid... so there is NO elevator, but we can always help you carry your luggage upstairs! The apartment is composed of:  * A living room with stylish decoration, big sofa, 42”TV, DVD player, A/C, folding table * Living room balcony which lets in lots of light; it looks out over Toledo Street and one of the entrances to the Plaza Mayor -- really wonderful views! The balcony doors are insulated, so when closed no noise will disturb you during your stay. * Marble floors throughout * Kitchen is open plan to the
Neighborhood Overview: In this apartment, you are in the heart of “Madrid de los Austrias”, or Hapsburg Madrid – an area full of history. You are steps away from the Plaza Mayor and just a couple of minutes’ walk from the Puerta del Sol, the official center of Spain. There are lots of restaurants, bars, gardens, open squares, and shops all around the area.
Notes: • Our check in time is from 4pm, this meaning that by then the apartment will be ready (although often it will be ready before). However, if you come to Madrid earlier, we will make our best so that you can drop your luggage from 11:30am during week days (no extra cost involved, it's just a courtesy) or at the time when the cleaning lady is there on weekends (we'll try to adjust her schedule to yours).  • In case you plan to arrive after 9pm, check in can be arranged by any of the following options:  1. A pick up from your arrival point (train station/airport/bus station) with the taxi driver we normally work with. He would pick you up and bring you to the apartment, leaving you settled and giving you a set of keys. The cost of this service is 10€ plus the regular taxi fare.  2.Reception in the apartment by us from 9pm to 11pm (subject to payment of 15 euro as late check in fee). Unfortunately after 11pm we are not able to meet you in person, so the taxi would be the only option.  Plea
Transit: The location of the apartment is perfect for visiting Madrid without even having to use our good public transport network. You can reach all the major sites within a 15 minute walk (or much less!): Gran Via, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, the Royal Palace, the Prado and Reina Sofia museums, the Retiro Park, the Rastro and La Latina, etc.  These are the walking distances to some landmarks: - Plaza Mayor Square: 1 min - Sol Square: 4 min - Opera Square: 5 minutes. - Royal Palace: 6 minutes. - Shopping at Gran Vía Avenue and Callao Square: 7 minutes. - Relax at Sabatini Royal Gardens: 7 minutes. But whenever you want to use the metro, the nearest stops are just 5 minutes away: Sol (line 1) and La Latina (line 2).  You definitely won’t have any problems getting where you want to go from here!
Access: The apartment is composed of:  * A living room with stylish decoration, big sofa, 42”TV, DVD player, A/C, folding table * Living room balcony which lets in lots of light; it looks out over Toledo Street and one of the entrances to the Plaza Mayor -- really wonderful views! The balcony doors are insulated, so when closed no noise will disturb you during your stay. * Marble floors throughout * Kitchen is open plan to the living room and fully equipped with everything you need to cook and eat, including stove, microwave, oven and refrigerator.  * Bedroom with a super comfy double bed (140 x 200 cm) with bedside tables and lamps.  * A bathroom with everything done in marble and a nice shower.  * Service room with washing machine (laundry detergent included!), dryer and spacious closet.  * Wi-Fi is also available during your stay, we know that’s important ;)  *Baby cot available under request, 10€/stay    Of course, fresh linen and towels are provided, as well as an iron, hair dryer, etc. W
Interaction: Upon your arrival, one of us will be there to greet you and provide you with all sorts of information we’ve prepared to make your stay smooth, pleasant and enjoyable. And we're available at any time during your stay for any questions, or even for a drink :)!
House Rules: •  LOS DÍAS 24 Y 31 DE DICIEMBRE NO SE HACEN CHECK INS DESPUÉS DE LAS 14HORAS. LOS DÍAS 25 DE DICIEMBRE, 1 Y 6 DE ENERO NO SE HACEN CHECK IN NI CHECK OUTS, POR LO QUE NO SE ADMITEN RESERVAS CON LLEGADA/SALIDA ESOS DÍAS. • El horario de check in a las 4pm significa la hora a la que el apartamento estará listo para su uso (aunque muchas veces estará listo antes). No obstante, si llegáis a Madrid antes de esa hora, podremos recibiros para que dejéis las maletas y os demos las llaves a partir de las 11:00 (sin coste adicional, es simplemente una cortesía). Eso sí, entre las 2pm y las 4pm no siempre os podremos recibir, puesto que esa es la hora en la que volvemos a casa a cocinar y comer. En caso de que lleguéis justo en esa horquilla horaria, os podremos recomendar algún restaurante cerca para vuestra primera comida en Madrid. • Aceptamos entradas tardías a partir de las 21:00 (late check in), para lo que ofrecemos dos opciones: 1.Un servicio de recogida por taxista que os deja en el apar
Host About:
Hi!!

We welcome you to Spain and we wish you a good stay in Madrid!

Oscar works as a photographer and Vanessa is an actress and theatre producer. However, until some years ago Oscar was an engineer and Vanessa was a M&A lawyer. And then one day we decided to turn our lifes up side down and follow our real passions.

We are best friends and on May 2012 we decided to move forward and enroll in a small business together. Vanessa had been hosting with Airbnb for 2 years by then (renting the spare room at her place in Madrid/Milan and her apartment in Barcelona) and her experience (upgraded to Superhost in early 2011) was so positive that we decided we could also help other owners that don't live in town or don't have the time to rent their properties to travelers as you. And this is what we are doing now together. 

More about us, we love to travel: Vanessa has travelled 4 out of the 5 continents with a backpack that has been with her for 18 years now and now has enrolled in her new adventure: becoming a mum in spring 2017. Conversely, Oscar travels by bike and closer to Madrid, so as often as he can he takes his bike for a short trip in the mountains (he's really fit!). He has also spent several summers working in France. As the business grew, we took more people on board. Firstly Paula, a Venezuelan that has been living in Madrid for 10 years now, also keen on travels and on exploring new places. Paula is full of energy and we love her smiley caracter. And last but not least, Nuria, whom you'll see on weekends and public holidays (and more often when the baby will be born and Vanessa will disappear for a while).

We are also keen in meeting new people and learning new things from them, but more importantly, we want you to feel at home at any of our apartments and that you feel that there's someone in town who cares for you:-) 

We enjoy little life pleasures like riding our bicycles or growing our small organic vegetables gardens. We like eco-friendly environments since we care a lot about our planet. 


We will help you to find you like home in this beautiful city and we look forward to having the opportunity to meet you soon!!

Vanessa_Oscar_Paula (& Nuria)

Neighborhood Overview: The area where the apartment is located is simply wonderful. It is one of the best streets in Madrid to live, not only by the neighbors, where artists, TV presenters, politicians, etc. live. But for the wonderful park that we have in front of our house of more than 150 hectares, being the largest of Madrid: Parque del Oeste, also connected with the Casa de Campo where there are thousands of m2 of leisure. In the area there are several supermarkets (Carrefour, Corte Inglés, Dia, etc.) and plenty of bars and restaurants both for eating or drinking. It is famous the Paseo de Rosales for the places to have drinks in the evening or the aperitif in the terraces in the sunny mornings. In turn the Royal Palace and the historic center is just 10 minutes walking, so in many occasions you will not need to use transport. La zona en la que se encuentra la vivienda es simplemente maravillosa. Es una de las mejores calles de Madrid para vivir, no solamente por los vecinos, donde viven artistas, prese
Notes: Upon your arrival you are given a key to the apartment and the building. You are responsible for your care and for not allowing strangers to enter. Eres responsable de su cuidado y de no permitir la entrada a desconocidos. La pérdida de las llaves conlleva un coste de 30€ ( son de seguridad).
Transit: In the same street there are urban buses. Nearby are the Moncloa and Principe Pio interchanges, from which you can travel anywhere in and around Madrid. The urban transport in Madrid is very good and safe, as well as punctual. If you are going to be for a long period you should get the monthly card, with which you use all transport for a monthly bonus (for those under 26 is 20 € per month). Taxis are not too expensive and if you come from the airport you can opt for taxi (€ 30 flat rate) or metro to Arguelles station, which costs only € 5. But the best thing is that you can walk to a multitude of sites. En la misma calle hay autobuses urbanos. Host About:
Soy de Almuñécar, un pueblo precioso de la costa de Granada. 
 De Madrid me encanta el teatro, las cañas, el cocido madrileño, el tapeo por el rastro y sus domingos de sol . 

 De Málaga y mi pueblo el mar, los "espetos", las papas fritas, el "ajo blanco" y la luz.
Ésta es una de mis frases favoritas :
"Estate atento al encuentro con la vida y no a tus espectativas de la vida".

Hay Numerosos lugares de interés, como Palacio Real, Catedral de la Almudena, Tempo de Debot, Gran Vía, Plaza de España, Puerta del Sol, la sala de conciertos "Marco Aldani", museos, cine, galería de arte, discotecas, teatros, bares de tapas y mucho más. Host About:
Bienvenidos al mundo de Marga Casanova! Soy Marga, diseñadora de interiores, española nacida en Madrid. Mi trayectoria comenzó con el diseño y distribución de textil hogar, que siempre esta muy presente en mis proyectos. Otra parte importante en mis obras son las tapicerías  herencia de mi abuelo propietario de una de las mejores empresas del sector en los años 60.
Me encanta viajar, tengo grandes amigos en Portugal, Bélgica e Italia…donde me siento como en casa. Así me gustaría recibir a mis nuevos huéspedes en Madrid Boutique Suites: cinco apartamentos vacacionales diseñados con elegancia clásica y elementos de diseño puntuales. Todo un eclecticismo reflejo de un Madrid cultural, elegante y moderno a su vez. Situados en la mejor ubicación posible, justo en la puerta del Sol, centro neurálgico de la ciudad. 
Con una comunicación abierta y plena confianza,te atenderemos personalmente para un feliz hospedaje  en Madrid. 
Airbnb nos hace llegar hasta ti para que sueñes tu estancia con  las mejores fotos profesionales de  nuestros espacios Marga Casanova!!!
Welcome to Marga Casanova´s world! I am Marga, an interior designer, Spanish, born in Madrid My career began with the design and distribution of home textiles, which is always present in my projects. Another important part of my works are the fabric an heritage of my grandfather, the  owner of one of the best companies of the sector in the 60s.
I love traveling, I have great friends in Portugal, Belgium and Italy ... where I feel at home. So I would like to wellcome my new hosters  at Madrid  Boutique Suites:, four vacacional rental  designed with classic elegance and specific design elements. Eclectic atmophere which reflects a cultural ,elegant and modern Madrid, at the same time. Located in the best possible location, right on Puerta del Sol, the heart of the city.
With an open comunication and the confident that the guest will enjoyed, We will personally attend you to a happy stay in Madrid.
Airbnb makes us come to you to dream your stay with the best professional photos of our spaces Marga Casanova!

Name: Espectacular partamento junto a Gran Via
Space: Apartamento equipado con todas las comodidades. Cuentan con un dormitorio con opción a camas supletorias, grandes armarios empotrados, un espacioso salón comedor, un baño completo y una cocina totalmente equipada. Se trata de una calle quieta dentro de una zona muy dinámica: situado a dos pasos de la Gran Vía, el apartamento está al alcance de una gran multitud de bares y restaurantes, por los que se caracteriza  el barrio de Gran Vía. Si  se atraviesa  la Gran Vía y sucesivamente la Calle de Alcalá, se llega a uno de los lugares símbolos de la capital: la Plaza de Cibeles. Ubicada en la intersección de la calle de Alcalá con los paseos de Recoletos y del Prado, es peculiar por su fuente central del 1782 (la fuente de Cibeles) y por tener en cada esquina cuatro edificios representativos: el Palacio de Buenavista (Cuartel General del Ejército), el Palacio de Linares (Casa de América), el Palacio de Comunicaciones (sede del Alcaldía de Madrid) y el Banco de España. Prosiguiendo por calle

Name: Designer's flat in central location
Summary: In Salesas district, next to the most fashionable shops and restaurants is this flat designed by theinteriorlist, with a nice decoration and fully equiped. With a full bedroom, living room with a sofa-bed and all amenities, lots of light and style.
Space: The flat is designed by Jean Porsche, a mexican architect established in Madrid since 2004. It is decorated with furniture and accesories from theinteriorlist* a shop in the same district, and serves as the prototype flat of this shop having all furniture and details for sale, so if you like something you could buy it. It is a unique experience since the flat could change from one visit to the next one and you could feel like living in a showroom. The flat is all exterior with huge windows, a bow window and small balconies in the living, de bedroom and the kitchen.

Neighborhood Overview: This neighbourhood is considered the Madrid's SOHO with lots of fashion shops, restaurants, and is close to museums and other attractions. It is close to Chueca and its nightlife, and next to all the hippie style of Malasaña district, or the most posh and traditional style of Almagro or Salamanca District. It has 2 metro stations in a 3 minute walking distance. Salamanca district and its golden mile of shopping is crossing Paseo de la Castellana. Enjoy the traditional "barrio" lifestyle with the small commerce and the style of the best international brands in the streets around. Enjoy the most fashionable restaurants walking around as Dray Martina, Creme de la Creme, Luzi Bombon and others.  Have the best boulangerie of the city in mama Framboise or Pomme Sucre.  A whole Madrid ready for you to discover!
Notes: This is a non smoking flat, but you could do it in the balconies. Small pets may be allowed but ask before.
Transit: Metro stations for line 5 and 10 in a 3 Minute walking.  Line 10 conects yo airport line and you could get to the airport in 25-30 minutes. Next to some touristic bus stops. 10-15 Minute walking from Museums triangle (Prado, Reina Sofía, Thyssen) Public parking at the Street is possible but a littlw difficult. We could advise for parkings nearby.
Access: The flat has a laptop and internet access. If you need to print tickets or something you could send it to theinteriorlist and they will gladly print it for you.  The flat has washer, fridge, microwave, blender, and all other minor appliances.  You will have a welcome pack with coke and diet coke, water and a bottle of red wine.  Feel free to ask for information of the city, places to go, what to see etc.
Interaction: If I am not at the city, my assistant could help you in any inquiry you may have

Name: Modern, quiet and centric flat
Summary: Functional apartment with modern and minimalist decoration.
Space: It is a comfortable apartment with all the necessary services available to live a quiet and pleasant stay.
Description: Functional apartment with modern and minimalist decoration. It is a comfortable apartment with all the necessary services available to live a quiet and pleasant stay. For the summer season the pool will be available :-) It is a quiet area just 2 minutes walk from the central train estachon Atocha and 2 minutes from large El Retiro Park. There are many bars and restaurants nearby as well as a supermarket in the same street. There is a subway station across the street, has a direct line to the center of Madrid (Gran Via, Sol, Plaza Mayor ...) in just 4-5 stops. Atocha main trail Station is just 2 min. walking. It has a comfortable lounge with television/video/audio good equipment. Please ask me about the operation and options to enjoy it. Also free Internet wifi will be available for use, ask for details to connect it.

I hope you have good experiences and stay as long as you are in my house.

En un barrio que aún conserva la estética típica de Madrid, estarás rodeado de tiendas, restaurantes, cafeterías, teatros y todo lo que busques de ocio y turismo. Entre los lugares a destacar está la Puerta del Sol, la Plaza Mayor, el Teatro Real y el Palacio Real,  la Gran Vía, los barrios de la Latina y Lavapiés con sus tabernas típicas, el barrio de Chueca con una oferta gastronómica más “chick” y un ambiente de fiesta, el barrio de las letras, el Museo Thyssen, el Museo del Prado, el Palacio de congresos,  la Fuente de Cibeles y la Puerta de Alcalá entre otros. Rodeado también de los hoteles más modernos con su oferta de “rooftops” que ahora se lleva todo el ambiente de la ciudad. Neighborhood Overview: Pleno centro de Madrid, perfecto para hacer turismo. Con numerosos restaurantes a su alrededor adaptados para todos los bolsillos donde podrán probar las típicas Tapas, el jamón serrano y degustar un buen vino, cafeterías, tiendas, edificios históricos, teatros y mucha vida nocturna. Cerca de hoteles y restaurantes de moda donde poder comer y tomar una copa.
Notes: Check in a las 15h (3pm.) y check out a las 12am. Cualquier petición fuera de estos horarios o para estocaje de maletas, por favor consultar.
Transit: La parada de metro más cercana es Sol (1 minuto). The closest metro stop is Sol.  From the airport: - By bus. There is an express bus, takes about 35 minutes to Cibeles, then you have to take the subway in Banco de España "line 2" Cuatro Caminos direction, until Sol. Or walk 8 minutes to the door of the apartment. 5€ bus + 1,5€ subway (if you take it) - By taxi it takes around 20 minutes and around 30€. - Train/ Underground. Take line 8 to Nuevos Ministerios (5 stops, 1.5€) and then the train (Renfe), line C3 or C4 to Sol, no stops between (5 min, around 2€) The best option is the train/metro, it will take you around an hour since you get your luggage in the airport, and it is cheap and confortable. If the flight is delayed, please tell me before departure . Si ve que el vuelo se retrasa por favor comuníquemelo antes de salir.

Disponemos de plancha y tabla de planchar para que se sientan como en casa. El baño cuenta con toallas limpias, secador de pelo, papel higiénico e incluimos un set de baño con jabones. Con aire acondicionado/ calefacción y una televisión de 32 pulgadas. Techos abohardillados, que conservan la estética madrileña tradicional. WIFI gratis! Varios parking públicos cerca.
Interaction: En el apartamento encontrarán  información turística  y estamos a su disposición para asesorarles en lo que necesiten.

Description: A very big suit-apartment with personality, unique furniture and lots of natural light thanks to it's four beautiful balconies. More than a tourist apartment, an opportunity to witness the future. A home where all objects are open source and locally made. La Maker House is a living space made by  artisans, designers, architects, makers, and builders who have participated in creating the first 100% Maker House. Locally made and open source Join the adventure and create with us, share your opinions, your insights, and your designs to the world. La Maker House Madrid is a holiday apartment in constant progress where all the furniture is constantly renovated in a contest where everyone is invited. 5" walking to Gran via, Sol an 8" to plaza Mayor. La Maker House is in a pedestrian street In the center of Madrid between Malasaña and Chueca, very near to Conde Duque. All three form a special part of Madrid where a new walking center forms full of art galleries, trendy local stores and bars. C
Neighborhood Overview: 5" walking to Gran via, Sol an 8" to plaza Mayor. La Maker House is in a pedestrian street In the center of Madrid between Malasaña and Chueca, very near to Conde Duque. All three form a special part of Madrid where a new walking center forms full of art galleries, trendy local stores and bars. Chueca is a vibrant place with lots of restaurants and terraces in the street. Under La Maker House there are many restaurants and cafeterias.    Remember that great location comes with lots of options and thus some noise at night. Restaurants and cafeterias open until midnight during the week, and 1am during the weekends.
Notes: Be part of history. Tell your friends you where in the first Maker House of the world.
Transit: Close to Gran via, Sol and all the places tour guides recommend and more. You can relax in the tranquil cafes of Conde Duque and its cultural center. Or enjoy the vibrant life of Malasaña just turn to the right and enjoy the homemade, organic, vintage and modern kind of neighborhood. if for the contrary you choose to walk towards your left when leaving the apartment you'll be in a incredibly chic place full of glamour, the famous Chueca the gay neighborhood of Madrid.
Interaction: Join the adventure and create with us, share your opinions, your insights, and your designs to the world. La Maker House Madrid is a holiday apartment in constant progress where all the furniture is constantly renovated in a contest where everyone is invited.
House Rules: Rules are simple, enjoy your stay and don't disturbe the neighbors ;)
Host About: world traveler, spanish cuban american recently establish in madrid, after 2 years of meeting great people
Street: Justicia, Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid 28004, Spain

Name: Compartimos una habitación grande, amplio balcón
Summary: 我的房源靠近公共交通、适合家庭的活动、餐厅和餐饮。因为舒适的床、厨房、、温馨,您一定会爱上我的房源。我的房源适合情侣、独自旅行的冒险家、商务旅行者、有小孩的家庭。 马德里羚羊客栈POSADA ANTILPE MADRID是来自广东深圳的喜欢户外旅行的小资美女(深圳房网:羊铃儿,淘宝:妆容坊,马蜂窝/磨坊:羊铃儿LESLEY羊羊)在西班牙马德里开的家庭旅馆,为各位亲提供干净整洁物美价廉的小有情调滴住宿,享受的却是星级酒店环境。羚羊客栈位于马德里市区VISTA ALEGRE,马德里地铁5号线出口紧挨着小区,交通方便。有电梯,泳池,中央供暖及24小时热水,里面花园绿化非常好,四季花开,各种果树。两个游泳池水质清澈,客栈提供游乐设备免费畅玩哦 ,是唯一一个大户型全封闭管理的本区最高大上的小区。周围大型家乐福,DIA等大中小型超市,楼下有中国百货、药店、美发化妆品店;紧挨地铁站和公交车站,直达市中心SOL太阳广场只需十几分钟,步行三分钟的购物街中西美食都有,游乐生活是非常的方便滴。。
Space: 我们的家位于马德里市中心附近的VISTA ALEGRE,地铁5号线的出口,交通非常方便。全封闭管理的小区非常的安全,小区中央暖气24小时热水,泳池,电梯,花木果树环境非常的好,我们这里街区是免费停车。 Nuestra casa está en el centro de la ciudad, y a 3 minutos andando al metro VISTA ALEGRE(línea 5), por lo que está muy bien comunicado. El barrio es muy seguro, además hay agua caliente 24h, calefacción central, piscina y aparcamiento gratis.   Our house is in the center of the city, 3 minutes walk to VISTA ALEGRE metro (line 5) so it is easy of approach. The living area is very safe, plus there are 24h hot water, central heating, swimming pool and free parking.   我们的家是180平方米的五居室公寓,全屋实木地板,每个房间都有暖气和超大的衣柜,超过一米的明亮的窗户。两个很大的洗手间一个可以放置六人餐桌的大厨房,两个大阳台,一个洗衣房。 La casa tiene 5 habitaciones, 180m2 totalmente con suelo de parqué. En cada habitación hay calefacción, ventanal y armario grande. Hay dos baños grandes y una cocina con masa de seis personas, dos terrazas y lavadora bastante grande.   The house has 5 bedrooms, 180m2 with wood floors. Each room has heating, window and large closet. There are

Name: Habitación económica céntrica Malasaña
Summary: El piso está muy céntrico, en la zona norte de malasaña, comunicado con las lineas de metro 2,4,3,6,10,1 y a pocos minutos de gran vía y sol. El barrio tiene el mejor ambiente de todo Madrid para salir y tomar algo. El piso es exterior, nada de ruido y sin vecinos. Tiene una habitación con cama doble. Lugares de interés: Malasaña, Fuencarral, Gran Via, Sol, Arguelles, Moncloa, Plaza de españa, Quevedo, San Bernardo, Zona Bilbao, Plaza 2 de mayo, Alonso Martinez.
Space: La casa consta de una habitación principal con cama de matrimonio que es la que ofrezco, y un salón, readaptado a segunda habitación que es donde yo vivo. Ambas habitaciones son independientes y tienen su propio cerrojo con llave para tener independencia y tranquilidad. Las zonas comunes son baño y cocina.  El piso es un poco viejo, pero está siempre muy cuidado y limpio. Es un cuarto sin ascensor, pero si vinieran con mucho equipaje, podría ayudarles a subirlo. Versatilidad: Sé lo que es viajar esto hace que me ponga en la piel de todos los tipos de viajeros y sepa que necesita la gente. Sé como buen viajero lo que busca alguien en un apartamento y me  esfuerzo en darlo, evidentemente hablamos de limpieza absoluta, buena comunicación y un ambiente siempre cercano y agradable.
Description: El piso está muy céntrico, en la zona norte de malasaña, comunicado con las lineas de metro 2,4,3,6,10,1 y a pocos minutos de gran vía y sol. El barrio tiene el mejor ambiente de todo Madrid para salir y tomar algo. El piso es exterior, nada de ruido y sin vecinos. Tiene una habitación con cama doble. Lugares de interés: Malasaña, Fuencarral, Gran Via, Sol, Arguelles, Moncloa, Plaza de españa, Quevedo, San Bernardo, Zona Bilbao, Plaza 2 de mayo, Alonso Martinez. Ambas habitaciones son independientes y tienen su propio cerrojo con llave para tener independencia y tranquilidad. Las zonas comunes son baño y cocina.  El piso es un poco viejo, pero está siempre muy cuidado y limpio. Es un cuarto sin ascensor, pero si vinieran con mucho equipaje, podría ayudarles a subirlo. Versatilidad: Sé lo que es viajar esto hace que me ponga en la pie
Neighborhood Overview: Es quizás el mayor atractivo del piso, su ubicación. Incrustada en el corazón de Madrid, tienes todo a mano, sol está a 15min andando y a pocas paradas en metro directo. A 5 minutos tenemos malasaña, emblemático barrio de bares y ambiente llena de vida y de pequeños lugares diferentes al resto de Madrid. Dando un paseo, se puede ir desde al Corte Inglés de Argüelles para unas compras, hasta a pasear por la calle manuela Malasaña y ver alguna obra en su teatro, o tomar algo por Fuencarral. Se encuentra a 10min del Rey León y por lo tanto, de Gran Vía. Carrefour 24h cercano. Burguer king Telepizza a menos de 80 metros. A 50 metros de la parada de metro Quevedo (Linea 2 directa con SOL) 5 paradas. Si vienes, te contaremos a dónde ir cualquier día de la semana.
Notes: El piso es muy silencioso y muy cálido. En verano hay aire acondicionado para el calor pero en invierno apenas se nota el frío gracias a ser normalmente caliente.
Transit: A menos de 50 metros de línea de metro Quevedo Línea 2 (5 paradas directas SOL)  Hay metro por todos direcciones, Lineas 2,4,6,3,10 y 1, eso te conecta con todo Madrid, y cada parada está a menos de 5 min andando. Te daremos un mapa para que sepas moverte por el barrio.
Access: Tendréis acceso a todo. Baño y cocina, habitación, uso de Internet.
Interaction: En todo momento habrá alguien para orientaros en lo que necesitéis, sea yo o un amigo que es mi vecino.
House Rules: - Apartir de las 12 de la noche por respeto a los vecinos. Silencio - Para no añadir al precio gastos de limpieza, se pedirá que el apartamento se quede limpio y las sábanas metidas dentro de la lavadora.
Host About:
Hola buenas mi nombre es Adrián, soy de Sevilla, vivo actualmente en Madrid, en pleno centro justo al lado del Barrio de Malasaña.
Me considero una persona muy amable, simpática, responsable y muy respetuosa con (EMAIL HIDDEN) encanta que se sientan como en su casa todos los huéspedes =)

Name: Cozy and Luxury apartment, Madrid
Summary: Property of 150m2 totally remodeled with high quality materials.Located in a central street, famous for its restaurants and leisure zones. Only 5'walking to Colon square, 10' to Gran Vía and 10' to Puerta de Alcalá.The house has 2 bedrooms with doubled beds, one of them with a bathroom inside the room, 2more bathrooms, and a very spacious and bright living rooms with 3 balconies to the street and a fully equipped kitchen. WIFI and TV with Netflix. Heating and air conditioning in the whole house.
Space: Hello! My name is Diana, I am offering my lovely house to anyone who would like to enjoy Madrid in a warm and wonderful accomodation. I will always try that my guests feel like at home, that is why I take care of every detail of the house and I am available for anything my guests may need. I can speak English, French, Mandarin and Spanish, so I would be more than delighted to deal with you in any of theses languages for your convenience.

Host About:
Me encanta viajar, y cada vez que voy a un país diferente me encanta relacionarme con la gente local, por ello creo que alojarse en una casa típica del país hace que se disfrute más del viaje y, de alguna forma, se conozca más del país y la gente que vive allí.
Los hogares definen a la población y al estilo de vida de los ciudadanos y, por ende, al país, y creo que es una maravilla poder experimentar esto y alojarse en una casa propia de un ciudadano.

Name: Apart. Wifi Madrid Centre Malasaña.
Summary: Beautiful and quiet apartment located in the centre of Madrid, in the neighborhood of Malasaña. Close to Plaza España (2 min walking), close to Gran Vía (2 min. walking) and Callao, and 10 minutes walking to Puerta del Sol. Very, very well connected.
Space: Beautiful and quiet apartment where you can enjoy the charms of the city of Madrid.  You will stroll through the alleys of Malasaña as well as by La Gran Vía of Madrid.  You will have parks (El Retiro, El Templo de Debod ...) nearby, the greatest theatres with the most important musicals of Spain, the Teatro Real if you love opera , The Palacio Real from which you can enjoy a wonderful sunset, markets (El Rastro , El Mercado de San Miguel), La Mallorquina for your breakfast or San Gines to have “churros con chocolate”, countless places go shopping, and of course, all the authentic Tapas bars and typical ambience of Madrid.

The flat is less than 5 minutes walk from Gran Via and Plaza Espana. the nearest metro stations are Noviciado (2 minutes walk), Tribunal (5 minutes walk) Plaza de Espana (5 minutes walk).  The flat is within walking distance to many of the city's most important monuments such as the Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol,the Palacio Real, the Retiro Park,The Reina Sofia museum,the Prado museum and more.  The apartment is situated in the exclusive neighbourhood of Malasana where many bars are concentrated. The area also offers chic boutiques, high level restaurants and charming outdoor cafes. The Chueca neighbourhood,with its gay scene, is also only 5 minutes aways. Lavapies go many people from Madrid and tourists to tapas and drinks. This is a small studio located in a "Corrala" of the nineteenth century, which are popular buildings arranged around an elongated central courtyard, whose small houses are accessed by open corridors that overlook the patio. It is located in a quiet street of the neighborhood and whose privileged situation will allow you to rest between visit and visit to recover forces, besides saving money in transport since everything is within walking distance. 3 minutes walking from Lavapiés metro station and 10 minutes of Atocha train station. The apartment has everything necessary in order that you feel like at home. Also it has wifi and Smart TV, american kitchen with refrigerator, washer, microwave and induction. Name: Habitación en zona bien comunicada

El apartamento está reformado de hace unos 10 años y repintado de hace 3, es pequeño pero confortable, de 50 metros cuadrados y pertenece  a un edificio de unos 80 años de antigúedad.   Consta de salón con aire acondicionado, dos dormitorios ( el mío y el del invitado), cocina y baño. La cama es de 90x190 cm.. La calefacción  es por acumuladores y por radiadores. Conexión Wi-Fi a  internet, por ADSL. Por supuesto puedes usar la cocina, lavadora, plancha, televisión, etc. Se incluye desayuno con cafe leche, tostadas, cereales y zumo. Host About:
Alquilar apartamentos en Madrid nunca fue tan sencillo. 

Somos una empresa que se dedica desde hace más de 6 años al alquiler de viviendas para turistas y empresas, ofreciendo un servicio integral para hacer su estancia lo más cómoda y agradable posible. 

Todas nuestras viviendas están amuebladas con los electrodomésticos y utensilios necesarios para estar como en casa, además como podrás observar en nuestras fotos los apartamentos han sido reformados recientemente y equipados con cariño y esmero. También ofrecemos otros servicios como lavandería, planchado o limpiezas adicionales y nuestro equipo está siempre disponible para ayudar en todo lo que necesites.

Si quieres disfrutar de una estancia agradable en Madrid avísanos, nuestras puertas siempre estarán abiertas para ti.

Name: Spacious penthouse with sky views in best location
Summary: Unique and spacious penthouse with sky views in a late 19th century building at the heart of the nice neighbourhood of Chueca, just a few hundred meters away from Justicia, Malasaña, Chamberí... And less than 1,5 km. and 15/20 minutes away from the Prado Museum, Royal Palace...
Space: This is a unique and special apartment in one of the best neighborhoods of Madrid, Chueca, just around the corner of the other fascinating district of Justicia. Both are in the tourist and social apogee area. Surrounded in a radius of only a few hundred meters, on the west by Malasaña neighborhood, Sol and La Latina to the south and Chamberí to the north. Less than 1.5 km and a leisurely 15-minute walk, are the main tourist sites of the city (the Prado Museum, Retiro, the Royal Palace, Plaza Mayor...). It is also next to the Plaza de Colón, beginning of Paseo de la Castellana, with immediate communications to the north of Madrid, the main business center. The property is located on the last and sixth floor on an elegant building from the late 1800s. The house has over 180 walkable sqm, distributed in spacious open volumes of up to 5 meters high and bathed by numerous windows. Neighborhood Overview: The house is in a realy nice and authentic neighbourhood called Chueca, also in the corner starts Justicia. It has losts of small nice bars and cafes, unique boutiques, healthy and gourmet stores, nice restaurants... The neighbourhood market, is just arround the corner. Lots of life during the day and during the night. It is sorrounded, just a few hundred meters away, from Malasaña, and Chamberi neighbourhoods. And less than 1,5 km. away and 15/20 minutes by walk, from the main turistic atractions of the city (Royal Palace, Prado Museum, Retiro park...). Also Colón square is just arround the corner, and there starts the Paseo de la Castellana, where towards north, you find the main bussiness areas of the city. It is a very real neighbourhood, where madrilenian lives, not mainly turists arround, as it happens with other neighbourhoods. It is a really nice option to start discovering Madrid or visitting it again for second, third… or tenth time.
Notes: Anything you need, just call me or write me. The 4th room is not absolutly isolated. Wool panels and air connection to the kitchen through the "ceiling".
Transit: You have Chueca Metro Station right in front of the building door. Also Alonso Martínez Metro station, is just a few blocks away (one stop from Chueca). There are 3 lines which conect there, so you can arrive fast from there, to anywhere in the city. Also there are several buses which stop really close. And there is a BiciMad (public bicicle's service), in the same street. And you can walk everywhere! Taxi is also a good choice.
Access: All the house.
Interaction: 24 hours available.
House Rules: - Eventos se pueden negociar
Host About:
I’m a 29 year old guy. My passions, which I try to focus in my lifestyle, are the architecture, photography and to travel. I work as an interior designer and photograph. I like to meet all kinds of people from everywhere, and learn both from each other. I’ve lived in Italy, United States and Norway. I love and practice frequently, several sports. I speak English, Italian and Spanish, my mother tongue. I pay lot’s of attention to everything that has to do with the culture and plasticity in there many different styles and ways.

Host About:
Mi nombre es Ayoze. Nombre que debo a uno de los últimos reyes aborígenes de Canarias, lugar de donde procedo.

Mi pasión por la hospitalidad comenzó cuando empecé a trabajar gestionando apartamentos mientras terminaba la carrera de Bellas Artes, especializándome en transferencias culturales.

Encontré en mi trabajo una manera de disfrutar de las personas que venían con curiosidad a disfrutar de la ciudad donde yo vivía.

Han pasado muchos años y ahora dirijo una pequeña agencia de alquiler vacacional en Chueca. Uno de los barrios más céntricos de Madrid. 

Me considero una persona con muchas metas, y entre ellas, que mis huéspedes obtengan mucho más que una estancia.

Name: Cómodo estudio en la calle Goya
Summary: Bonito estudio en el barrio comercial y financiero de Madrid, excelentemente comunicado por transporte público y con el aeropuerto, con todas las comodidades para relajarte después de un día de turismo o de trabajo. Colchón y almohadas viscoelásticas
Space: Este estudio, regentado por Marta y Marcos, ha sido preparado para ofrecerte todas las comodidades. Con el metro en la puerta y el Parque de El Retiro a tres minutos, podrás disfrutar de las zonas más turísticas de Madrid sin ninguna complicación, y si vienes por viaje de trabajo te encontrarás en el barrio financiero y de oficinas de Madrid, y perfectamente comunicado con metro, autobuses y con una parada de taxis enfrente. Si vienes en avión, el autobús que te trae del aeropuerto te dejará a cinco minutos. Al regresar de un ajetreado día, ya sea por turismo o por trabajo, podrás disfrutar de todas las comodidades que hemos intentado preparar para ti.

Access: En dos agradables sillones puedes tomar un café, usar tu portátil (adsl wi-fi gratuito) o ver la televisión. Pero también podrás ver la tele desde la cama, y aquí está lo que nos parece más importante. A nosotros nos gusta mucho dormir, y cuando viajamos creemos que es esencial hacerlo cómodamente. Por eso, tanto el colchón (de 1,35) como las almohadas son de viscoelástica.  La cocina está equipada para que no tengas que comer fuera de casa si no quieres. Y si tu estancia va a ser larga, no es necesario que traigas una maleta enorme, puesto que dispones de lavadora (te dejamos detergente y suavizante) y plancha. Y si eres de los que te gusta tomar un baño, no querrás salir de la amplísima bañera, en la que el agua caliente centralizada hará que puedas conseguir el agua tan caliente como quieras. Te proporcionamos gel, champú, toallas y secador de pelo, para que no tengas que traerlo. Y por último, la calefacción central en invierno y el aire acondicionado en verano conseguirán que te s
Interaction: Te atenderemos en todo lo que necesites. Marta o Marcos te recibiremos a tu llegada y te despediremos a tu salida, y estaremos pendientes de que estés a gusto en todo momento.
House Rules: No se permite fumar. El estudio está acondicionado para dos personas, por lo que no se admiten huéspedes adicionales, excepto bebés (no disponemos de cuna). No se permiten actividades incómodas, molestas o insalubres para el resto de los vecinos, en particular celebrar fiestas o hacer ruidos altos por la noche (roncar sí está permitido). La Comunidad de Madrid exige la separación de residuos para su posterior reciclaje. Te indicaremos cómo hacerlo a tu llegada. El conserje de la comunidad recogerá  las bolsas en la puerta en el horario indicado.

The area, in which the apartment is located, is tranquil yet remains just off the busy hustle and bustle streets of the city central. The apartment is conveniently close to the Royal Theatre and the metro Opera, which has great connections to the rest of the city. Puerta de Sol and Plaza Mayor, are both a must see when visiting the Spanish capital, they can be found within walking distance or a short metro ride. In addition, one of Madrid’s main attractions is the Royal Palace, which is simply breathtaking and located on this apartment’s doorstep. Restaurants, bars, cafes and boutique shops surround this superb area too.
Notes: Discount Long Stays € 10/day discount for stays of 7 or more days (already applied) 15% discount for stays of 15 or more days (based on daily rate) Included in price:     - Utilities     - High Speed Internet and Satellite TV     - Taxes Not included in price:     - € 70 Booking Fee (Includes Final Cleaning)     - 3% Surcharge for Payments with American Express (No Surcharges for Visa or Mastercard)
Access: Surface Area: 80 m². Third floor. The living room is furnished with a two-seater sofa, a chaise, an armchair, a coffee table, two side tables, a standing lamp and a plasma TV mounted on the wall. In addition, there is another area with a two-seater sofa, a round table for up to two people and a standing lamp. The kitchen is fully equipped and completely independent, it features a breakfast-bar with six stools. The master bedroom comes complete with a double bed (1,50m x 1,90m), two bedside tables, two bedside lamps, built-in closets and en-suite bathroom with shower. The second bedroom features two single beds (0,80cm x 1,90cm), a bedside table, a bedside lamp and a fitted closet, as well as a desk with a chair. There is a second bathroom with a walk-in shower. The entire apartment has wooden floors, except for the bathrooms, which are both tiled.  Amenities: Lift, Cable Television with English Channels (“Imagenio”), Wifi High-Speed Internet, Gas Heating (“Gas Natural”), Central Air Co
Interaction: We will arrange the check in time depending on your arrival time. It is normally from 4pm but we will do our best to have the apartment ready for you ASAP. Anything you need during your stay, feel free to contact us! We are happy to help!
Host About:
Spain Select was born from the recognition of a desire among travelers to live locally in a real home whilst away from their own, and yet still enjoy all of the benefits and small luxuries of a hotel stay. Not only that, though, we understood that they also wanted to be close to all of the best that their destination has to offer – to be right in the heart of it all. So we decided to source a broad range of high quality homes in the most sought after locations across the country, starting with the capital Madrid and moving over to Malaga, Valencia, and Seville. We then added a few unique flourishes that embody our brand of service and our values. Our interior design team works to extract and enhance the natural charm from each space and make it a warm home. Our very own in-house Local Ambassadors are posted in each destination to welcome each guest home and bed them in to the neighborhood when they first arrive. Finally, a selection of hotel-like services – including a 24-hour concierge for everything from show tickets to new sheets – and a motorized maintenance team completes our comprehensive customer care throughout every single stay. Every Spain Select experience is unique, yet they are all of a consistent high quality no matter when you stay with us. 

Live local, sleep royal: welcome to Spain Select.

Name: Céntrico y tranquilo cerca de la Pl
Summary: Piso recientemente pintado, cuenta con 2 habitaciones y un sofá cama, cocina independiente y baño. La casa es realmente acogedora, combina elementos modernos con algunos de estética claramente retro, que le dan un aire clásico, acorde con la zona.
Space: Piso recientemente pintado, cuenta con 2 habitaciones y un sofá-cama capacidad para 6 personas , cocina independiente y baño. La casa es realmente acogedora, combina elementos modernos con algunos de estética claramente retro, que le dan un aire clásico, acorde con la zona. Ubicado en la calle Juan Álvarez Mendizábal, estupenda calle situada en una de las zonas más tranquilas,  elegantes y seguras de Madrid, cerca de la Plaza de España, la calle Princesa y la Gran vía, rodeado de servicios, ocio y con muy buenas comunicaciones. Perfecta ubicación para descubrir rincones históricos e interesantes de Madrid (el templo de Debod, el campo del Moro, el palacio real, la Catedral de la Almudena…) y cerca de la Gran Vía y toda su oferta cultural (cine, teatros, musicales…) Además está muy cerca del Parque el Oeste, uno de los pulmones de la capital, donde puede pasar un rato agradable, puede pasear en bicicleta o hacer footing.

Neighborhood Overview: El barrio de Argüelles/Moncloa, es uno de los mejores barrios de Madrid. Mezcla tranquilidad con una gran oferta tanto cultural, como de ocio y restauración. El piso se encuentra en una situación privilegiada y tranquila, con fácil acceso y bien comunicado. Muy próximo a la Plaza de España, al parque del Oeste y a la Gran Vía, entre otros fantásticos puntos de interés de la ciudad, a los que puede llegar andando en poco tiempo.
Notes: La casa es ideal para parejas o familias. Proporcionamos una cesta de bienvenida y una pequeña guía con nuestras recomendaciones favoritas en el barrio, para ir de compras y comer.
Transit: Tenemos la suerte de tener una ubicación que permite ir caminando a cualquier parte, pero aun así las comunicaciones son inmejorables.  -	Parada de taxis muy cerca de la puerta,  -	Estación de metro Ventura Rodríguez y Argüelles a tan solo unos metros del portal,  -	Líneas de autobús en la calle de la Princesa, Estación BiciMad a solo unos metros.
Access: Nos encontramos en la zona de Argüelles – Moncloa, barrio céntrico, tranquilo y elegante en el centro de Madrid, cerca de la calle Princesa, de la plaza de España, de la Gran Vía y de la calle Bailén. En un entorno incomparable por su facilidad de comunicación con cualquier punto céntrico de la ciudad. La casa está muy bien situada, muy bien comunicada, cerca de autobús y metro, y a pocos metros de una parada de taxis, que puede comunicar en pocos minutos con el aeropuerto.
Interaction: Recibimos y despedimos a los huéspedes.  Les ayudamos a que conozcan Madrid y estamos a su disposición durante toda su estancia. Disponemos de servicio de cuna bajo petición.
House Rules: El apartamento se ha realizado con mucho cariño para que tu estancia en él sea muy agradable ES OBLIGATORIO PRESENTAR DOCUMENTACIÓN OFICIAL DE TODOS LOS OCUPANTES El horario de entrada será desde las 15h a las 22h. A partir de las 22h se cobrará un suplemento de 30€, que se abonará a la llegada a la entrega de las llaves. Entrar antes de las 15h puede conllevar un suplemento El horario de salida será antes de las 11h, si deseas abandonar el apartamento más tarde deberás solicitarlo con antelación y en base a la disponibilidad estaremos encantados de ayudarte. Puede conllevar un suplemento Recuerda que el apartamento debe ser devuelto en las mismas condiciones de orden y limpieza que a tu llegada Ruego que saques la basura todos los días, con especial cuidado en los meses de verano Es importante respetar el número de personas que ocuparán el apartamento, cuyo número nunca debe de sobrepasar el estipulado en la reserva. En caso contrario se pedirá al cliente el desalojo inmediato del apa

Neighborhood Overview: Es un barrio tranquilo, urbano y residencial.  A menos de 5 minutos del metro y a 10 de la estación de trenes de cercanías, se encuentra muy bien ubicado para trasladarse a Casa de Campo con sus múltiples atracciones y al centro de Madrid. Fácil de aparcar frente al edificio y sin costo. Se cuenta con numerosos supermercados y tiendas cercanas así como a pocos metros se encuentra el parque Arias Navarro con bares y terrazas, caminerias y zonas de juegos
Notes: El piso es cuidado con esmero , en él se encontraran como en su propia casa.  Existen ciertas normas que se especifican a continuación, esperado la mayor colaboración de los huéspedes en su cumplimiento. Al ser una comunidad de vecinos de índole familiar no se podrán hacer fiestas o eventos que alteren la tranquilidad de la comunidad, se debe respetar el horario de descanso tanto la siesta como en la noche. No se admiten mascotas ni se puede fumar dentro del piso. No se pueden traer invitados.  Se agradece sacar la basura a los contenedores que se encuentran en  la entrada del edificio  El piso esta reformado con el fin de ser eficiente desde el punto de vista energético , por eso el cuidado en el consumo de gas y luz es importante para todos.
Transit: Cerca del piso, a solo 3 min se encuentra la estacion del metro Empalme, que conecta en 25 min aproximadamente con el centro de Madrid. La estacion de trenes de Cercanias de Aluche esta a 10 min del piso.  También lineas de autobuses y un servicio nocturno con el bus Buho N18 que sale de la plaza Cibeles En coche tiene una rápida conexión con la A5, M30...permitiendo moverse con mucha facilidad
Access: El piso tiene 3 habitaciones de las cuales, la principal tiene una cama matrimonial , la segunda una cama nido, cuando la de abajo se saca sus patas se elevan y queda a la altura de la otra y una individual en la tercera habitación, en el salón se encuentra un sofá grande y cómodo que se puede ampliar sus asientos para convertirlo en una cama para una persona pequeña, se dispone también de una cama cuna de viaje para bebe y una trona, estas hay que solicitarla antes de la llegada.
Interaction: A la llegada de los huéspedes se les entregara las llaves explicando el funcionamiento de toda la casa , ademas de información del barrio y de las conexiones de metro y bus facilitándoles el mapa del metro u otra información disponible, también  la clave de wifi y los números de los teléfonos para cualquier duda que quisieran consultar Dispondrán de todo lo necesario para comenzar su estancia en el piso con la mayor comodidad posible.

Name: The Paseo del Prado Apartment - VALLE NOSTRO
Summary: This recently renovated and stunning spacious apartment is perfect for guests who are looking to explore all of Madrid's cultural heritage. The apartment is right within Madrid's triangle Museums:  The Prado, Museo Reina Sofia and the Thyssen.  The Botanic gardens lay directly opposite whilst Retiro, Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor are all within a comfortable ten to fifteen minutes walk.  The neighbourhood Cortes also has some of the cities most outstanding  Restaurants.
Space: Este espacioso apartamento ha sido recientemente reformado y está ubicado en una de las zonas más privilegiadas de Madrid. Sus amplios ventanales aportan una agradable luz natural durante la mayor parte del día y ofrecen al visitante unas inmejorables vistas sobre el Paseo del Prado.  La ubicación es idónea para aquellas personas que deseen explorar todo el patrimonio cultural que la ciudad tiene que ofrecer ya que se encuentra en el famoso “Triangulo del Arte” de Madrid. Con un breve paseo se podrá visitar el Museo del Prado, el Museo Reina Sofía y el Museo Thyssen. Así mismo el famoso Jardín Botánico, la Puerta del Sol y la Plaza Mayor también se encurtan a escasa distancia del apartamento.   Los huéspedes también tendrán acceso a la azotea del edificio desde donde podrán disfrutar de una maravillosa e inigualable puesta de sol.

Name: Lovely Apartment Center of the City
Summary: Lovely and spacious apartment in the center of Madrid,  just 3 minutes away walking from Plaza Mayor, located next to all the great and must see sites and attractions of this wonderful city.
Space: *Note: The apartment is perfect for 4 guests, but you may add one extra bed in the living room for a fifth guest. Ideal for a romantic getaway, small families, and small groups.  It is a lovely spacious apartment (110M2), less than 3 minute walk to Plaza Mayor. You can see one of the entraces to the plaza from one of its balconies. It is located in a lovely and secure street. New apartment in entirely restored 19th Century building. It has been fully renovated and redecorated with luxurious qualities.  Next to MUST SEE sites in Madrid.   Next to some of the best restaurants and shops in the city.  The cultural and gastronomic offer of the area are amazing.  Ideal for a great stay.
